kreia_echo.gbl000level001.mp3: :: Ah... you hear it. It is faint... but it is there. ::
kreia_echo.gbl000level002.mp3: :: It is the Force you feel... it has not been so long as for you to forget... ::
kreia_echo.gbl000level003.mp3: :: Do not turn away from it. Listen... feel it echoing within you. ::
kreia_echo.gbl000level004.mp3: :: Come, I shall guide you down the familiar paths - you will need it if we are to survive and escape this place. ::
kreia_echo.gblhandmaiden343.mp3: :: {Speaking from experience about losing one's connection to the Force, reserved but sad - make it poetic, like speaking of a dead aunt}It is standing atop the summit of a great mountain, the winds tearing about you, then finding yourself buried alive - trapped, helpless, and alone. ::
kreia_echo.gblhandmaiden344.mp3: :: {Speaking from experience about losing one's connection to the Force, reserved but sad - make it poetic, like speaking of a dead aunt}It is like having the energy of youth... then feeling the cloak of years fall upon you, and knowing you are weak, fragile, and a thing easily discarded. ::
kreia_echo.gblhandmaiden345.mp3: :: {Speaking from experience about losing one's connection to the Force, reserved but sad - make it poetic, like speaking of a dead aunt}It is knowing what you want to say and never finding the words. It is a chorus, replaced with silence. Hearing teachings without meaning. ::
kreia_echo.gblhandmaiden346.mp3: :: {Finality, downnote}It is like a beloved pupil to whom you have shared everything, sacrificed everything, and then having them turn from you... and forget all you were. ::
kreia_echo.gblhandmaiden339.mp3: {Whispers, reverent, echoing the player and describing what the Force is like}:: It is like a cloud, a mist that drifts from living creature to creature, set in motion by currents and eddies. ::
kreia_echo.gblhandmaiden340.mp3: :: It is the eye of the storm, the passions of all living things turned into energy, into a chorus. ::
kreia_echo.gblhandmaiden341.mp3: :: {Finality, downnote}It is the rising swell at the end of life, the promise of new territories and new blood, the call of new mysteries in the dark. ::
kreia_echo.003disc1007.mp3: {Whispering, prodding lightly, the player has almost put it all together}:: So close. ::
kreia_echo.003kredisc2004.mp3: :: All thoughts of me will slide from your vision, from your mind, like water. ::
kreia_echo.003kredisc2005.mp3: :: You know who I am. But you will be unable to voice it, to remember it. ::
kreia_echo.003kredisc2007.mp3: :: Only what I allow them to see. ::
kreia_echo.003pcdead2010.mp3: {Low, soft, draw it out, player is remembering her voice}It is the heartbeat of the past.
kreia_echo.003pcdead2009.mp3: {Low, soft, draw it out, player is remembering her voice}It is the echo of the past.
kreia_echo.101emrhatch002.mp3: {Telepathic}:: ...this is the exit... but it is sealed... strange... in my visions, it was open... ::
kreia_echo.101grdrmdr001.mp3: {Telepathic}:: ...be careful... there is much energy in the room beyond... yet it stems from nothing that lives... ::
kreia_echo.101grdrmdr002.mp3: :: ...can you not sense them... reach out... cast aside your sight, cast aside what you see, and instead, reach out with your perceptions... ::
kreia_echo.101grdrmdr003.mp3: :: ...ah you can feel them... the droids you cannot perceive, but the small oscillations of energy... that you can feel... echoing outwards... ::
kreia_echo.101prsndoor001.mp3: {Telepathic}:: ...ah... beyond this door someone yet lives... be mindful... his thoughts are... {pause, frowns}difficult to read... ::
kreia_echo.101prsndoor002.mp3: :: ...but you have nothing to fear from this one... and he might yet prove useful... ::
kreia_echo.262atrend3145.mp3: {Evil, just a trace of finality - she is speaking as a ghostly image through the holocrons}You have done well. All is as I have foreseen.
kreia_echo.262atrend3146.mp3: There must always be a Darth Traya. And if it will not be her, then I must assume that role, and as always, bring about the betrayal of the Jedi and the Sith.
kreia_echo.262atrend3162.mp3: Save your questions. I am not here... not in the flesh, not in your mind. These holocrons hold much of the Sith... and they hold much of my teachings, from long ago.
kreia_echo.262atrend3147.mp3: I am not here... not in the flesh, not in your mind. These holocrons hold much of the Sith... and they hold much of my teachings, from long ago.
kreia_echo.262atrend3148.mp3: But you have much yet to learn. And great tests await you. The death of the past, the death of this false Jedi, was only part of it.
kreia_echo.262atrend3149.mp3: One of the Sith Lords has come to Telos. You know why he has come here. And if he is not stopped here, now, then he shall lay waste to this planet.
kreia_echo.262atrend3150.mp3: You must confront him. He is part of the past, and like this false Jedi, must be laid to rest.
kreia_echo.262atrend3151.mp3: Only then shall you be ready for your final test. If not, then you shall die.
kreia_echo.262atrend3160.mp3: {Contemptuous}Indeed? Did you think I failed to recognize such? Save your threats for someone not willing to die.
kreia_echo.262atrend3157.mp3: {Vicious, challenging}Save your threats. Your final test is not in the battle that will wage across the surface and skies of this dead planet.
kreia_echo.262atrend3156.mp3: {Vicious, challenging}Your final test is not in the battle that will wage across the surface and skies of this dead planet.
kreia_echo.262atrend3158.mp3: {Vicious, challenging}You know where the final test lies. You have always known - for you have always carried the screams and echoes of Malachor within you. It streams from you like blood.
kreia_echo.262atrend3152.mp3: {Vicious, challenging}You know where the final test lies. It is not here, not in the battle that will wage across the surface and skies of this dead planet.
kreia_echo.262atrend3155.mp3: {Vicious, challenging, threatening}And know that if you do not come to me, if you run from this, then I shall sacrifice myself - and end both our lives.
kreia_echo.262atrend3153.mp3: {Vicious, challenging, threatening}And know that if you do not come to me, if you run from this, then I shall sacrifice myself - and end both our lives through the bond we share.
kreia_echo.262atrend3154.mp3: You know where you must travel. And there, I shall be waiting for you.
kreia_echo.301refugee3014t.mp3: :: Why did you do such a thing? Giving in to your feelings over such a small matter. They would be better served elsewhere. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3024t.mp3: :: Very well.  But mind what I have said. Use your power, but in its proper place. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3015t.mp3: :: And what would you rather do? ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3016t.mp3: {Teacher Mode}:: The Force binds all things. The smallest push, the smallest touch, sends echoes throughout life. These acts of cruelty may have more severe repercussions than you know... or can see. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3017t.mp3: :: Cruelty leads to suffering. And when one suffers, it is the way of life to spread suffering. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3018t.mp3: :: The suffering within builds, until its sound is all one hears. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3019t.mp3: :: And when a kindness is offered, it is punished. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3020t.mp3: :: And a greater darkness is served. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3021t.mp3: :: From one act can come tremendous power, when the echo has traveled as far as it can. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3022t.mp3: :: Send a great echo, and power will come to you. The day shall come when you can test your strength, I promise you. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3003t.mp3: {Slight chiding}:: Why did you do such a thing? Such kindnesses will mean nothing, his path is set. Giving him what he has not earned is like pouring sand into his hands. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3004t.mp3: :: And would that be a kindness? What if by surviving another day, he brings a greater darkness upon another? ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3005t.mp3: :: The Force binds all things. The slightest push, the smallest touch, sends echoes throughout life. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3006t.mp3: :: Even an act of kindness may have more severe repercussions than you know or can see. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3007t.mp3: :: By giving him something he has not earned, perhaps all you have helped him become is a target. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3008t.mp3: :: Seeing another elevated often brings the eyes of others who suffer. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3009t.mp3: {Gameplay Programmer: The beggar who was attacked crawls to his feet.}:: And perhaps in the end, all you have wrought is more pain. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3010t.mp3: :: And that is my lesson to you. Be careful of charity and kindness, lest you do more harm with open hands than with a clenched fist. ::
kreia_echo.301refugee3011t.mp3: :: Good.  Mind what I have said. Use your power, but in its proper place. ::
kreia_echo.605605kreia010.mp3: {Quietly, telepathically}Do you feel it? The wound on this world... it is centered here.
kreia_echo.605605kreia009.mp3: {To herself}If we succeed in gathering the Jedi, they will come to this place - and if those Jedi are slain, then all that remains of the Order shall be drawn here as well.
kreia_echo.605605kreia008.mp3: Perhaps. In the shadows of the galaxy.
kreia_echo.605605kreia005.mp3: {Resigned}We will know when the times comes.
kreia_echo.605605kreia006.mp3: And I hope our enemies do not.
kreia_echo.650krealone038.mp3: {The player is hearing this in his head, remembering it as he lies unconscious - it's like Kreia is speaking to someone else - the player is having an epiphany}:: Vrook was right to come here, though he did not recognize the connection until too late. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone039.mp3: :: All life is connected by the Force. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone040.mp3: :: You have felt it in your companions, your choices affecting theirs, their actions mirroring yours. Imagine such incidents, spreading outwards.  ::
kreia_echo.650krealone041.mp3: :: From the smallest of actions, the smallest of cruelties and kindnesses, great tragedies are made. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone042.mp3: :: You have felt it in your companions, your choices affecting theirs, their actions mirroring yours. Imagine such incidents, spreading outwards. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone043.mp3: :: From the smallest of actions, the smallest of cruelties and kindnesses, great tragedies are made. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone044.mp3: :: The wounds inside people, the wounds suffered by planets... both cause echoes, heard and felt through the Force. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone045.mp3: :: And these echoes build, and all that can hear them shall become deafened... or die. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone046.mp3: :: Choose the right moment, create the right echo, and then all shall be destroyed. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone047.mp3: :: And there are those that feed on such deaths. And when no life is left, they shall consume themselves. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone048.mp3: :: You have taught them to bond with others, and then feed on others through that bond. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone049.mp3: :: What you have brought is the death of all who can feel the Force. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone050.mp3: :: It is your gift to the galaxy, exile. ::
kreia_echo.650krealone051.mp3: :: And unless you hear it and silence the echo you have caused, then every living thing, everywhere, that is touched by the Force... will die. ::
kreia_echo.701kreia_ac012.mp3: You can expect more than these beasts within the Academy. Be prepared.
kreia_echo.701kreia_cv012.mp3: There is {emphasize "great power"}great power and dark energy within this cave.
kreia_echo.701kreia_cv014.mp3: You are not yet strong enough to face what lies within this cave. We should return here when you are more powerful.
kreia_echo.701kreia_cv013.mp3: I would advise you to finish your explorations within the Academy before venturing into the cave.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr039.mp3: {urgent, upset}Fool! You've disturbed the spirits of this place, and they have sent their guardians!
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr044.mp3: {offended}Hmph! Hssiss are enough to humble even an arrogant one such as you. Test yourself if you must, but try not to die.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr040.mp3: Hssiss are semi-intelligent beasts, corrupted and strengthened by prolonged exposure to the dark side.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr041.mp3: As creatures of the Force, they have a limited ability to mask their presence.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr042.mp3: Hssiss are drawn to suffering and carnage. They must have fed on all the corpses left over from the war here on Korriban.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr043.mp3: The angry phantoms of the Sith, too weak to influence the sentient, have taken these Hssiss as thralls to their will.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr037.mp3: The broken corpses before you are all that remain of the Sith on Korriban.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr038.mp3: I doubt there is much to be gained from looting these bodies. It would be best to leave them be.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr034.mp3: Here you can just barely see the Sith archeologists' efforts to uncover relics of the ancients.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr035.mp3: {Slight disgust}The new Sith order sought to progress quickly by finding objects of power. I can only imagine what was lost forever due to the carelessness of these excavators.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr036.mp3: Now the excavation has been almost completely undone by five years of wind and sand. So does Korriban protect its secrets.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr029.mp3: This was the tomb of Tulak Hord, known as the greatest lightsaber duelist of the Sith Lords.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr030.mp3: His skill was considered remarkable even in his time, when many true lightsaber masters lived.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr032.mp3: That is unknown. But supposedly he created a holocron to teach his technique to other Sith. The holocron would have been laid to rest in his tomb.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr033.mp3: Unfortunately, Tulak Hord's tomb was among the first penetrated by the graverobbers of the new Sith order. If the holocron has survived, I doubt anyone living would know its location.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr031.mp3: {chuckles}If you were to face an ancient Sith Lord in combat, you would learn that we are as children playing with toys compared to the prowess of the old Masters.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr025.mp3: Ahead lies the Tomb of Naga Sadow, successor to Marka Ragnos, and the Sith Lord responsible for nearly conquering the Republic in the Great Hyperspace War a millennia ago.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr026.mp3: More recently, this tomb was where Revan confronted Uthar Wynn, the leader of the Sith Academy.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr027.mp3: When Revan left Korriban, the Sith Academy was thrown into turmoil - with their leader gone, many fought for the right to rule.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr028.mp3: And so the Sith here turned on each other, resulting in the carnage you can see covering the surface of this valley.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr012.mp3: This way leads to the Tomb of Ajunta Pall, a fierce Sith Lord. According to legend, the blade proved more fearsome than the Master, leading to his demise.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr013.mp3: Ajunta's dark specter lived on through the centuries, until Revan entered the Sith Lord's tomb in search of the blade.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr021.mp3: Revan calmed the angry ghost of Ajunta Pall and showed him the path back to the light.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr022.mp3: {A little distasteful}One who has fallen so far, and done so much evil does not deserve redemption. In a way, such a turning from one's nature is cowardly, a betrayal of the self.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr024.mp3: Yes, redemption is merely a form of spiritual collapse, a fall few recover from.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr023.mp3: {Even}Perhaps. But redemption is a form of spiritual collapse, a fall few recover from.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr017.mp3: Revan sent Ajunta Pall's spirit into oblivion and claimed the blade for herself.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr020.mp3: Unknown. Some have suggested that the blade led Revan to his demise, as it did Ajunta Pall.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr018.mp3: Unknown. Some have suggested that the blade led Revan to her demise, as it did Ajunta Pall.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr019.mp3: {Quiet at the end, a little sad}That is only speculation, however. Where Revan wanders now... is knowledge that only Revan holds.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr014.mp3: Revan sent Ajunta Pall's spirit into oblivion and claimed the blade for himself.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr015.mp3: Unknown. Some have suggested that the blade led to Revan's demise, as it did Ajunta Pall.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr016.mp3: {Quiet at the end, a little sad}That is only speculation, however. Where Revan wanders now... is knowledge that only Revan holds.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr004.mp3: {barely detectable awe}Before you is the tomb of the great Sith Lord Marka Ragnos, a half-breed who possessed tremendous strength, both physically and in the Force.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr011.mp3: {insulted}Ah, the arrogance and ignorance of youth. There will come a day when you'll wish you'd learned from mistakes in the past.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr005.mp3: Ragnos held power for over a century, using his cunning to turn his enemies against each other. His death left a great vacuum of power.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr006.mp3: We're standing close to the spot where Naga Sadow first confronted Ludo Kressh to vie for domination of the Sith.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr007.mp3: Their struggle nearly resulted in a civil war that would have torn the Sith apart before they ever threatened the Republic.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr008.mp3: {Quiet}Yes. It is the way of the Sith. They must continually test their strength against each other... even if it means destroying themselves.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr009.mp3: As fate would have it, a pair of hyperspace explorers from Cinnagar landed on Korriban. Naga Sadow manipulated the Sith into believing they were a sign of impending Republic invasion.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr010.mp3: This fear resonated with many Sith who were discontent with the lack of expansion of the Sith Empire during the reign of Marka Ragnos. Thus Naga Sadow became Ragnos' successor.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr001.mp3: The structures you see around you are the plundered tombs of the ancient Sith Lords.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr002.mp3: Each tomb was once infused with the history and heritage of the old Sith Empire, containing great mysteries and powerful relics of the Force.
kreia_echo.701kreia_kr003.mp3: {Angry at end}However, even the many traps could not long hold back the curious, the fools, and the weak. And so these tombs fell, spilling their secrets into the hands of those unable to comprehend or preserve them.
kreia_echo.710sec_tomb018.mp3: {condescending}As I told you before, you do not have the strength to enter this place - yet. You should return here later, when your power has grown.
kreia_echo.710sec_tomb003.mp3: I believe you are strong enough to explore the tomb ahead.
kreia_echo.710sec_tomb005.mp3: {Alternate dialogue, may be cut}This tomb has not been plundered. Its mysteries may still be intact! But so might its traps. Take great caution!
kreia_echo.710sec_tomb004.mp3: You will have to face the challenges of this tomb alone. Are you ready?
kreia_echo.710sec_tomb002.mp3: Are you ready to enter the tomb?
kreia_echo.710sec_tomb001.mp3: The power I felt coming through the cave is just ahead.
kreia_echo.907kreiaend002.mp3: There are dark places in the galaxy where few tread. Ancient centers of learning, of knowledge...
kreia_echo.907kreiaend003.mp3: But I did not walk alone. To be united by hatred is a fragile alliance at best.
kreia_echo.907kreiaend005.mp3: But my will was not law. There were disagreements, ambition.
kreia_echo.907kreiaend009.mp3: There are techniques within the Force against which there is no defense.
kreia_echo.907kreiaend015.mp3: {Alternate}I did not wish to kill you, so they cast me down. Stripped me of my power. Exiled me.
kreia_echo.907kreiaend011.mp3: I was cast down. Stripped of my power. Exiled.
kreia_echo.gblkreia454.mp3: Imagine the waters of the Room of a Thousand Fountains, each stream suddenly falling silent and still.
kreia_echo.gblkreia455.mp3: Imagine the ice of Telos, cold and smooth, as it gathers upon the plateau.
kreia_echo.gblkreia456.mp3: Now stretch out, feel the ship around you.
kreia_echo.gblkreia457.mp3: Strip away the metal, and see the souls and minds of those that fill its corridors, with more thoughts and dreams and worries than can fill the space of this ship.
kreia_echo.gblkreia960.mp3: {Try to blend them all together, and faintly, in the background, start adding the echo, faint.}
kreia_echo.gblkreia468.mp3: Not now. Focus on my voice.
kreia_echo.gblkreia470.mp3: Now do you hear me? Truly hear me.
kreia_echo.gblkreia471.mp3: You have taken the first steps on a much longer road, exile.
kreia_echo.gblkreia163.mp3: {Slight soothing, almost hypnotic}Listen to my words. Hear the sound of the Handmaiden's training in the cargo hold, her hands cutting the air.
kreia_echo.gblkreia164.mp3: The welding of the droid as it goes about its work.
kreia_echo.gblkreia167.mp3: Hear the rumble of hyperspace, the hum of the hyperdrive.
kreia_echo.gblkreia169.mp3: The breathing of the blinded one as she meditates in the dark.
kreia_echo.gblkreia170.mp3: {Soft, seductive}Now listen deeper. Past her breathing, and listen.
kreia_echo.gblkreia168.mp3: Ignore distractions, and focus on my voice.
kreia_echo.301kreiatch015.mp3: :: Your thoughts are disturbed... I can feel them from a great distance, like a shiver running through you. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch001.mp3: :: Your thoughts are disturbed. I can feel them, like a shiver running through you. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch002.mp3: :: It is Nar Shaddaa, the true Nar Shaddaa, that you feel around you. It is this moon, with the metal and machines stripped away and the currents of the Force laid bare. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch003.mp3: :: I am surprised you can feel it. I feared the damage to you had deadened you to such perceptions.. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch004.mp3: :: What you feel is the echo of the minds of these creatures within the Force. Their anger... their greed... their desperation. It is life. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch014.mp3: {Rueful, slightly miffed at player's short-sightedness, then conciliatory at end}:: One might as well move the universe... but such manipulation is possible, yes. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch013.mp3: {Chiding, almost downplaying the desperation around her}:: Strange? Perhaps, perhaps not. It is but is the vibration of minds driven by life's struggles - the struggle to feed, to take, to mate... to fight. It is the way of things. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch005.mp3: {Rueful, a little miffed at player for being naive, then conciliatory at end}:: One might as well heal the universe... but such manipulation is possible, yes. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch006.mp3: :: It requires that one be able to feel the critical point within the fractured mass... and know how to strike it in such a way that the echoes travel to your intended destination. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch012.mp3: :: For as long as it lasts. Like life, such waking moments within the Force are rare, waiting for the right moment when the critical point is struck, and the sound rises.... ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch011.mp3: {Irritated}:: Not in the sense you understand it - the ability to fool the minds of others, to dominate them on a massive scale that you speak of is not achieved best through raw power. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch007.mp3: {Irritated}:: Have you learned nothing? Healing is manipulation, and if you do not realize it yet, then you will discover that an act of healing depends largely on your perspective. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch008.mp3: {Softly, this is Kreia's core belief}:: Manipulation is done through propelling events... or selected ones... into motion. It is done through teaching, through example, and through conviction. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch009.mp3: :: And the greatest of victories are not manipulations at all, but simply awakening others... to the truth of what you believe. Of hearing it echoed around you, in life. ::
kreia_echo.301kreiatch010.mp3: {Sighs, wants player to enjoy this moment like a summer day}:: But let us be silent... words and thoughts are distractions. Feel this moment, for as long as it will last. Feel life, as it is, with the crude matter stripped away. ::
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr027.mp3: {impressed}The crystal responds to you! This is very rare indeed!
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr032.mp3: {incredulous}You scoff at this gift, but many Jedi would greatly covet such a treasure.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr033.mp3: No. The crystal has bonded to you. Another Jedi would have little use for it.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr028.mp3: The crystal's bond with you is such that the stronger you become in the Force, the more powerful your crystal will grow
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr029.mp3: This crystal will make an excellent focus for a lightsaber.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr030.mp3: Quite the contrary. Picture yourself as a sieve, and the Force as water pouring into you. This crystal draws from the excess water that escapes the sieve.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr031.mp3: The crystal is in tune with you. It will use whatever water that pours through you, be it dark or light.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr019.mp3: Force Sensitive locations such as this absorb and reflect Force energy. The crystals are the catalyst here.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr020.mp3: I sense that Revan once passed through here, leaving a strong impression behind in the crystals.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr021.mp3: Perhaps future Jedi who visit this cave will feel our presence, as if seeing our footprints preserved in the soil.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr024.mp3: That can hardly be avoided. Even mundane actions of the basest creatures can create detectable ripples in the Force.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr025.mp3: A mynock beating its wings on the plains could cause a sandstorm in the desert. And figuratively speaking, Jedi have much bigger wings.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr026.mp3: {scoffing, a little condescending}That would create quite a large impression of yourself, and the crystals would eventually grow back.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr023.mp3: {a little condescending, as if talking to someone ignorant}The crystals here do not drain Force energy from Jedi. They collect the excess energy that radiates from those attuned to the Force.
kreia_echo.604kreia_cr022.mp3: The crystals here are infused with the Force. Some could be harvested and used for lightsabers.

kreia.gbl000react084.mp3: {Impressed}Well executed - you have created an echo, something that will travel for some time. You are learning much.
kreia.gbl000react086.mp3: {Nods respectfully}Very well. I shall keep such thoughts to myself.

kreia.gblkreia037.mp3: {Irritated, lecturing, player just helped someone}To show such compassion weakens the giver - and the recipient.

kreia.gbl000react108.mp3: {Disgusted sigh}I grow weary of this. Perhaps time will allow my words to take root if your common sense will not permit it.

kreia.gbl000react090.mp3: It is the internal struggles, when fought and won on their own, that yield the strongest rewards. You stole that struggle from them, cheapened it.
kreia.gbl000react106.mp3: {Nods in approval}That is all I ask.
kreia.gbl000react104.mp3: {Disgusted}If you care for others, then dispense with pity and sacrifice and recognize the value in letting them fight their own battles.
kreia.gbl000react105.mp3: And when they triumph, they will be even stronger for the victory.
kreia.gbl000react103.mp3: Indeed? The currents of the galaxy, of nations, of peoples, may all stem from such small "kindnesses." Every small weakness, small fracture that you create weakens the whole.
kreia.gbl000react091.mp3: {Cold, furious, like the player just spat in her face}If you ever weakened yourself in such a way for me, I would rather suffer and die than have you demean yourself for me. That is not who you are, who you can become.
kreia.gbl000react095.mp3: {Disgusted}Then your allies are your weakness, and if they die, you die with them.
kreia.gbl000react096.mp3: {Pissed, lectuting}And because of that, where once the Sith had but one target, now there are many, and you frustrate my attempts to protect you.
kreia.gbl000react092.mp3: {Disgusted}Then you do not know yourself, and you will die a fool's death before you are ever tested.
kreia.gbl000react093.mp3: {Quiet, broken}Then you have failed, and when you break, it will be because another does.... and then the galaxy shall fall.
kreia.gbl000react050.mp3: {Irritated}Such displays are not the signs of true strength.
kreia.gbl000react001.mp3: Are psychotic urges all that drives you?
kreia.gbl000react024.mp3: Did you have any reason behind what you did? Or were you blinded by bloodlust?
kreia.gbl000react025.mp3: When one of us is committed to battle, then all of us are committed. We must stand together.

kreia.gbl000react010.mp3: I am not speaking to you, alien. Be silent!
kreia.gbl000react003.mp3: I am not speaking to you, fool. Be silent!
kreia.gbl000react004.mp3: I would examine the situation as a whole, all of its ties to the Force, and then decided which string to pull, not sever them all at once. Such crude methods grant you nothing.
kreia.gbl000react007.mp3: {Harsh}Perhaps...  and perhaps in the future, you will remember such a lesson. There are many paths in life, and some are short - and empty.
kreia.gbl000react006.mp3: {Disgusted sigh}I grow weary of this. Perhaps time will allow my words to take root if your common sense will not permit it.

kreia.gblhandmaiden084.mp3: {Speaking from experience about losing one's connection to the Force, reserved but sad - make it poetic, like speaking of a dead aunt}It is standing atop the summit of a great mountain, the winds tearing about you, then finding yourself buried alive - trapped, helpless, and alone.
kreia.gblhandmaiden085.mp3: {Speaking from experience about losing one's connection to the Force, reserved but sad - make it poetic, like speaking of a dead aunt}It is like having the energy of youth... then feeling the cloak of years fall upon you, and knowing you are weak, fragile, and a thing easily discarded.
kreia.gblhandmaiden086.mp3: {Speaking from experience about losing one's connection to the Force, reserved but sad - make it poetic, like speaking of a dead aunt}It is knowing what you want to say and never finding the words. It is a chorus, replaced with silence. Hearing teachings without meaning.

kreia.gblhandmaiden080.mp3: {Whispers, reverent, echoing the player and describing what the Force is like}It is like a cloud, a mist that drifts from living creature to creature, set in motion by currents and eddies.
kreia.gblhandmaiden081.mp3: It is the eye of the storm, the passions of all living things turned into energy, into a chorus.
kreia.gblhandmaiden082.mp3: {Finality, downnote}It is the rising swell at the end of life, the promise of new territories and new blood, the call of new mysteries in the dark.
kreia.gblhandmaiden050.mp3: {Matter of fact, then curious}Jedi holocrons. Yet warm to the touch, you said?
kreia.gblhandmaiden053.mp3: {Downplaying something important}Ah... of course they did. A simple misunderstanding, no doubt.

kreia.gblhandmaiden018.mp3: {Angry at presumption}To claim to know anything of Revan's choices or what lay in his heart when Malak fell is conceit, servant of Atris.
kreia.gblhandmaiden019.mp3: And whether Revan had any choice in the matter at all is something else you should consider. The Force is a powerful thing to wield... or deny.

kreia.003003atton082.mp3: {"Stopping" the enemy didn't occur to her}That... is not an easy question to answer. {Downnote, grave}This threat is greater than you know... and I do not believe it is a battle that can be fought.

kreia.003003atton087.mp3: {Pause, grim}Think carefully on your choice. If you choose to fight, if you choose war, it is a path few turn from once the first steps are taken.
kreia.003003atton088.mp3: It carries with it a terrible price. And in the end, you may find you have nothing left to sacrifice.

kreia.003003atton091.mp3: {Sighs, tired}But we have spoken long enough - and my wound pains me. If you have other questions, find me in the crew quarters... there, we will speak more.

kreia.003003atton071.mp3: {Sighs again, critical dramatic moment, quiet, serious, like a hammer falling}Because you are the last of the Jedi. Once you are dead, then they have won.

kreia.003003atton072.mp3: Whatever lies you tell yourself are of no consequence. The Sith believe you to be a Jedi Knight, and that is all that matters.

kreia.003003atton079.mp3: {Grave, reverent}And the Jedi Temple on Coruscant lies empty. The waters in the Room of a Thousand Fountains have fallen still, in reverence to the fallen Jedi... and those now lost.

kreia.003003atton060.mp3: {Sighs}Unknown to me, however, the Sith were already on board. Just as we made the jump to hyperspace, they fired upon us, nearly destroying the Ebon Hawk.

kreia.003003atton065.mp3: Be silent! We're having a conversation here.
kreia.003003atton062.mp3: True - but as one trained in the Force, you know that true coincidences are rare.

kreia.003attkreia048.mp3: {Sensing hesitation in Atton as they are about to leave}Any regrets, "Atton?"

kreia.003attkreia027.mp3: I did not realize there were more lies left in you. And to lie easily to such an ally... you are indeed worthy of contempt.

kreia.003attkreia025.mp3: I saw all of that, all that the Force is... and only when it was ripped from me did I truly see it.

kreia.003attkreia020.mp3: Shall I show you? That part of you that hungered to kill Jedi, that took pleasure from it?
kreia.003attkreia021.mp3: Or perhaps you will continue to listen to my counsel and I shall ignore your pathetic attempts at freedom.
kreia.003attkreia022.mp3: Now leave me, murderer. I have nothing further to say to one such as you.

kreia.701kor_int017.mp3: {Revan evil, female}After Malak and his army were defeated, instead of restoring order to Korriban, Revan suddenly departed, leaving both her destination and reasons for leaving a mystery.
kreia.701kor_int015.mp3: {Revan evil, male}After Malak and his army were defeated, instead of restoring order to Korriban, Revan suddenly departed, leaving both his destination and reasons for leaving a mystery.

kreia.003kredisc3019.mp3: You know what the choice is.

kreia.302hussef024.mp3: This may be an opportunity for us. If we can make life miserable enough for the refugees, they will capitulate. The Exchange will be a valuable ally to us.
kreia.302hussef030.mp3: You allow yourself to be enslaved by morality. You must learn to free yourself of these arbitrary limitations.
kreia.302hussef028.mp3: And you haven't already? You weaken yourself by pretending that morality is important to you. You must learn to recognize your true self.
kreia.302hussef029.mp3: {frustrated}It is a waste of time to reason with you.
kreia.302hussef027.mp3: Then you will come to realize its wisdom.
kreia.303lootra050.mp3: {[Current scrap node] }{Irritated, a little disgusted}And what sets you apart from the thugs that swarm on the carcass of this moon? Are psychotic urges all that drives you?
kreia.303lootra060.mp3: I am not speaking to you, slave of Atris. Be silent!
kreia.303lootra058.mp3: I am not speaking to you, alien. Be silent!
kreia.303lootra052.mp3: I am not speaking to you, fool. Be silent!
kreia.303lootra053.mp3: I would examine the situation as a whole, all of its ties to the Force, and then decided which string to pull, not sever them all at once. Such crude methods grant you nothing.
kreia.303lootra055.mp3: {Harsh}Perhaps... and perhaps in the future, you will remember such a lesson. There are many paths in life, and some are short - and empty.
kreia.303lootra054.mp3: {Harsh}Perhaps... but not from those who matter.
kreia.303lootra043.mp3: {Impressed}That was well executed - you used his own doubt to foster trust and reliance. Perhaps you are learning much in the flow of Nar Shaddaa.
kreia.303lootra045.mp3: Very well. I shall keep my thoughts to myself.
kreia.303lootra044.mp3: Do not mistake my tone. I was not faulting your choice. Far from it, I respect it - there are many who never learn such strength.
kreia.303lootra009.mp3: {Irritated, barely holding back anger}It would have been better had he found her on his own. By aiding him, you have only weakened him.
kreia.303lootra010.mp3: {Irritated}He was at a moment of crisis - a moment of indecision. It is those internal struggles, when they are fought and won, that yield the strongest rewards. You took that battle from him, cheapened it.
kreia.303lootra011.mp3: {Strong, then last sentence is dismissive, disgusted}If he truly loved her, truly, he would have entered the Refugee Sector on his own, damn the Exchange, damn everything in his path, and taken her. You have made their union easier, not better.
kreia.303lootra022.mp3: {Disgusted}If you care for them, then dispense with pity and sacrifice and recognize the value in letting them fight their own battles. And when they triumph, they will be even stronger for the victory.
kreia.303lootra012.mp3: {Cold, furious, like the player just spat in her face}If you ever weakened yourself in such a way for me, I would rather suffer and die than have you demean yourself for me. That is not who you are, who you can become.
kreia.303lootra013.mp3: {Disgusted}Then you do not know yourself, and you will die a fool's death before you are ever tested.
kreia.303lootra020.mp3: Then your allies are your weakness, and if they die, you die with them. And where once the Sith had but one target, now there are many, and you frustrate my attempts to protect you.
kreia.303lootra021.mp3: {Disgusted sigh}I grow weary of this. Perhaps time will allow my words to take root if your common sense will not permit it.
kreia.303lootra015.mp3: {Disgusted}Then you have failed, and when you break, it will be because another does, and then the galaxy shall fall.
kreia.303lootra014.mp3: {Disgusted}If you care for them, then dispense with pity and sacrifice and recognize the value in letting them fight their own battles. And when they triumph, they will be even stronger for the victory.

kreia.351351hub009.mp3: This looks to be a control center of some sort.
kreia.401reunion021.mp3: {Serious, party pooper}We should return to the Ebon Hawk now and plot our next course of action.
kreia.402beast_co001.mp3: A moment - that beast there. Do you see it?
kreia.402beast_co002.mp3: The Force flows even through these simple creatures. If you empty your mind you may be able to feel its thoughts.
kreia.402beast_co003.mp3: They aren't fully formed. Basic instincts, primal urges, every breath dominated by the needs of the moment.
kreia.402beast_co005.mp3: Good. Beasts can be easier to affect than other sentients. But you must bridge the gap between what distinguishes us and them.
kreia.402beast_co006.mp3: You feel its thoughts, yes? Like a low rumble before the storm. Use the Force to create a barrier around it - carefully and slowly.
kreia.402beast_co007.mp3: [Failure] You came close, and you have the potential. With practice you can make any animal passive and pliable.
kreia.402beast_co008.mp3: But the cage around their perceptions is a fragile thing. Many things can break its hold. Violence, especially.
kreia.402beast_co011.mp3: You may thank me by using what you have learned. Let us go.
kreia.402beast_co009.mp3: With the Force, anything is possible. But that is the end of the lesson for now.
kreia.402beast_co023.mp3: [You have gained the power Beast Trick.]
kreia.402beast_co004.mp3: The Force is strong in such creatures... but their minds are weak, prey for those able to hear their thoughts - and influence them.
kreia.402mand_bod001.mp3: Stop. That is not the skeletal remnant of a war long past. That is a recent kill.
kreia.402mand_bod002.mp3: It appears that Dxun isn't as abandoned as we would be led to believe.
kreia.402mand_bod006.mp3: A few days - a standard week, at most. The jungle has not left its mark on his armor yet. You probably have more questions.
kreia.402mand_bod005.mp3: The past has a curious attraction to us all. Perhaps he came in a small shuttle to revisit old battlegrounds. Perhaps not.
kreia.402mand_bod003.mp3: I cannot say for certain. What I do know is our path came here for a reason.
kreia.402mand_bod004.mp3: But let us press forward. You may find the answers you seek.

kreia.403kelborn015.mp3: You underestimate the Force, Mandalorian. I sense that we may still get to Master Kavar in time.
kreia.403kelborn016.mp3: I sense there is something... stirring on the moon itself. Tell me, have your sensors picked up anything from Dxun?
kreia.403kelborn021.mp3: Those transmissions are the enemy. They are linked to the fate of Onderon. They must be stopped.
kreia.403kelborn022.mp3: Otherwise the Mandalorian is right - Master Kavar and Queen Talia won't survive this day.
kreia.403kelborn024.mp3: And this is why a common soldier will never triumph against a Jedi. Your military 'tactics' are nothing compared to the Force.

kreia.403kelborn026.mp3: {She is surprised the PC senses this}You... you are correct.

kreia.403kelborn078.mp3: Now, are you certain of you choices?

kreia.403mand_cs1013.mp3: {Raises an eyebrow}Indeed? The future is always in motion, it is a difficult thing to see.
kreia.403mand_cs1014.mp3: {Critical speech, she's trying to manipulate Canderous to serve the player, but this is what she's seen in the future}Perhaps there will be no new age, Mandalore, no great Mandalorian crusade. kreia.403mand_cs1026.mp3: {Sharp}Show the same loyalty you have shown in the past, Mandalore. If there is a Mandalorian crusade, let it be for something that will carry your people's memory into the future, so when there are no more Mandalorians, at least their honor will remain.
kreia.403mand_cs1027.mp3: {Walking out of the hangar, lets the words hang in the air}The one I travel with has walked your same path - and I ask that when the end comes, that you remember that kinship, even if it seems there is nothing else left.
kreia.403mand_cs1024.mp3: I know many things, and I can answer the question that burns within your shell, Mandalore. But there is a price - you must keep the one I travel with safe. He is important to me - more important than anything.
kreia.403mand_cs1021.mp3: Do you wonder where he wanders now, Mandalore? Why he betrayed you at the end, cast you down, left you broken, at the edge of the galaxy?
kreia.403mand_cs1020.mp3: Do you wonder where she wanders now, Mandalore? Why she gave you your orders, then abandoned you at the edge of the galaxy?
kreia.403mand_cs1019.mp3: Do you wonder where she wanders now, Mandalore? Why she cast you down, left you broken, at the edge of the galaxy?
kreia.403mand_cs1017.mp3: {Quietly, concerned only about the player}No, Mandalore, you are wrong. I hope that it is you who will keep the one I travel with safe. You are loyal, and you have served many Masters... even following them into darkness.

kreia.403mand_cs1008.mp3: If by 'apart' you mean scattered, broken, and lost, then yes - you are correct.

kreia.403sith_att005.mp3: I did not expect them so soon - how did they get here, I wonder? Regardless, we must eliminate them all.

kreia.403sith_att007.mp3: Let us join the battle. Our "allies" will need our help.
kreia.411cnpc_do030.mp3: {She isn't as polite as she normally is - she's only nice to the PC, who isn't even with this group}We must quickly get through that door. There are Sith behind it, and they are using the energy of this place to their own twisted ends.
kreia.411cnpc_do031.mp3: For what, I cannot say. But you shouldn't waste any more time.
kreia.411cnpc_dse024.mp3: Freedon Nadd's power appears to have be underestimated. His legacy lives still, within the very stones of his resting place.
kreia.411cnpc_dse025.mp3: Anyone attuned to the dark side will have a tremendous advantage here. Proceed cautiously.
kreia.411xarga010.mp3: The soldier is correct. The dark side is strong here... and it will grant its strength to the Sith.
kreia.501beastrdr025.mp3: Beasts can be... sensitive to the currents within cities and people. When such things are disturbed, the beasts may echo it.
kreia.501cp_guard013.mp3: Minds are often weakened when forced to follow familiar patterns... but sometimes those patterns work against you when backed by loyalty or duty. Use your power carefully.
kreia.501cp_guard032.mp3: The Force is powerful, but overestimating its utility is dangerous.
kreia.501cp_guard030.mp3: A debatable point, but what is done is done.
kreia.502bostuco006.mp3: Loyalty can prove an effective wall to your talents. But there may be a way to undermine it... if one looks for it.
kreia.502mp_anda055.mp3: Whatever course you wish to take, aiding this woman may be useful. We may gain Vaklu's favor or learn more of his plans.

kreia.502mp_anda057.mp3: Holding vendettas is a weakness. An open mind can unlock many doors.

kreia.503kavar018.mp3: For the sake of subtlety, I suggest we avoid using grenades, and any other weapons that may injure civilians in this battle.

kreia.506vaklu012.mp3: He is too dangerous to leave alive. As distasteful as it is, it might be best to silence him forever. Until he's dead, all of Onderon is in peril.

kreia.605605kreia001.mp3: {Quietly, she walks up to the Enclave}Do you feel it? The wound on this world... it is centered here.
kreia.605605kreia002.mp3: {To herself}If we succeed in gathering the Jedi, they will come to this place - and if those Jedi are slain, then all that remains of the Order shall be drawn here as well.

kreia.605605kreia004.mp3: And I hope our enemies do not.

kreia.650650jedi037.mp3: {Quietly to herself}At last, you could hear.
kreia.650650jedi060.mp3: {Quietly to herself, finishing the sequence, bringing it to a downnote}And at last, you saw the truth.
kreia.650650jedi041.mp3: {Quietly to herself}And at last, you saw.

kreia.650650jedi134.mp3: {:: She blasts her hands outwards, and Jedi Council members are hurled back, the player collapses, one Jedi councilor stands with him. ::}
kreia.650650jedi135.mp3: {:: She advances on Vrook, her hands outstretched for combat. ::}
kreia.650650jedi173.mp3: {Challenging, hissing, as if against bullies picking on her son}Step away from her.
kreia.650650jedi171.mp3: {Hissing at Jedi}She has brought truth, and you condemn it? The arrogance!
kreia.650650jedi172.mp3: You will not harm her. You will not harm her ever again.
kreia.650650jedi140.mp3: You will not harm him. You will not harm him ever again.
kreia.650650jedi185.mp3: {Pronouncing sentence}As you would pass judgment on her, I have come to pass judgment on you all.
kreia.650650jedi166.mp3: Did you not hear its call on Dantooine, Vrook, on its scarred surface and in the minds of the settlers?
kreia.650650jedi167.mp3: I have endured your corruption of my other students - you shall not have this one.
kreia.650650jedi168.mp3: And you, Kavar, so close to the call of Dxun, tell me. Did you not feel what poured from the moon, what had taken place there?
kreia.650650jedi169.mp3: {Chiding, contemptuous}And Zez-Kai Ell, to hide upon Nar Shaddaa, yet blind yourself to all that happens there. So close to understanding the Force... so close to giving it up.
kreia.650650jedi900.mp3: See it through the eyes of the exile, as I have. Endure what he has endured, and perhaps there is the faintest hope that you will hear what he has heard.
kreia.650650jedi165.mp3: See it through the eyes of the exile, as I have. Endure what he has endured, and perhaps there is the faintest hope that you will hear what he has heard.
kreia.650650jedi149.mp3: See it through the eyes of the exile.
kreia.650650jedi150.mp3: {Disparaging}How could you ever hope to know the threat you face, when you have never walked in the dark places of the galaxy - faced war and death on such a scale.
kreia.650650jedi151.mp3: If you had traveled far enough, rather than waiting for the echo to reach you, perhaps you would have seen it for what it was.
kreia.650650jedi162.mp3: There are places in the galaxy where the dark side of the Force runs strong. Such places are born of war, of death - of suffering.
kreia.650650jedi163.mp3: And if unchecked, their power grows, scream building upon scream, until any who can hear succumb to it - or die.
kreia.650650jedi164.mp3: It breaks the spirit beneath it - as all wars do.
kreia.650650jedi152.mp3: There is a place in the galaxy where the dark side of the Force runs strong. It is something of the Sith, but it was fueled by war.
kreia.650650jedi153.mp3: It corrupts all that walks on its surface, drowns them in the power of the dark side - it corrupts all life. And it feeds on death.
kreia.650650jedi154.mp3: Revan knew the power of such places... and the power in making them. They can be used to break the will of others... of Jedi, promising them power, and turning them to the dark side.
kreia.650650jedi155.mp3: Did you never wonder how Revan corrupted so many of the Jedi, so much of the Republic, so quickly?
kreia.650650jedi156.mp3: The Mandalorian Wars were a series of massacres that masked another war, a war of conversion.
kreia.650650jedi157.mp3: Culminating a final atrocity that no Jedi could walk away from... save one.
kreia.650650jedi158.mp3: And that is what I sought to understand. How one could turn away from such power, give up the Force... and still live.
kreia.650650jedi159.mp3: But I see what happened now.
kreia.650650jedi160.mp3: It is because you were afraid.
kreia.650650jedi161.mp3: It is because you had no choice.
kreia.650650kreia001.mp3: {Looks around at the majesty of the restored courtyard, steps forward a few steps, looking up at the ivy-covered walls}It... it is different, it has been some time.
kreia.650650kreia010.mp3: {Looks around at the majesty of the restored courtyard, steps forward a few steps, looking up at the ivy-covered walls}It has been some time.
kreia.650650kreia011.mp3: {Quiet, show her age}The years have not been kind to us both, it seems.
kreia.650650kreia012.mp3: But perhaps now, they will see the truth at last.
kreia.650650kreia002.mp3: {Quiet, show her age}Forgive me, but I need to rest. Go on... the Council awaits. I will remain here.
kreia.650650kreia003.mp3: {Quiet}Yes, afraid for you. As I always have been.
kreia.650650kreia004.mp3: I will be fine here... whatever answers the Council have are for you alone.
kreia.650650kreia005.mp3: {Quiet, show her age}I am... tired. The journey has been a long one, and I need to center myself.
kreia.650650kreia013.mp3: {[Gameplay Programmer: As the player walks out the archway. Kreia speaks again, without looking at the player, and the player stops and turns.]}
kreia.650650kreia006.mp3: {Kreia speaks, quietly, looking at the ground}Know that much may happen here, but above all, do not forget this - you may trust in me. We cradle each other's lives, and what threatens one of us, threatens us both.
kreia.650650kreia007.mp3: {Her head turns to the player}And if you find you cannot trust me, trust in your training. Trust in yourself.
kreia.650650kreia008.mp3: Never doubt what you have done. All your decisions have brought you to this point.
kreia.650650kreia009.mp3: And now, perhaps, they shall see what you have become.
kreia.650krealone160.mp3: {[GP: Kreia enters the room after all the Jedi Masters are dead. The player is sitting in the middle of the corpses.]}
kreia.650krealone152.mp3: {Quietly}And so here lies all that remain of the Jedi.
kreia.650krealone153.mp3: It is a powerful thing you have achieved here... you have brought death again to Dantooine.
kreia.650krealone154.mp3: {[GP: Player walks into the council chamber, looks around - the emptiness should be evident. The player has slain all the Jedi Masters, and now none remain.]}
kreia.650krealone155.mp3: {[GP: Switch to a shot of the player from the front, but behind him, Kreia enters the chambers, slowly. Note that from this point on, a critical speech occurs - Kreia, silently, deadly lays out everything to the player, first in her teacher voice, then she slaps him down viciously toward the end - she's trying to provoke him to action.]}
kreia.650krealone073.mp3: This is all that is left. An empty chamber... and an echo of what once was.
kreia.650krealone074.mp3: But this moment is all that really matters. It was never my wish that you find the Masters... only find yourself.
kreia.650krealone075.mp3: I have done what I can to keep you from the Jedi... and the Sith... but a critical moment approaches. And what you have done is not enough.
kreia.650krealone149.mp3: Your entire journey has brought you to this place. But for every step you have taken, the destination may have been hard to see.
kreia.650krealone150.mp3: But there is much we must discuss. Concerning you, and your allies.
kreia.650krealone151.mp3: Our journey has taught me much.
kreia.650krealone076.mp3: Master Vrook, despite his faults, was right to come here. I had thought he might have recognized Dantooine for what it was, what had been done there.
kreia.650krealone077.mp3: {Quietly, knowingly}You are tied to places such as these, you know.
kreia.650krealone148.mp3: The record of your trial hints at such things - it tells of ignorance.
kreia.650krealone146.mp3: Yes - you have listened well in our journeys. Not all the Jedi Masters could see such connections as deeply as they should.
kreia.650krealone147.mp3: Master Vrook was unwilling to admit that the echo of Dantooine he felt was inside you as well.
kreia.650krealone078.mp3: Yes, but Master Vrook was unwilling to see what other Masters may have seen, that the echo of Dantooine he felt was inside you as well.
kreia.650krealone079.mp3: They admitted it as much in the Council chamber after your trial, though they did not understand what it meant at first.
kreia.650krealone080.mp3: They assumed it was a threat that they felt. From one perspective, they were correct.
kreia.650krealone081.mp3: As much as you can form connections to others, such connections exist on a galactic scale as well.
kreia.650krealone082.mp3: That echo he described is not solely tied to Dantooine - other planets that have suffered such destruction cast echoes as well.
kreia.650krealone145.mp3: Yes... Telos is another such world. One of many in an increasingly long chain.
kreia.650krealone144.mp3: {Nods}Kavar was wasted as a soldier. He was correct.
kreia.650krealone083.mp3: Yes... Telos is another such world. One of many in an increasingly long chain.
kreia.650krealone084.mp3: Ah, and now the question - do you believe it?
kreia.650krealone143.mp3: Very well. When you accept the two are tied, then the final lessons can begin.
kreia.650krealone142.mp3: {Snaps}Because I need to see if I have wasted my time with you. Answer me.
kreia.650krealone085.mp3: You commit to nothing? Very well.
kreia.650krealone086.mp3: Only when you accept the two are tied, you to these dead planets, can the lesson begin - but if you will not believe me, perhaps you will at least listen.
kreia.650krealone087.mp3: {Going into full teacher mode}Let us start with the most basic principle of the Force - it connects all life.
kreia.650krealone088.mp3: {Dismissive at last sentence}It is possible to hurt or sever those connections - to create places in the Force where it is difficult to center oneself. But that is the crudest form of manipulation.
kreia.650krealone089.mp3: It is possible to affect those connections in other ways, by the slightest action, a seemingly minor choice, a small cruelty.

kreia.650krealone091.mp3: Such minor acts can eventually change the behavior of another, to influence them. Those who travel with you, for example.
kreia.650krealone092.mp3: Surely you have noticed it in your companions - your actions influence theirs. It may seem a minor thing, but it is not. It is the power upon which empires can be made.
kreia.650krealone093.mp3: Even the smallest of acts, the smallest of echoes can have profound repercussions. The talent comes in recognizing them and knowing how to manipulate them.

kreia.650krealone103.mp3: {Slight building, the dramatic realization is coming in the next 3 lines}If they occur at the same time, or at the right time, these screams will build upon each other, until it is the only sound you can hear.
kreia.650krealone104.mp3: {Slight building}And the deaths of many will cause the screams to build, until their pain becomes yours and you die as well.

kreia.003003kreia101.mp3: {Reprimanding}You asked what had happened, and I am telling you - the past sent echoes into the future, and what seemed a victory for the Republic was far from it.

kreia.003003kreia071.mp3: {Chiding the uninformed public}Many believed the Mandalorians defeated at Malachor V. But the Mandalorians taught the Jedi much through battle.

kreia.003003kreia078.mp3: As all Sith do, without a strong enemy, the Sith turned on each other. Revan escaped the Jedi and returned to finish Malak... and that was the end of the Jedi Civil War.

kreia.003003kreia079.mp3: No one knows... certainly not I. Korriban lies in ruins, Revan is gone, and the blade of war she promised to stab into the heart of the galaxy has withdrawn.
kreia.003003kreia080.mp3: {Sighs, faint wistfulness, like for a lost son}Where Revan wanders now, I do not know.
kreia.003003kreia081.mp3: {Laughs ruefully.}It would seem that way... from a certain point of view, perhaps.
kreia.003003kreia082.mp3: The Jedi Civil War left wounds that have yet to heal... we shall see if the Republic has the strength to survive.
kreia.003003kreia093.mp3: {Kreia stumbles a little in the middle, because she's been researching the war forever}Perhaps. It is sometimes... difficult to find truth in the Jedi Civil War.
kreia.003003kreia094.mp3: Was it the Republic that defeated Malak, or was it Revan? If it was Revan, then the Republic was never truly tested.
kreia.003003kreia083.mp3: {Serious}A culture's teachings, and most importantly, the nature of its people, achieve definition in conflict. They find themselves... or find themselves lacking.
kreia.003003kreia084.mp3: {Disgusted}Too long did the Republic remain unchallenged. It is a stagnant beast that labors for breath... and has for centuries.
kreia.003003kreia085.mp3: The Jedi Order was the heart that sustained its sickness - now the Jedi are lost, we shall see how long the Republic can survive.
kreia.003003kreia086.mp3: We shall see. The Jedi Civil War cost the Republic much - the resources of the Sith seemed limitless. The Republic's was not.
kreia.003003kreia087.mp3: Fleets of warships, soldiers and people were lost. Entire planets were decimated - their inhabitants dead... or refugees. It is a great burden for any civilization to bear.
kreia.003003kreia088.mp3: {Ominous, "quiet" is important}And this new threat... it is a quiet thing, unlike the Jedi Civil War. It drives at something deeper than the strength of the Republic. It is aimed at you.
kreia.003003kreia089.mp3: {Critical moment}The Republic was never what was important - ever. It was but a shell that surrounds the Jedi - just as the teachings of the Jedi are a shell surrounding the heart of man.
kreia.003003kreia090.mp3: {Critical moment, possible trailer speech}You see, the war, the true war, has never been one waged by droids, or warships, or soldiers. They are but crude matter, obstacles against which we test ourselves.
kreia.003003kreia091.mp3: The true war is waged in the hearts of all living things, against our own natures, light or dark. That is what shapes and binds this galaxy, not these creations of man.
kreia.003003kreia092.mp3: {Critical moment, possible trailer speech}You are the battleground. {Downnote, deadly serious, like Galadriel to Frodo in Fellowship}And if you fall, the death of the Republic will be such a quiet thing, a whisper, that shall herald the darkness to come.
kreia.003003kreia042.mp3: {Cautious}Indeed? And was it the same as before?
kreia.003003kreia043.mp3: If my suspicions are correct, perhaps the damage the Jedi Council did was not as permanent as they thought. It is not an easy thing, to cut one off from the Force.
kreia.003003kreia044.mp3: {Challenging}What did you believe? That you suddenly lost your connection with the Force without reason?
kreia.003003kreia045.mp3: Indeed it is. It is much like losing one's ability to listen, or being put into a deep sleep, unable to awaken to the galaxy around you.
kreia.003003kreia046.mp3: Such a thing has been done before, when Jedi have pronounced sentence on their own... and exiled them, as they did you.
kreia.003003kreia047.mp3: {Seriously Curious}If not the Jedi, then what did you think was the cause of such a loss?
kreia.003003kreia048.mp3: War leaves many scars, but rarely does it blind one to the Force. If anything, conflict and challenge may make the connection stronger, more intense.
kreia.003003kreia049.mp3: No matter what horrors you experienced in the war, no matter who you served, it is unlikely that the Force would be lost to you unless another factor was involved.
kreia.003003kreia050.mp3: {Pause, thinks - Here's the hook, she's playing it close to the chest, quiet}It is possible that such a thing can be undone.
kreia.003003kreia051.mp3: {Sighs}Still... even so, the chances of the Jedi undoing such a thing for a traitor... is a slim thing at best, assuming they yet live.
kreia.003003kreia052.mp3: Our link... may have had other consequences. Perhaps you can hear the Force again... distantly, through me. If so, then there is hope.
kreia.003003kreia053.mp3: {Reluctant to take on a student again}I may be able to teach you, train you to feel the Force again.
kreia.003003kreia054.mp3: And if you will not allow me to help you, then other Jedi must train you... or undo the damage they have done.
kreia.003003kreia061.mp3: Life never ceases to teach, fallen Jedi... it is only when one ceases to listen that we grow still... and die.
kreia.003003kreia056.mp3: I fear there may be no other choice. The threat we face is grave... if you cannot defend yourself, then we have already lost.
kreia.003003kreia057.mp3: {Slight inspiration}I offer to train you to become strong again, to know the ways of the Force, and to hear the Force sing within you as it once did.
kreia.003003kreia060.mp3: Very well. The choice is yours... when we travel, simply leave me behind, and you shall be saved from my counsel.
kreia.003003kreia059.mp3: {Stomaching it}That is... acceptable. Whenever I travel with you, I shall impart what I can to you, through my words and presence.
kreia.003003kreia058.mp3: Then our training shall begin. Whenever I travel with you, I shall impart what I can to you, through my words and presence.
kreia.003003kreia062.mp3: Do not honor me, fallen Jedi - honor it by listening and learning. Do that, and perhaps we shall survive this thing, you and I.
kreia.003003kreia055.mp3: Then I am your only hope - as you are mine. {Downnote}We are a sad pair, you and I, to defend the galaxy against such a thing.
kreia.003003kreia030.mp3: These Sith... they seek the death of all Jedi. As have all the Sith since the Jedi Order was first split.
kreia.003003kreia031.mp3: Yes... the Jedi Civil War is not the first one of its kind - thousands of years ago, the Jedi had another civil war that split the Order. It was a... terrible thing.
kreia.003003kreia032.mp3: A faction among the Jedi abandoned the teachings of the order, following their own path. They waged war on their fellow Jedi, a war that raged across the galaxy.
kreia.003003kreia033.mp3: But these fallen Jedi were cast out, defeated, and they retreated to worlds in the Outer Rim. Over time, they took on the mantle of the Lords of the Sith.
kreia.003003kreia034.mp3: But in their hearts, they never forgot the Jedi. The hatred for the Jedi Order burns in their veins like fire, and echoes in their teachings. Revan tasted it... as Malak did.
kreia.003003kreia035.mp3: In a manner of speaking... they are different from Malak in that they are concerned only with the destruction of the Jedi. For them, it is all that matters... all that ever mattered.
kreia.003003kreia036.mp3: It is a different war these Sith wage, a thing of silence and shadow. They strike from the darkness, hiding from the face of the galaxy, until all Jedi are exterminated.
kreia.003003kreia037.mp3: {Sad, grim}After all the Jedi are gone, then the galaxy is theirs, no matter whether the Sith or the Republic rules... it is the dark side that shall reign, unchecked.
kreia.003003kreia038.mp3: I believe them to be the result of... special teachings. Their apparent weakness against you is evidence of this.
kreia.003003kreia039.mp3: Those Sith assassins can sense their prey through the Force - it is like a hunger. {Distasteful}They feed... and grow stronger... when they are near Force Sensitives.
kreia.003003kreia040.mp3: {Sighs}The stronger their prey is in the Force, the deadlier they become. As long as you were cut off from it, you were able to evade their sight.
kreia.003003kreia041.mp3: But after Peragus, I fear that you will be no longer shielded from their eyes or the eyes of their masters. The stronger you grow, the more will come.
kreia.003003kreia027.mp3: {Shakes head}I do not know. The Sith struck more swiftly than I thought. And they will not stop until they have you in their grasp. If you fall, all the galaxy will echo it.
kreia.003003kreia028.mp3: {Resolved to fate}It does not matter where we go - it is not the destination that matters, it is the journey.
kreia.003003kreia029.mp3: {Resolved to fate}All paths will take us to the end, whatever it may be, and no matter how strongly we fight against it. For now, we are bound for Telos, and that is enough.
kreia.003003kreia019.mp3: The planet Telos, decimated by the Sith during the Jedi Civil War.
kreia.003003kreia020.mp3: Before the war, Jedi who failed their training were sent to the fields of Telos, to serve the galaxy... not as Jedi Knights, but as farmers and laborers.
kreia.003003kreia021.mp3: The destruction of Telos was complete - I doubt any Jedi remain. Yet there may be... echoes of their passing. We shall see.
kreia.003003kreia022.mp3: Then I am left with nothing more than we had already - my faith in you, and your ability to meet what comes.
kreia.003003kreia004.mp3: Have you come for more answers? There is little more left to give.
kreia.003003kreia109.mp3: {Firm, slight irritation}Of course it was. I knew what was necessary - and that I was the only one who stood between you and him.
kreia.003003kreia108.mp3: {Tired}This wound... {looks at hand, pauses}is a physical thing, and will fade with time. It was necessary... some things may only be learned from sacrifice.
kreia.003003kreia005.mp3: That does not surprise me - any more than you hearing my thoughts when we were apart. The pain, however, was unexpected; if I could, I would have shielded you from it.
kreia.003003kreia009.mp3: I do not know. I fear that... the consequences... would have been more extreme.
kreia.003003kreia011.mp3: Possibly, yes, and I fear it works both ways. I would not wish to test it... nor should you.
kreia.003003kreia107.mp3: {Acidic}If you think a connection to one such as yourself gives me any comfort, then you would be wrong. I desire this no more than you do.
kreia.003003kreia024.mp3: I would see to that fool in the cockpit - and remind him of our destination. I would not want him attempting to veer from Telos.
kreia.003003kreia002.mp3: He is a fool and an imbecile, and you would do well to keep your eye on him.
kreia.003003kreia003.mp3: Watch that one. His thoughts are slippery... I do not trust him, and nor should you. Such a man serves himself first... and his "allies" next.
kreia.003003kreia010.mp3: Then the sensation you would feel upon my death might be less than that... though much quicker.
kreia.003003kreia007.mp3: {Bitter, a little pissed}I do not need your condescension, nor your lectures. If anyone needs training and guidance, it is you.
kreia.003003kreia008.mp3: I do not know if it is possible... and I fear that had the pain been more intense, the consequences would have been more extreme.
kreia.003003kreia006.mp3: {Bitter}Save your pity. I am here to save you, not the other way around.
kreia.003003kreia001.mp3: If I were you, I would see to that fool in the cockpit. I would not want him attempting to veer from our destination.
kreia.101101kreia037.mp3: A last word of caution... I would find out as much as you can about this place quickly - I fear we will need to depart as suddenly as we arrived.
kreia.101101kreia901.mp3: The ship we arrived in, the Ebon Hawk, must still be in this place. We should recover it and leave.
kreia.101101kreia060.mp3: {Temp Placeholder for Float Text}What have you found?
kreia.101101kreia057.mp3: {This is a disembodied whisper that the player will hear when he awakens from his kolto tank. Note that Kreia says this word many times over the course of the game - it's a "theme" to make the player awaken to his potential}Awaken.
kreia.101101kreia026.mp3: Find what you are looking for amongst the dead?
kreia.101101kreia030.mp3: I am Kreia, and I am your rescuer - as you are mine. Tell me - do you recall what happened?
kreia.101101kreia055.mp3: I confess I know little more than you do... I do not know where here is.
kreia.101101kreia056.mp3: I do recall rescuing you... the Republic ship you were on was attacked, and you were the only survivor. A result of your Jedi training, no doubt.
kreia.101101kreia031.mp3: Your ship was attacked, and it is no more. You were the only survivor... a result of your Jedi training, no doubt.
kreia.101101kreia032.mp3: Your stance, your walk tells me you are a Jedi. Your walk is heavy, you carry something that weighs you down.
kreia.101101kreia033.mp3: {Already knows}So it would seem. Keep your past - and let us focus on the now.
kreia.101101kreia034.mp3: I do not know. I was removed from the events of the world as I slept. A survey of the surroundings may provide the answers we seek.
kreia.101101kreia039.mp3: The ship we arrived in must still be in this place. We should recover it and leave.
kreia.101101kreia040.mp3: We were attacked once, and I fear our attackers will not give up the hunt so easily - without transport, weapons, and information, they will find us easy prey indeed.
kreia.101101kreia041.mp3: You may wish to extend your search to some clothes... if only for proper first impressions.
kreia.101101kreia036.mp3: I leave you to the explorations of this place... here I will remain and attempt to center myself.
kreia.101101kreia035.mp3: {Dry laugh}I am not offering to help you - I am not so young as to leap from death's door as quickly as you.
kreia.gblkreia045.mp3: [Failure] I do not know anything about that.
kreia.101101kreia042.mp3: [Success] I do not know - {curious}why did they spare you?
kreia.101101kreia054.mp3: Very well... if they do not find us first. Be watchful.
kreia.101101kreia043.mp3: Indeed, a Jedi trance could protect one from such poisons... in fact, the sedatives may have been intended to keep you unconscious for some time.
kreia.101101kreia044.mp3: It would prove lethal to those untrained in such techniques, however. Most curious.
kreia.101101kreia045.mp3: And so do you. Perhaps we could discuss it at length later on - now we have other concerns - among them, finding our new enemy.
kreia.101101kreia053.mp3: I have found that answers come in their own time, not ours. Turn your energy to the matter at hand - if we cannot find a way out of here, the answers will prove useless anyway.
kreia.101101kreia046.mp3: Ah... yes, that did not escape me as well.
kreia.101101kreia047.mp3: It may be that our proximity during our long slumber may have had... unforeseen consequences.
kreia.101101kreia051.mp3: {Firm}I have little choice - and neither do you. It is an advantage to us both, and I suggest we make use of it.
kreia.101101kreia048.mp3: We seem to be able to speak without speaking - perhaps this effect will pass with time.
kreia.101101kreia049.mp3: {Slight sarcastic}Then hope that we have little to say to each other, lest it prove distracting.
kreia.101101kreia038.mp3: Even as I slept, I felt much unrest here {becomes slightly abstract, looks around as if seeing the area beyond the walls}- I saw strange visions, minds colored with fear - now, everything here feels terribly silent.
kreia.101101kreia961.mp3: I would find out as much as you can about this place quickly - I fear we will need to depart as suddenly as we arrived.
kreia.101101kreia059.mp3: Your ship was attacked. You were the only survivor... a result of your Jedi training, no doubt.
kreia.101101kreia028.mp3: Yes, I had hoped as much - I slept here too long, and could not awaken.
kreia.101101kreia029.mp3: It may be I reached out unconsciously, and your mind must have been a willing one. Or perhaps you have been trained for such things?
kreia.101101kreia027.mp3: Close to death, yes, closer than I'd like. {Curious}You have the smell of the kolto tank about you... how do you feel?
kreia.101101kreia023.mp3: I am recovering - your concern is noted, but not necessary. Keep your mind on the present - I sense trouble here.
kreia.101101kreia025.mp3: {Raises eyebrow}Not anymore, no. But again, that is a discussion for another time.
kreia.101101kreia024.mp3: {Slightly irritated}When I have recovered, I will do what I can to help you - you needed rescuing once, and I am prepared to rescue you again, if the need arises.
kreia.101101kreia022.mp3: Very well... if they do not find us first. Be watchful.
kreia.101101kreia017.mp3: Indeed, a Jedi trance could protect one from such poisons... in fact, the sedatives may have been intended to keep you unconscious for some time.
kreia.101101kreia018.mp3: It would prove lethal to those untrained in such techniques, however. Most curious.
kreia.101101kreia019.mp3: And so do you. Perhaps we could discuss it at length later on - now we have other concerns - among them, finding our new enemy.
kreia.101101kreia021.mp3: I have found that answers come in their own time, not ours. Turn your energy to the matter at hand - if we cannot find a way out of here, the answers will prove useless anyway.
kreia.101101kreia011.mp3: Ah yes. I noticed that as well.
kreia.101101kreia012.mp3: It may be that our proximity during our long slumber may have had... unforeseen consequences.
kreia.101101kreia015.mp3: {Firm}I have little choice - and neither do you. It is an advantage to us both, and I suggest we make use of it.
kreia.101101kreia013.mp3: We seem to be able to speak without speaking. Perhaps this effect will pass with time.
kreia.101101kreia014.mp3: {Slight sarcastic}Then hope that we have little to say to each other, lest it prove distracting.
kreia.101101kreia001.mp3: I have felt a disturbance... our enemy is here. We must leave at once.
kreia.101101kreia007.mp3: We are together in this matter, you and I... what affects you, affects me. There can be no division in our actions, or everything is lost.
kreia.101101kreia008.mp3: I realize that you have traveled alone ever since the Mandalorian Wars, but that time of self-reflection is over.
kreia.101101kreia009.mp3: ...and if you cannot see beyond yourself and your own needs, then you should know that I have the only means of accessing the Ebon Hawk's navicomputer. Without it, we both are trapped here.
kreia.101101kreia002.mp3: The one that fired upon the Ebon Hawk as we attempted to rescue you... and he will not let us go without blood being shed.
kreia.101101kreia004.mp3: The story is a long one, and time is short. Come - we must go, and quickly.
kreia.101101kreia005.mp3: We need to make our way to the docking area on this level. I fear the airlock has already opened, and if so, we must be on our guard.
kreia.101101kreia006.mp3: If we cannot reach the Ebon Hawk, then we must find a way to escape on the ship that has docked here.
kreia.101101kreia003.mp3: You know much of battle - enough to know that this is a battle you cannot win.
kreia.151151kreia001.mp3: Something is wrong... I sense no one on board.
kreia.151151kreia003.mp3: Everyone here has been slain, yet there are few signs of battle, no carbon scoring, no blaster fire. This place has been hit by assassins of a different sort.
kreia.151151kreia009.mp3: If the assassin machine was correct, then we cannot reach the hangar... be silent, I need some time to think.
kreia.151151kreia017.mp3: {Reprimanding, slightly angry}The two of you - be silent!
kreia.151151kreia018.mp3: We need a course of action, not division in our ranks. Otherwise this ship will be our last stand.
kreia.151151kreia014.mp3: {Nods}That is a sound plan - for the moment. Let us go.
kreia.151151kreia020.mp3: [The higher your influence with a companion, the more your alignment affects theirs, and extreme high and low influence with a companion can open up additional dialogue choices. There are benefits to both, so treat them as you will.]

kreia.151151kreia007.mp3: {Firm}We cannot go back into the facility.
kreia.203203kreia016.mp3: I see. From where I stood, it seemed to me that you were the one doing the pushing.
