kreia.305305kreia031.mp3: {[Kreia makes a motion with her hand.]}
kreia.305305kreia001.mp3: {Contempt, like Hanharr is a dog, hisses}Awaken, beast.
kreia.305305kreia026.mp3: {Kreia, firm, to a wounded animal}I have saved your life, beast... and all that comes with it.
kreia.305305kreia003.mp3: {Kreia, firm, to a wounded animal}I have saved your life, beast. That makes it mine.
kreia.305305kreia027.mp3: {[Gameplay Programmer: Hanharr launches himself at Kreia, she hammers him with a Force power.]}
kreia.305305kreia028.mp3: { driving Hanharr to his knees with a roar.]}
kreia.305305kreia033.mp3: {[Gameplay Programmer: Hanharr remains on one knee, in pain.]}
kreia.305305kreia004.mp3: {Taking slight pleasure in making Hanharr suffer}Kneel.
kreia.305305kreia023.mp3: Because there is something to be learned of strength, beast, even within your empty shell.
kreia.305305kreia024.mp3: And it will be needed in the times ahead.
kreia.305305kreia006.mp3: Because I need you to hunt, beast. This prey is something you have chased all your life... you are born and bred to it, like no predator before you.
kreia.305305kreia008.mp3: {Cold, listener just crossed the line}No, that you shall not do. You will not bring harm to the exile - and if you do, beast, I shall break you.
kreia.305305kreia009.mp3: The screams of your tribe of primitives, the scene of lying blinded with the huntresses' blaster at your skull, I shall make it so that is all you hear and see for the rest of your days.
kreia.305305kreia010.mp3: Even your madness will not save you if you bring harm to the exile. Know this.
kreia.305305kreia012.mp3: {A little softer, understanding, but still cruel}Ah, the life-debts of your people... the life-debt you have twisted with your hate. I felt it within you.
kreia.305305kreia013.mp3: {Soft, kneels, touches Hanharr like a wounded wolf}I shall promise you this, beast. Unlike the red-maned huntress, as long as you are loyal, I shall never show you mercy. No pity.
kreia.305305kreia022.mp3: All it requires is that you immerse yourself in another lie, beast. The exile - you shall be her servant, until I call upon you.
kreia.305305kreia020.mp3: All it requires is that you immerse yourself in another lie. The exile - you shall be his servant, until I call upon you.
kreia.305305kreia021.mp3: Do this thing, and I shall grant your desire.
kreia.305305kreia014.mp3: But most of all, I promise you an end to your debt. Hunt her, pursue her - kill her. And ending her life will end your debt to me.
kreia.305305kreia015.mp3: The pain will pass... I was able to heal some of the wounds, but the rest must remain.
kreia.305305kreia016.mp3: You will need that pain when you travel, and it will give you strength for the hunt to come.
kreia.305305kreia018.mp3: I will tell you where you must go. If you survive that place, then she will come to you.
kreia.305305kreia019.mp3: But first, I must prepare you for what is to come.

kreia.711kreia_vs002.mp3: You've revisited the dark moments of your past, and now you must face the present.

kreia.711kreia_vs014.mp3: {Kreia faces the player. She is a little afraid}Your "friends" are all arrayed against me. Will you stand for this?
kreia.711kreia_vs017.mp3: {seething contempt}So you will do nothing? Apathy is death. Worse than death, because at least a rotting corpse feeds the beasts and insects.
kreia.711kreia_vs018.mp3: {chanting}Apathy is death.{all NPCs become hostile to the player and attack}
kreia.711kreia_vs016.mp3: {pitiful}You of all people would judge me so? Am I not worthy of redemption?
kreia.711kreia_vs015.mp3: I will be honest with you. I {emphasize "have"}have fallen to the dark side. Does this change your decision?
kreia.711kreia_vs006.mp3: I will protect myself from this foul-mouthed ruffian!

visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr155.mp3: [Influence: Success] My master - when he showed me my world, showed it to me as it is, it... hurt. And since that moment, it has been... difficult to perceive the Force as I once did.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr153.mp3: [Influence: Failure] My master - he has crippled me. I have seen the galaxy as it truly is, and it has left its mark.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr054.mp3: [Influence: Success] It is not a subject which I have spoken of - since its destruction.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr055.mp3: The planet was not destroyed, it remains... it orbits, dead in space, but nothing lives on its surface. It echoes, but there is no one left to hear it.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr057.mp3: To see everything around you extinguished... it... was as if I was blinded. It was as if the Force had... been bled from the world.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr059.mp3: I was the only living thing remaining on the planet of Katarr... and my life, my agony, was a flicker in the darkness that was the planet. All that I had been connected to had been severed.

visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr061.mp3: But it could not be done. When the life was bled from the planet, and yet somehow, I remained, my Master came for me.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr063.mp3: And he made me *see.* And for the first time, I saw the galaxy. And I wished to die.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr065.mp3: He made me *see,* and at that moment, I longed for death more than anything, even more than in those moments when I had lain next to the bodies of my kind.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr066.mp3: He showed the flickering of life on other planets, the mass of beings that swarm through the empty places of the galaxy.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr067.mp3: To see such creatures, disconnected from themselves, their world, their place in it, unable to see the currents and how they affected everything around them.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr069.mp3: He convinced me the galaxy, all life must die. He fed upon its ugliness, its screaming, and in its place, he left silence... and where there was chaos, he brought stillness... and order.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr074.mp3: The Jedi, the last Council of the Jedi, came to our world to meet in secret. They hoped that perhaps among our people they could achieve the clarity to *see* what was striking them from the darkness of the galaxy.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr076.mp3: And my people died. And the Jedi died. And there was no one left. Only me.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr072.mp3: His power is great, and it comes from hunger. He is a wound in the Force, more presence than flesh, and in his wake, life dies... sacrificing itself to his hunger.
visasmarr_other_1.gblvisasmarr083.mp3: [Influence: Failure] It is not something I speak of. The homeworld is no longer, and that is all.

visasmarr.262fight036.mp3: {GENERIC WIN}You have succeeded. If you wish, you may challenge us again, and we will progress to more advanced movements.
visasmarr.262fight035.mp3: {Nods}Seek one of us out when you wish to fight, and we shall honor your request.
visasmarr.262fight027.mp3: Very well, I shall honor your request.
visasmarr.262fight032.mp3: Our next battle shall be free of restriction on weapons and items, and you may use whatever technique, Jedi or otherwise, you wish to attempt to defeat me.
visasmarr.262fight033.mp3: In turn, I will spare none of our forms against you.
visasmarr.262fight029.mp3: Our next battle will be using the higher forms among the Echani.
visasmarr.262fight030.mp3: You may choose hands and feet - or whatever melee weapon you wish, but use no other items or Jedi techniques.
visasmarr.262fight028.mp3: It shall be the same as before - hands and feet only, no stimulants, shields, weapons, or any other items. And no Jedi techniques. Are you ready?
visasmarr.262fight021.mp3: {A little suspicious}There is nothing more that we can teach you from such contests. Such battle would only be for battle's sake.
visasmarr.262fight022.mp3: {Firm, just been called out to fight}If that is what you wish, then we shall honor it.
visasmarr.262fight023.mp3: We shall see how you fight against a group of us. We shall take you in a pair, using everything at our disposal.
visasmarr.262fight024.mp3: Use whatever item, weapon, or Jedi technique you wish - we shall match it.
visasmarr.262fight037.mp3: Have you returned to fight again?
visasmarr.262fight013.mp3: {GENERIC WIN IF WON 4th BATTLE}{A little wary, the player just beat two of them, something they've never seen before, beat before last sentence}You are a strong opponent. Atris was correct about you - you know much of war and battle. {Beat}Perhaps too much.
visasmarr.262fight019.mp3: I admit nothing. The Echani stand together, to defeat one or two of us says nothing of how a true battle would go.
visasmarr.262fight015.mp3: Then our last battle shall be the five of us against you. Use any item, any weapon, any technique you wish - you will need them.
visasmarr.262fight016.mp3: There is no need for the last of us to join in this fight - the weakest among us will only serve to diminish our techniques.
visasmarr.262fight017.mp3: We fight as one when we are five, not six - and that number should be enough for this lesson.
visasmarr.262fight009.mp3: {A little wary}There shall be no more matches, no more challenges.
visasmarr.262fight010.mp3: {Wary}There is much we have learned from you. If we meet on the field of battle, we shall be prepared.
visasmarr.262fight001.mp3: {About ready to fight the player}Before we begin... are you familiar with Echani traditions?
visasmarr.262fight002.mp3: All duels between us shall be without armor of any kind. There shall be no restrictions upon our movements - or upon yours.
visasmarr.262fight003.mp3: Your feet are not to leave the training mat during the battle. If they do, you will lose.
visasmarr.262fight005.mp3: {Listing rules}The fight will be with hands and feet only - no stimulants, shields, weapons, or other items.
visasmarr.262fight006.mp3: Also, do not call upon any Jedi techniques during our contest. If you do, then the battle will be over.
visasmarr.262fight007.mp3: In turn, I will not use our higher forms, for this is only an opening battle between us - a test of each other's strength.
visasmarr.262fight011.mp3: {Smug, superior, just kicked the player's ass}We knew you were no match for us. Yet you decided you would try anyway.
visasmarr.262fight012.mp3: {Dismissive}Our battle is done - there is nothing more that we can learn from you.
visasmarr.262sister126.mp3: Oh, yes. We train extensively in various combat styles, and we have not had another target for some time. You may prove a pleasant diversion.
visasmarr.262sister020.mp3: {Reluctant, has better things to do}You may ask.
visasmarr.262sister112.mp3: A crude way of describing our duty, but in a sense, yes.
visasmarr.262sister088.mp3: Atris speaks of you, but "Jedi" is not the term she uses. She says you followed Revan to war, the same Revan who took the Mandalorian flame and brought it to the Jedi.
visasmarr.262sister090.mp3: You chose to fight the Mandalorians, and in choosing to fight them, you also fought the Jedi, whether you knew it or not. Only a kath hound turns on its own Master.
visasmarr.262sister094.mp3: {Slight give in}But I do not believe you are weak or a murderer. You show reflection on your actions.
visasmarr.262sister084.mp3: Yes... she should be in the training chamber, to the north and west of here.
visasmarr.262sister057.mp3: Atris speaks of you, but "Jedi" is not the term she uses. She says you followed Revan to war, the same Revan who took the Mandalorian flame and brought it to the Jedi.
visasmarr.262sister059.mp3: You chose to fight the Mandalorians, and in choosing to fight them, you also fought the Jedi, whether you knew it or not. Only a kath hound turns on its own Master.
visasmarr.262sister053.mp3: Yes... she should be in the training chamber, to the north and west of here.
visasmarr.262sister021.mp3: {Guarded, doesn't trust player}The mistress? What of her?
visasmarr.262sister025.mp3: Yet... Atris has told us that the work here at Telos may pay for similar efforts in many worlds along the Rim that were destroyed when the Jedi turned on each other.
visasmarr.262sister035.mp3: Atris has said the training of the Jedi was flawed... and the Jedi Civil War was proof of this.
visasmarr.262sister029.mp3: That... is unknown to me. I have never observed Atris to teach Jedi, nor would I wish to.
visasmarr.262sister031.mp3: Atris has chosen instead to focus her efforts on galactic recovery. Once the galaxy breathes again, disciples will come.
visasmarr.262sister012.mp3: I do not know. The Echani forms are known to be taught to military special forces throughout the galaxy.

visasmarr_other_4.gblvisasmarr209.mp3: {Failed to open a lock}I have failed.
visasmarr_other_4.262fight026.mp3: {GENERIC LOSE: As if expecting it, the player was just defeated by her}You have fallen.
visasmarr_other_4.262fight020.mp3: {GENERIC WIN IF WON 3rd BATTLE}{Slightly impressed}You know much of melee combat, you surprise me.
visasmarr_other_4.262fight014.mp3: {Slight anger}One does not sweat in the polar regions of Telos... so all that will break will be your pride.
visasmarr_other_4.262fight004.mp3: Also, this is not a fight to the death. Restrain your instincts when we fight, and we shall do the same.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister128.mp3: As I suspected - your murderous nature shows itself. Sisters, attack!
visasmarr_other_4.262sister125.mp3: {Glad, wants to kick the player's ass because she dislikes him}I would welcome a chance to instruct you. I have been anxious to teach you many principles of combat ever since you invaded this place.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister127.mp3: Very well. Follow me, and we shall see if you have the endurance to learn the most basic of our teachings.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister121.mp3: We share the same father, and we all bear the face of our mother. It is not unusual for the Echani of the same parents to be born so as to be indistinguishable to outsiders.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister122.mp3: {A little firmer, the player is treading on dangerous ground}As I have said, it is not unusual for the Echani of the same parents to be born so as to be indistinguishable to outsiders.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister123.mp3: {Pissed, ashamed of question}If you seek to raise anger in me, you will fail, exile. I tolerate your presence only upon orders of the mistress - she did not order me to endure your questions.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister124.mp3: {Pissed}One cannot take back an action, and often apologizing for it only compounds the insult. Simply drop the matter and be silent.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister099.mp3: We serve the Jedi. And we watch.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister104.mp3: I assume you meant no insult. It is forbidden for us to become Jedi, even if we possessed the awareness of the galaxy that the Jedi possess.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister105.mp3: We are here because we are not Jedi. That is our purpose.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister106.mp3: We have taken an oath to never follow the teachings of the Jedi, only to watch those of the Order and carry out Atris' will should it be necessary.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister107.mp3: Atris believes the new Jedi Order that shall arise here will need to be guarded and watched by those not touched by the Force. She thinks it will give balance.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister120.mp3: Atris is the one we serve, and she guides our actions.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister109.mp3: The Jedi have long since lacked anyone to judge their actions - and provide support should their power corrupt them. We are this strength.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister110.mp3: The Jedi Civil War proved that the Jedi are in need of such guidance. It is our duty to watch for aggression, rage - passion, and end it before it takes root.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister115.mp3: Atris is trusted. She has watched Jedi rise and fall, and knows the ways of both paths to see the signs when they begin.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister116.mp3: She is a worthy one to judge the Jedi when the Jedi refuse to judge their own.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister119.mp3: {Stiffens}I do not expect a criminal to understand - you have existed outside the circle of the Jedi for too long.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister118.mp3: {Confused}I do not understand the reference. Pazaak cards would not be good building material for a pyramid.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister117.mp3: And therein lies her strength. We have known Atris many years, and she has shown much wisdom.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister113.mp3: I would have struck you down as you entered this place if Atris had not stayed my hand. Though you are not a Jedi, you have been sickened in Revan's service.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister114.mp3: If for a moment I felt you could bring harm to Atris or this place, then I would end you.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister111.mp3: It is not harsh. It is necessary.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister108.mp3: Spoken like one who has fallen... if we had been there, you may never have fallen at all.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister100.mp3: Atris is the only Jedi here, this is true. But the mistress will bring others in time.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister102.mp3: {Skeptical}It is possible... but if so, your road of atonement shall be a long one.
visasmarr_other_4.262sister101.mp3: You are no Jedi, Atris has made that clear. When you went to war, you gave up the mantle of the Jedi and became something else.

disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple361.mp3: {Nods}Of course. It would be my pleasure.

disciple_disappointed.301arrival020.mp3: What is it you wish to do?
disciple_disappointed.301visquis031.mp3: {Thinking}No, Atton, I think it may be a trap.
disciple_disappointed.701kreia_ac007.mp3: These Tuk'ata were once trained to serve the Sith here.
disciple_disappointed.701kreia_cv008.mp3: The valley we just came from was full of dark energy, but this cave is darker still.
disciple_disappointed.702vash003.mp3: Lonna Vash... I heard stories of her.
disciple_disappointed.710sec_tomb013.mp3: It's a wall of the Dark Force. I am not strong enough to go through.
disciple_disappointed.904904kreia006.mp3: You are wrong. Manipulation is Kreia's strength, not battle.
disciple_disappointed.904904kreia199.mp3: We have a chance... we just have to figure out how to make use of it.
disciple_disappointed.907904kreia199.mp3: We have a chance... we just have to figure out how to make use of it.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple348.mp3: Of course. What did you wish to know?
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple160.mp3: That is hardly surprising. What do you wish to know?
disciple_disappointed.610disc_enc146.mp3: Mysterious are the ways of Jedi. Sometimes they see things the rest of us do not. Other times, such sight brings arrogance - and a fall.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple341.mp3: It is not important - perhaps we will discuss it another time.
disciple_disappointed.610disc_enc135.mp3: Thoughts - images, perhaps, but not actual communication and words. A bond often causes a sensation to be passed along it, such as extreme fear and pain.
disciple_disappointed.610disc_enc136.mp3: Still, I have seen Jedi who have the ability to communicate with aliens and beasts - it is a rare thing, perhaps telepathy is one such talent.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple206.mp3: Still, there is hope - and I must remind myself of it, even when times grow dark. As long as we hold Onderon and Telos, then perhaps we have a chance.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple225.mp3: It is strange that someone who went to war against the Mandalorians would disregard the damage the fall of the Republic could cause.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple226.mp3: Of course, if you sought battle for its own sake, then perhaps I could understand your disregard.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple240.mp3: {Challenging}Yes, to some, perhaps. Yet the Sith have already experienced their own collapse, and I suspect their new tactics are proof of that.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple242.mp3: The Sith respect order and control, that is true. But few of them seem ever able to hold that power for long - to see their philosophy at work is like watching a continual collapse, just like watching their academy fall in on itself.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple238.mp3: Of course you do not. But perhaps one day, you will, and I hope for that day.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple239.mp3: I think we are done speaking for the time being - this discussion has been too enlightening, I feel.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple237.mp3: I see the Mandalorian Wars left their mark. Perhaps the Mandalorians won after all... just as they defeated Revan with their philosophy of slaughter.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple227.mp3: Does that mean that all who would die if the Republic collapsed also would not deserve to survive?
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple228.mp3: I see. Have you ever been in a situation where you are dependent on another?
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple229.mp3: You could not have won the Mandalorian Wars alone. In fact, I doubt you would have survived if you had not others to stand with you.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple224.mp3: Without supply lines and a standing military, the chaos that would result would be greater than the Mandalorian Wars.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple222.mp3: Telos, Onderon, Dantooine... without them, the Republic will either die slowly... or quickly, by fire.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple213.mp3: Also, it's the only world in the Republic still capable of seeding ecosystems into other dead worlds - Onderon's wildlife is some of the most aggressive in the known galaxy.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple214.mp3: Merely placing some of those beasts on target worlds will guarantee their habitation for years to come.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple218.mp3: Dantooine was one of the few Republic worlds on the Outer Rim - it is why the Republic is attempting to get the settlement up and running.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple221.mp3: {Slightly defeatist}But now, with the fall of Khooda, the Republic will have to abandon many worlds along the Rim.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple215.mp3: The Jedi are a symbol. As much damage as their reputation took during the Sith War and the Jedi Civil War, there are still many to whom they serve as an example.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple216.mp3: {Hesitant, doesn't like to believe in what he's saying, but recognizes the truth}Plus... there have been times in the past where a single Jedi has been enough to change the face of a world... or a galaxy. I suppose I still believe that might be possible.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple217.mp3: Despite the betrayal of many of the Jedi against the Republic, I must concede that as figureheads, they serve a vital role.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple207.mp3: There are many factors - aside from protecting Telos and Onderon, we need a rallying force. We need the Jedi, even if they are just figureheads.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple165.mp3: There are so many histories, relics, holocrons that speak of their teachings and their code - I fear that unless someone makes an effort to find and keep them, they will be lost forever.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple167.mp3: {Quietly, deadly serious}[Influence: Success] Because I fear that unless the Jedi teachings are preserved, we will lose the galaxy.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple170.mp3: I have tried to keep an open mind about their practices, but I have seen the Republic scarred too many times by their students.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple173.mp3: That is my feeling as well - and one can see it when one walks on Dantooine.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple174.mp3: Thank you - it is good to hear a perspective of one who has walked in their halls, and spoken to their masters. I thought I was the only one who held such doubts.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple171.mp3: That is a truth I cannot deny - it is sometimes difficult to see that side as I walked upon Dantooine.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple172.mp3: But I will consider what you have said. There is another side to their efforts and their teaching that I sometimes forget.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple175.mp3: Despite the troubles of the Jedi Civil War, there are those among the Republic who still favor the Jedi and wish them to return.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple177.mp3: Yet as long as Onderon remains within the Republic, and the efforts on Telos succeed, that is all that matters.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple186.mp3: {Interested}You have? Where have they gone - and why?
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple202.mp3: {Despondent}It was as I feared... they have given up the galaxy. Without them...
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple205.mp3: [Influence: Success] I fear you are right. Their hesitation almost destroyed the Republic - and there is some evidence to suggest that it gave birth to the Jedi Civil War.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple201.mp3: What happened? Was the Jedi killed?
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple199.mp3: Master Vandar spoke of these assassins in the council chambers. They were used before large assaults on planets and Jedi, to weaken them.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple192.mp3: From what I have been able to determine, a year after the battle with the Republic fleet that almost wiped the Republic out, Revan simply... left.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple182.mp3: Regardless, my efforts turned up nothing.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple183.mp3: {A little down on himself for failing}I do not think it is a matter of luck, or chance - only my own inability to find them. While the Enclave trained me for many things, I am afraid that the life of a bounty hunter was not among them.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple179.mp3: I know something of the Jedi. I have studied them for a good portion of my life... and now that they are gone, such studies are even more important.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple162.mp3: I have some training in the medical arts, if you are ever need in healing as well. But my chief passion is history.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple321.mp3: Yes, I have been trained by some of the best researchers in the Republic - which is a humbling experience, let me tell you.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple281.mp3: It is possible you are right. I fear there is little truth that be given behind the walls of an academy.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple275.mp3: Perhaps I judge the masters unfairly - yet I still wonder why they did not rise to stop such threats earlier, or if they simply did not see them.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple276.mp3: {"There may be no answer."}There may be none. Regardless, thank you for discussing this with me - speaking of it eases the burden.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple278.mp3: {Nods}It has occupied my thoughts for too long... I will keep that in mind.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple268.mp3: Master Arca taught Ulic... Master Baas was the one who saw what Exar Kun could become, but he took no steps to stop him.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple272.mp3: As a Padawan, Revan was trained by Master Kae, before she was exiled. Strange, I do not recall who Revan's master was after that.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple245.mp3: If I look familiar, it is because we have met before, at the Enclave on Dantooine, many years ago.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple254.mp3: I knew at that moment, that if you would no longer be a Jedi, then you must be correct. I realized I did not want to be a Jedi - instead, I wished to follow your path.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple255.mp3: And in any event, there was no one to train me, even if I wished it. They all went to war, as I grew past the age of acceptance.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple256.mp3: It is possible to forget the Force, you know - if you not have felt it strongly enough, then there is little to miss. But I never felt the Force as strongly as I did when I was with you.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple243.mp3: I imagine in your travels of the galaxy, you have seen many people. Faces tend to blur together after a time.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple320.mp3: [Influence: Success] I think you are right. It is time.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple424.mp3: I have thought about what you have said about the Jedi Order. You were correct - it was a truth I did not want to face.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple420.mp3: The one who was to be my Master was lost at Malachor V.
disciple_disappointed.gbldisciple318.mp3: [Influence: Failure] It is not time, if there ever is a time.
disciple_disappointed.650discend018.mp3: {Firm conviction, alternate}I follow you, feel as I do, because it is my choice.
disciple_disappointed.650discend004.mp3: I believe in what we are doing - what you are doing. I am here because I choose to be.
disciple_disappointed.650discend017.mp3: {Realizes that the player is suffering because of what he just learned from the Jedi}The Jedi - what did they say to you?
disciple_disappointed.650discend013.mp3: {Quietly, but firm}I will understand if you feel you must go alone, but I ask that you do not.
disciple_disappointed.610disc_enc161.mp3: I do not know - I do not know who has taken them. I'm sorry.  I wish I could  tell you more.

disciple.gblvisasmarr024.mp3: Just... be careful. Not everyone can be saved.

disciple.003003disci028.mp3: The transmission was for the Republic.

disciple.003003disci014.mp3: Atton... I feel that perhaps there has been some miscommunication between us concerning the exile.

disciple.gbldisciple429.mp3: {Quiet}I believe that there is very little truth that can be found within the conference room on Coruscant.
disciple.gbldisciple431.mp3: Now she has returned, and I ask her now if she will train me in the ways of the Force.
disciple.gbldisciple432.mp3: The galaxy needs strength now. If the Jedi will not come forth and fight this threat, then we must.
disciple.gbldisciple433.mp3: {Quiet}And if that strength comes from the dark side, then that is what we must accept.
disciple.gbldisciple434.mp3: I ask that you train me in the ways of the Force, to teach me the ways of power so that a greater stability may be achieved.

disciple.gbldisciple359.mp3: At times, I meditate, simply close my eyes, and listen. It is quite calming.
disciple.gbldisciple360.mp3: {A little rueful, but joking}I try to treasure these moments before the next crisis begins.
disciple.gbldisciple353.mp3: {Matter-of-fact, not consciously hitting on the player}Are you sure you need healing? You look good to me.
disciple.gbldisciple354.mp3: Yes, your muscle tone looks good, you response time seems excellent, and I see nothing that would otherwise impair your health.
disciple.gbldisciple355.mp3: You have the same vitality about you that you seem to possess, no matter what the circumstances.
disciple.gbldisciple358.mp3: {A little confused}Very well - I hope I did not offend you in some way.
disciple.gbldisciple357.mp3: It is the truth. You are more fortunate than you know.
disciple.gbldisciple356.mp3: I am surprised no one has told you the same before. It is the truth, and evident to anyone with eyes.
disciple.gbldisciple351.mp3: {Referring to the player drifting to the dark side}You have no wounds that I can see - although the matter of your spirit is something you should address.
disciple.gbldisciple364.mp3: Certainly. Let me see how many I can make.
disciple.gbldisciple363.mp3: Not at the moment. I think we have enough to heal an army - hopefully, we won't need that many.
disciple.gbldisciple401.mp3: {A little concerned, reacting to the player's dark side traits}There is something we must discuss. Surely you have noticed that you have been changing - as your powers return, your body suffers.
disciple.gbldisciple402.mp3: It is a sign of the dark side - all your choices, they affect the flesh, rotting it, as the dark side rots you from within.
disciple.gbldisciple406.mp3: Very well - but heed my words. Unless you turn back, the dark side will claim you completely, utterly.
disciple.gbldisciple405.mp3: It is never too late to choose your path - be mindful of that. There is always hope for you - and redemption.
disciple.gbldisciple407.mp3: {A little stiff, unsure of how to put this}There is something I have observed, and now I feel I must say it.
disciple.gbldisciple408.mp3: I have found your presence to be... inspiring. With your growth in the Force, you seem to have found your center, and throughout the dangers we face, you remain calm and focused.
disciple.gbldisciple410.mp3: In any event, it has been some time since I traveled with a Jedi, nor one so firmly upon the path. I wanted to thank you.
disciple.gbldisciple413.mp3: Very well - my apologies if I have offended you. I shall remain silent.
disciple.gbldisciple412.mp3: {Smiles at end}Very well - then I shall keep my favorable opinions to myself.
disciple.gbldisciple382.mp3: I have studied the holorecord of your trial. I am unsure what to make of it.
disciple.gbldisciple383.mp3: I must confess that I was searching for some meaning beyond the records - a reason for why one would leave the order.
disciple.gbldisciple399.mp3: Did you know that exile is a rare sentence? It is not really something that the order can enforce. Believe it or not, it was really your choice.
disciple.gbldisciple384.mp3: Yes, but exile is rare, and I have found it is not really something that the order can enforce. Believe it or not, it was really your choice.
disciple.gbldisciple398.mp3: I do not know - that is a question best answered by yourself. But it is you who made the choice to turn away, not them.

disciple.gbldisciple387.mp3: Because I, too, turned away from the Order. Under less extreme circumstances, perhaps, but stemming from the same reasons.

disciple.650discend001.mp3: Is something wrong? You look troubled - I can feel it.
disciple.650discend019.mp3: {Puzzled, confused}I do not understand what you mean.
disciple.650discend002.mp3: {Puzzled, confused}That is an odd answer. What did you mean by it?

disciple.602disc_enc052.mp3: What else would you like to know?
disciple.602disc_enc120.mp3: All faces tend to blur together after a time. It is not an uncommon thing.
disciple.602disc_enc111.mp3: I do not know if you are aware of how fragile the Republic is at the moment. Its influence is stretched thin, and it grows weaker with time.
disciple.602disc_enc114.mp3: {Revan was Evil}It was almost the end. But at that last year, the year before Revan vanished, Revan's assault on the Republic stopped.
disciple.602disc_enc115.mp3: No one knows why, but it was all that saved the Republic. The fleet the Sith had amassed was no more, and the remaining Sith turned on each other, destroying the academy on Korriban.
disciple.602disc_enc118.mp3: But if a threat strikes now, if certain key worlds are not held, then the Republic will collapse.
disciple.602disc_enc100.mp3: The Republic is fragile right now - Telos is important because its success will determine whether or not other dead worlds receive the same reconstruction efforts.
disciple.602disc_enc101.mp3: If Telos is rebuilt and made habitable again, it will affect a string of worlds along the Rim.
disciple.602disc_enc103.mp3: Its position and resources on the Rim make it a vital supply line and a guardpost against Outer Rim attacks.
disciple.602disc_enc104.mp3: Also, it's the only world in the Republic still capable of seeding ecosystems into other dead worlds - Onderon's wildlife is some of the most aggressive in the known galaxy.
disciple.602disc_enc105.mp3: Merely placing some of those beasts on target worlds will guarantee their habitation for years to come.
disciple.602disc_enc106.mp3: The Jedi are a symbol. As much damage as their reputation took during the Sith War and the Jedi Civil War, there are still many to whom they serve as an example.
disciple.602disc_enc107.mp3: {Hesitant, doesn't like to believe in what he's saying, but recognizes the truth}Plus... there have been times in the past where a single Jedi has been enough to change the face of a world... or a galaxy. I suppose I still believe that might be possible.
disciple.602disc_enc108.mp3: Despite the betrayal of many of the Jedi against the Republic, I must concede that as figureheads, they serve a vital role.
disciple.602disc_enc110.mp3: Dantooine is within reach of several other Rim worlds, and the Republic will need it as a resupply post if they are to keep a presence on the Rim.
disciple.602disc_enc069.mp3: No. It is something of a mystery why they would exile themselves as they have.
disciple.602disc_enc071.mp3: I fear that there is something else at work, something that we cannot see.
disciple.602disc_enc072.mp3: Then again, perhaps the Jedi are hiding simply because so many people hate them these days.
disciple.602disc_enc074.mp3: But the reason the Jedi Civil War was named such was because few in the galaxy can recognize the difference between the Sith and the Jedi.
disciple.602disc_enc075.mp3: To them, they are both Jedi - {dash/beat}with different philosophies.
disciple.602disc_enc080.mp3: {Surprised, then a little softer}Hate? No, I do not hate them. They only raise questions without answers.
disciple.602disc_enc081.mp3: Jedi are not supposed to be like the rest of us. They are supposed to see a higher purpose in all things.
disciple.602disc_enc082.mp3: And they are supposed to train students responsibly and well, so mistakes of the past are not repeated.
disciple.602disc_enc083.mp3: Yet all I saw was ignorance and arrogance, and what those seeds created in the Republic.
disciple.602disc_enc086.mp3: There is no blame - all must accept. But at its core, one must wonder if it was the failure of the Jedi teachings... or the teachers themselves.
disciple.602disc_enc087.mp3: Many of the Jedi Council trained Exar Kun, Ulic... Revan and Malak. How could they not see the danger they posed? And if they could not...
disciple.602disc_enc088.mp3: ...perhaps there was some essential part of their teachings that was flawed. Something beyond the Jedi Code that they were missing.
disciple.602disc_enc124.mp3: Revan had many Masters. Zhar, Dorak, Master Kae before Kae left for the Wars. Towards the end of her training, she sought out many to learn techniques.
disciple.602disc_enc095.mp3: Revan had many Masters. Zhar, Dorak, Master Kae before Kae left for the Wars. Towards the end of his training, he sought out many to learn techniques.
disciple.602disc_enc123.mp3: It is said that she returned to her first Master at the end of her training, in order to learn how she might best leave the order.
disciple.602disc_enc091.mp3: Revan was brought before the Jedi Council and put on trial. You must understand that the situation was desperate... and the Jedi needed to know how Revan had amassed the forces arrayed against them.
disciple.602disc_enc094.mp3: Revan helped the Republic defeat Malak. Perhaps in his conversation with the Jedi Masters, they were able to convince him of the rightfulness of their actions.
disciple.602disc_enc076.mp3: Not always. Jedi often fall. They caused much harm on Onderon, for example, in the name of peace and protection.
disciple.602disc_enc068.mp3: I was looking for some trace of the Jedi, as you were. I had heard mention that one of the Jedi Masters, Master Vrook, had been sighted there. I wished to speak to him.
disciple.602disc_enc054.mp3: The other reason was the ruins of the Jedi Enclave... and once I arrived, I felt it was necessary to stay, to protect what was left.
disciple.602disc_enc055.mp3: {somewhat upset about the plunder of the Enclave}Much had been taken from the Enclave, both by raiders... and others. I wished to preserve what I could.
disciple.602disc_enc056.mp3: Many artifacts were taken from the Enclave, but these thefts... they had to have been done by someone who knew the Enclave well.
disciple.602disc_enc057.mp3: I suspect the Jedi themselves took the holocrons and records, but I do not know why.
disciple.602disc_enc060.mp3: {seeking to appease the handmaiden}It was my mistake to use the term "thefts". I apologize.
disciple.602disc_enc061.mp3: In any case, if Jedi did take things, for the sake of preservation, of course, then they left no clue as to where they may have taken them.
disciple.602disc_enc062.mp3: Someone has been taking holocrons from sites across the galaxy. It is almost as if someone does not want their knowledge used to find the Jedi.
disciple.602disc_enc063.mp3: The situation on Dantooine is echoed in other places in the galaxy. Raiders, smugglers, all seek to plunder what remains of the Jedi... and even the Sith.
disciple.602disc_enc064.mp3: More so than the Jedi themselves, I fear the loss of their history.
disciple.602disc_enc067.mp3: ...the teachings of Master Arca, the adventures of Jolee Bindo on the Rimward Missions. All of these things are in danger of being lost, forever.
disciple.602disc_enc049.mp3: {Speaking to a transmission}Admiral, this is Mical. I have found the exile.
disciple.610disc_enc125.mp3: All faces tend to blur together after a time. It is not an uncommon thing.
disciple.610disc_enc155.mp3: Welcome back. Is there anything else I can do for you?
disciple.610disc_enc156.mp3: Very well. I'm pleased to be part of your company.
disciple.610disc_enc050.mp3: I am an historian and scientist working for the Republic, and a self-styled disciple of knowledge. If I may ask, what brings you to these ruins?
disciple.610disc_enc054.mp3: Feel free to ask me whatever you wish.
disciple.610disc_enc056.mp3: I don't know why they are massing in the Enclave. I'm concerned that they may have been drawn here by some disturbance.
disciple.610disc_enc051.mp3: Then it would appear we have similar goals. Perhaps we can benefit from sharing information.
disciple.610disc_enc049.mp3: {calm, relaxed}Your arrival is fortunate. I was just running out of food supplies and wondering what laigrek meat would taste like.
disciple.610disc_enc102.mp3: What else would you like to know?
disciple.610disc_enc168.mp3: {He appears lost in thought for a moment}:: Thinks for a moment. ::
disciple.610disc_enc160.mp3: Revan had many Masters. Zhar, Dorak, Master Kae before Kae left for the Wars. Towards the end of her training, she sought out many to learn techniques.

disciple_irritated.gbldisciple472.mp3: {Speaking to a transmission}We are going there now to aid them. Mical out.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc138.mp3: What answers do you seek? It has been my experience that Jedi rarely answer such questions - or instead, indulge in half-truths.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc139.mp3: If the Sith are rising in the galaxy again, then it is strange the Jedi would not be there to meet them... and that we have not seen more evidence of the Sith.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc140.mp3: No, I believe you. I merely find such subtleties among the Sith to be strange. They have been known to practice deception...
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc141.mp3: ...but in the histories, since the time of the dark lords Kun and Qel-Droma - and Revan and Malak, such subtleties have been rare.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc142.mp3: Exiled you? It is strange they would sentence you and not speak honestly of your crime.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc143.mp3: It is not the Jedi way to lie... well, no, that is not true. There are times when truth is concealed, if they think a greater good can be achieved.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc144.mp3: But when such things are done, it is always done with the intention that the person they withheld truth from cannot be trusted with that knowledge. That it will bring harm upon themselves and others.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc145.mp3: Perhaps there was some greater danger in you knowing the reason than in the reason itself. Strange.
disciple_irritated.gbldisciple346.mp3: I will return to Khoonda now and await the next transport. You may find me there if you have more questions.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc147.mp3: In any case, it seems to me like our goals are compatible.

disciple_irritated.610disc_enc153.mp3: All right. I'll return to Khoonda and await the next transport. Find me there if you change your mind.
disciple_irritated.gbldisciple339.mp3: The tomb on Dxun held many dangers. I did not think I would be up to the challenge, but I was pleased that I was mistaken.
disciple_irritated.gbldisciple340.mp3: And that perhaps some of my long-held beliefs are not true after all.
disciple_irritated.gbldisciple342.mp3: I am proud that you have taken me as a student - and your training saved me on Dxun. I thank you.
disciple_irritated.gbldisciple333.mp3: {A little ashamed}The temple on Dxun held many dangers, and I was unprepared for them.
disciple_irritated.gbldisciple336.mp3: Even though we won, there was no victory.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc133.mp3: It is also said that moments of death, or near-death, may also cause such bonds - the stronger one is in the Force, the stronger the connection is.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc130.mp3: I do not know - I do not know who has taken them. If we were to find them, perhaps I could help you find the answers you need.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc074.mp3: It is not the way of the Jedi to vanish in such a way... especially when the Republic is in need of them.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc077.mp3: It is difficult sometimes for the Jedi to see such things, since much of it is rooted in human nature, and the Jedi are often removed from events of daily life, insulated.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc088.mp3: It is difficult to follow the Jedi Code, when so few others have. But you know this.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc081.mp3: Ulic Qel-Droma and Exar Kun, the two dark lords during the Sith War many decades ago, were once Jedi Knights, as were Revan and Malak.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc082.mp3: It is perhaps more amazing that some still trust Jedi after many have fallen and endangered the galaxy.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc083.mp3: It is also proof that a single Force wielder can change the face of the galaxy, and that is a frightening thing indeed.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc072.mp3: I was looking for some trace of the Jedi, as you were. I had heard mention that one of the Jedi Masters, Master Vrook, had been sighted there. I wished to speak to him.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc057.mp3: Like you, I was looking for some trace of the Jedi. I had heard mention that one of the Jedi Masters had gone there, but I found no trace of them.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc069.mp3: Much has been forgotten in recent wars, and I fear that greater troubles shall stem from that loss of knowledge in the future.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc070.mp3: The destruction of the Academy on Ossus near the Cron Drift in the Sith War.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc117.mp3: The Jedi Civil War brought much suffering to the galaxy, and the forces that Malak and Revan amassed against us seemed limitless.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc118.mp3: Many worlds were destroyed, trade routes disrupted, and the Republic fleet was almost decimated.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc124.mp3: {Revan was Good}While it is said that Revan and several Republic heroes and Jedi defeated Malak, in many ways Malak had already won.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc121.mp3: {Quietly}It did not matter - Revan had already won.
disciple_irritated.610disc_enc122.mp3: The war was costly, and it shattered the Republic. In time, the Republic might recover.
disciple_irritated.gbldisciple231.mp3: It would not be freedom for many. There would be economic collapse, followed by starvation and war.

mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore062.mp3: You turned a demoralized, defeated mess into a coordinated army. You brought tactics, backbone, and above all else, victory, to them.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore059.mp3: War breeds butchers on both sides of the battle lines, Jedi. You know it better than anyone.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore901.mp3: Ever consider what would have happened if we'd won?
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore054.mp3: That so? Ever consider what would have happened if we'd won?
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore055.mp3: The Sith would have been nothing more than a border skirmish against the might of my clans.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore056.mp3: We would have brought a new age of strength and expansion to the Republic, with the wealth of the Core worlds providing arms and warships to fuel our growth. Instead, the Republic 'won.'
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore057.mp3: Look around you. Look at what your precious victory has brought you.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore058.mp3: I ask you this - is the galaxy better off for the Republic's victory?
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore151.mp3: {Companion quest intro}I want to have a word with you.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore155.mp3: To survive, I'll help you, but as Mandalore, I have another duty - the unification of the clans.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore156.mp3: After our defeat at Malachor, the survivors spread across the Outer Rim, many taking up work as mercenaries or worse.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore157.mp3: But they cannot have fallen so far that they will not recognize a new Mandalore has been chosen, one who will restore our people to glory.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore090.mp3: I'm not asking for help, I'm just asking you to let me do this. Cross me, and I might have to reevaluate our arrangement.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore091.mp3: And I won't stand by while you sabotage my plans. We both have greater threats to deal with.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore093.mp3: Our next need not be fought against your Republic.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore148.mp3: {Talking About the Ebon Hawk}{CONDITION: First time on the Ebon Hawk}Nice ship you have here. Where did you get it?
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore121.mp3: {Irritated, wondering why the hell the player is talking to him while a fight is going on.}Let's deal with the targets first, then we can talk.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore122.mp3: {Bao-Dur}So, you fought against the Mandalorians in the war?
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore124.mp3: But you fought on the front lines. To a Mandalorian, there is honor in that.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore129.mp3: Maybe that's what it looked like to you, but that isn't why we fought. We fought for honor and glory in the heat of battle.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore131.mp3: The Republic took us too lightly. We wanted to face the full force of their army. We had to goad them to fight.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore133.mp3: Defeat is part of a warrior's life. We will recover, stronger than before.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore139.mp3: {Bao-Dur}{Amused}I hear that you were the one responsible for our defeat at Malachor V.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore142.mp3: Even then, we might have won the day. The tide of battle was turning when the Republic finally set off their trap.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore143.mp3: We were almost completely destroyed. You should be proud.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore145.mp3: It is as much your triumph as our failure. We learned a lesson and we paid the price for our mistake.
mandalor_other_radio1.221221mand001.mp3: I must leave you for a time to gather my Mandalorian warriors. We will rejoin you when the time comes for the assault on the Ravager.
mandalor_other_radio1.221221mand004.mp3: Is that your idea of a joke? Don't be a fool. I'll meet you at the shuttle.
mandalor_other_radio1.221221mand003.mp3: Watch yourself. I'll soften up the way for you, but I won't be here to hold your hand.
mandalor_other_radio1.221221mand002.mp3: Don't worry about me, I can handle myself just fine. Look after your own health.
mandalor_other_radio1.222222mand001.mp3: We will join you in the assault. These rank and file soldiers will do you no good aboard the Ravager.
mandalor_other_radio1.222222mand002.mp3: Let we Mandalorians lead the charge into battle and to victory.
mandalor_other_radio1.222222mand003.mp3: Kelborn, Zuka, you will be joining us.
mandalor_other_radio1.301ratrin013.mp3: That's ship's had some proud owners. You're disgracing it by giving it away like a durasteel chip.
mandalor_other_radio1.303mandlead013.mp3: I'm not here for any mercenary work. I'm here to return your clan to Dxun, where I am restoring our people to their former glory.
mandalor_other_radio1.351351hub007.mp3: This must be the nerve center of the ship. I say we take it out.
mandalor_other_radio1.401manguide003.mp3: It's up to you, Jedi. This soldier knows the terrain, and can get us where we need to go quickly... without needing to blast our way through herds of cannoks.
mandalor_other_radio1.403gategrd006.mp3: Keep the patrols on standby. In the meantime, stay alert for any unwelcome visitors.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kelborn023.mp3: Dividing our forces at a time like this is foolhardy.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex005.mp3: At ease, Kex. Just checking the camp.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex006.mp3: {To player, slightly amused}Young Kex here got a battlefield promotion when his predecessor got quartered by a beam splitter.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex007.mp3: Whatever this visitor needs, Kex, you make sure he has access to it... provided he can pay for it.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex009.mp3: Really? Is that true, Kex? Do you have some issues with our guest?
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex013.mp3: {Goes in for kill}So you don't trust my judgment? Are there any other orders of mine you want to question?
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex018.mp3: Then you're an idiot, Kex. But you're right not to trust our guest here. I haven't made up my mind about her yet, either.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex015.mp3: {Disgusted, levels out in 2nd sentence}Then you're an idiot, Kex. But you're right not to trust our guest here. I haven't made up my mind about him yet, either.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs2001.mp3: We're back. The shuttle is going to stay docked here until further notice.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs2003.mp3: I'm going with you. The Sith have taken a particular interest in you, and you could use an extra blaster. I've been meaning to leave Dxun to look for other Mandalorian clans, anyway.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs2008.mp3: Mandalore leads *all* of the Mandalorian people, not just a single clan. In order to revive our people the clans must be reassembled under me.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs2012.mp3: I'm going to look for the other clans with or without you. At least this way you'll have another ally against the Sith.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs2009.mp3: They could be anywhere. You seem a magnet for trouble. Mandalorians are, too.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs2010.mp3: I have a feeling that if we travel together it would work to our mutual advantage.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs2005.mp3: The Sith aren't known for sharing power. If the Jedi Order is destroyed for good, it's inevitable that the Sith will dominate the Republic.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs2006.mp3: And then my people will be eradicated or enslaved. Helping your cause is a matter of necessity.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs2007.mp3: Mandalorians helped Exar Kun during his war. We know first hand how we'd fare in the service of their like.
mandalor_other_radio1.501501_mand001.mp3: Here we are, the city of Iziz. It's been shut down tight for months now. General Vaklu is close to declaring martial law. We won't be able to travel too far in the city.
mandalor_other_radio1.501501_mand002.mp3: Fortunately I have a friend in this quarter of the city. He's a doctor by the name of Dhagon Ghent{DAY-gone Geh-nt - like "Bent" but "Gent" instead}. His office is on the other side of the market square.
mandalor_other_radio1.501501_mand003.mp3: It might be best if you do the talking around here. The Onderonians have a mixed view of Mandalorians after we conquered their world.
mandalor_other_radio1.501cp_guard011.mp3: While you're at it, tell him to forget he ever saw us. Could be useful.
mandalor_other_radio1.501end_mand001.mp3: The shuttle is just ahead. I think we should get out of here fast. It's going to be some time before they forget about us here.
mandalor_other_radio1.501end_mand002.mp3: No more trips to Iziz for us until the situation changes. A lot.
mandalor_other_radio1.502bostuco012.mp3: Twenty years would mean you were here during the Mandalorian Wars, right?
mandalor_other_radio1.502cp_replac011.mp3: We should head over to the spaceport before General Vaklu invents some charges against us. Then we'd be in real trouble.
mandalor_other_radio1.502mp_anda059.mp3: We should try to get General Vaklu to be on our side. He has a shrewd mind and is far more fit for command.
mandalor_other_radio1.502mp_anda060.mp3: Queen Talia is young and too idealistic. A veteran leader is what this planet needs and would make a better ally.
mandalor_other_radio1.502mp_anda063.mp3: Vaklu is no fool. Whatever our past disagreements, he'll recognize the advantages of an alliance between us.
mandalor_other_radio1.502mp_anda062.mp3: Why do you take that so personally. When you've been around as long as I have, it's just part of doing business.
mandalor_other_radio1.502mp_ponla049.mp3: Why are you joining in this? I prefer Vaklu over Talia, but this is hardly a task for a warrior.
mandalor_other_radio1.502mp_ponla050.mp3: Shrewd. I hate to lower myself to joining this mob, but your plan may work.
mandalor_other_radio1.502mp_riike007.mp3: Dhagon Ghent is the only person I know with the contacts to help us out. We need to get Dhagon out of custody.
mandalor_other_radio1.503kavar021.mp3: There's a chance that non-combatants could be hurt here. I recommend we avoid using grenades.
mandalor_other_radio1.503kavar002.mp3: Kavar, huh? The famed Jedi guardian? The Mandalorians counted on the fact it would be you, not Revan, who would lead the Jedi against us during the Mandalorian Wars.
mandalor_other_radio1.503kavar003.mp3: I wonder how we'd have fared against you. I thought you were killed fighting Malak during the Jedi Civil War.
mandalor_other_radio1.503nikko015.mp3: It might be a good idea to look at the crime scene. We fought many soldiers in the Mandalorian Wars. The Onderonians were certainly brave but they were disorganized and stupid. I wouldn't be surprised if they overlooked something.
mandalor_other_radio1.503nikko010.mp3: Maybe some of these people will know more about what happened that night.
mandalor_other_radio1.503tobin032.mp3: You can trust his offer. He's far more capable than Queen Talia is, I think allying with him is the best course.
mandalor_other_radio1.503tobin033.mp3: {Some disdain that the PC refuses to acknowledge intelligent counsel}No, you didn't. Make up your own mind then.
mandalor_other_radio1.503tobin035.mp3: Credibility is important in Onderon politics. If he betrayed you and betrayed the Sith, his reign would be a short one.
mandalor_other_radio1.506vaklu035.mp3: You did the right thing. Leaving Vaklu alive would be foolhardy.
mandalor_other_radio1.511ro_sold003.mp3: {Pleasure and humor in his tone}Looks like they still remember us.
mandalor_other_radio1.511ro_sold005.mp3: But now is not the time for talk. It's the time for action!
mandalor_other_radio1.511tobin002.mp3: {Glow of smug satisfaction}It's nice to see we're still remembered.
mandalor_other_radio1.512al_droid004.mp3: Nobody we talked with mentioned a droid. This droid was destroyed recently. Someone inside the cantina might know more.
mandalor_other_radio1.512d_thug001.mp3: This is Dhagon Ghent's place. He's not the best doctor you'll ever meet, but he's well connected in this city. Doesn't look like he's here right now, though.
mandalor_other_radio1.512d_thug004.mp3: He's certainly capable of it, and probably stupid enough to get caught. But we need him, suspicion of murder or not.
mandalor_other_radio1.601azkul037.mp3: Watch out for Azkul. I've known his kind before. He will attack you without hesitation if he believes you aren't working with him.
mandalor_other_radio1.601dillan053.mp3: {Lots of disdain with his first sentence - then a less hostile explanation}I would hardly call the mercenaries that were here Mandalorians. Without a leader many Mandalorians fell far from the path of honor.
mandalor_other_radio1.602suulru028.mp3: I sincerely hope that history doesn't remember our wars as a footnote to Revan and Malak's. But it's good to see that people still remember it with fear.
mandalor_other_radio1.605dopak002.mp3: I know how this works. A mercenary or two can easily get work during the dry times as a bounty hunter or bodyguard. There's always odd jobs around.
mandalor_other_radio1.605mand004.mp3: Good. I have no desire to spill any more Mandalorian blood today. Gather your clan and return to Dxun. You have seen the last of your mercenary days.
mandalor_other_radio1.605mandlead007.mp3: {On the edge, doesn't like being mocked}I am the new Mandalore. I have reclaimed Mandalore's helmet, lost after our defeat at Revan's hands.
mandalor_other_radio1.605mandlead008.mp3: Assemble the rest of your clan. You will return to Dxun. We must come together as we were before and prepare to fight a new war - a war that will return us to glory.
mandalor_other_radio1.701kreia_cv002.mp3: You smell that? It's the scent of death and overpopulated beasts coming from that cave.
mandalor_other_radio1.702vash005.mp3: This Jedi hasn't been dead long.
mandalor_other_radio1.851851exp011.mp3: Let me worry about that. Hold your position. {Beat, pissed}This isn't over yet.
mandalor_other_radio1.851851exp001.mp3: {Angry}What the hell was that? I told you to wait!
mandalor_other_radio1.851851exp005.mp3: {Cuttting him off}Do we have another core?
mandalor_other_radio1.851851exp007.mp3: {Thinking to himself}We need to find another proton core. Or we need to make one... all right, wait for my signal. This isn't over.
mandalor_other_radio1.851851mand008.mp3: Did you get an ID signature on this vessel?
mandalor_other_radio1.851851mand010.mp3: {Grim}Then let's finish this. {Beat, loads weapon}And remind the galaxy of Malachor V.
mandalor_other_radio1.851851mand012.mp3: Nothing you need to worry about, Sith.
mandalor_other_radio1.851851mand015.mp3: Been waiting for this for ten years. It's just time to do things the old-fashioned way.
mandalor_other_radio1.851851tobin022.mp3: {Disgust at second sentence}This ship is from Malachor. This Sith Lord of yours bolsters his fleet with the ships from that world... he's nothing more than a scavenger.
mandalor_other_radio1.851851tobin047.mp3: Hnh. This ship is barely holding itself together. The structural damage should have destroyed it long ago.
mandalor_other_radio1.851851tobin051.mp3: If he's so powerful, why hasn't he stopped us, then? We've attacked his ship, killed his soldiers, and he's done nothing.
mandalor_other_radio1.851851tobin027.mp3: {Pissed, instantly knows Kreia's betrayed them}He means that Jedi witch you travel with - Kreia.
mandalor_other_radio1.852852mand002.mp3: {Angry at being helpless, wounded}Get away from me - I don't need your help. {Beat}Just leave me here.
mandalor_other_radio1.852852mand007.mp3: That the Mandalorian Wars were our doom, and that we had been deceived. That it had never been our decision to wage war on the Republic.
mandalor_other_radio1.852852mand008.mp3: Revan said the Mandalorians didn't invade Republic space ten years ago because it was our choice. We were tricked... our entire people sacrificed as pawns... and never knew it.
mandalor_other_radio1.852852mand014.mp3: Revan was one of the greatest military leaders in the galaxy, in history. She had no use for people who had already been beaten once.
mandalor_other_radio1.852852mand015.mp3: She said the time of the Mandalorians was over. The Mandalorian Wars had killed us. And she laughed.
mandalor_other_radio1.852852end002.mp3: What the hell are you doing up there? We need to get off this ship. Now.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore252.mp3: {Failed to open a lock}Can't open it.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore247.mp3: {Laying a mine}I'll take care of this.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore116.mp3: {Generic node termination}I don't know anything about that.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore115.mp3: {Generic node termination}I don't understand what you mean.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore103.mp3: {Matter of fact, player just did something evil, impressed}Haven't seen many Jedi do that before.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore102.mp3: {Impressed, player just did something evil}Worthy of a Mandalorian.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore100.mp3: {Player misuses the Force, performs a Jedi mind trick, grumbling}Next time, a little physical force might be better.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore098.mp3: {Player misuses the Force, performs a Jedi mind trick, agreeing}Weak minded fools deserve to be controlled.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore082.mp3: They don't like outsiders and their inability to take ideas from other cultures gives them a fundamental disadvantage in warfare.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore083.mp3: They fell quickly during the Mandalorian Wars despite their martial skills. Their technology and doctrine are not in the same league as Mandalorians.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore042.mp3: I was there when she defeated Darth Malak and traveled with her afterwards.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore097.mp3: Of course it's a threat. Get in my way, it'll be something more.
mandalor_other_radio1.gblmandalore096.mp3: Don't be a fool. Given the threat we're up against, we need each other.
mandalor_other_radio1.003attond010.mp3: {Condescending derision}The Ebon Hawk. I was told to expect your arrival. {Menacing}I don't know your business on Onderon, but it ends here.
mandalor_other_radio1.403sith_att012.mp3: You didn't think you were the only ones with stealth generators, did you?
mandalor_other_radio1.401manguide004.mp3: About time you showed up. Mandalore ordered me to report here and escort you wherever you need to go on Dxun.
mandalor_other_radio1.402davrel021.mp3: I see... This zakkeg is settled for the moment. If you need to prepare yourself, I will wait here.
mandalor_other_radio1.402davrel005.mp3: What little honor I have earned you stripped from me in the battle circle. This I won't allow.
mandalor_other_radio1.403davrel011.mp3: {He should sound young and haughty - something like Cruise in Top Gun}So you are the visiting Jedi. {Dismissive tone}You aren't much to look at. Are you here to observe, or do you seek to prove yourself in the battle circle?
mandalor_other_radio1.403davrel005.mp3: I doubt you even needed me. But you have helped me secure my place here.
mandalor_other_radio1.403sith_att010.mp3: Over here, there are more of them!
mandalor_other_radio1.402kumus036.mp3: Are you here to ridicule me further? {Deeply sarcastic}It is good your own words amuse you.
mandalor_other_radio1.403gen_mand003.mp3: During the war, we abandonned our headquarters before Revan's final attack. Only a few volunteers were allowed to stay and fight.
mandalor_other_radio1.403gen_mand001.mp3: The Onderonians fight themselves. They weaken themselves for the slaughter.
mandalor_other_radio1.403gen_mand014.mp3: {battle circle failure}Have you no honor? Respect our traditions or speak to me no more.
mandalor_other_radio1.403gen_mand013.mp3: You and Davrel have proven your worth by defeating the zakkeg together.
mandalor_other_radio1.403gen_mand012.mp3: {battle circle winner}You have fought, and defeated, worthy foes in the battle circle.
mandalor_other_radio1.403gen_mand008.mp3: Kumus owes you a debt of honor, traveler.
mandalor_other_radio1.402kelborn050.mp3: Change your mind? I could still use your help.
mandalor_other_radio1.402kelborn053.mp3: Perhaps we can face each other there. See you at camp.
mandalor_other_radio1.402kelborn046.mp3: Something tells me you might have a better idea of why they're here than me.
mandalor_other_radio1.402kelborn003.mp3: Mandalore sent me out here personally to track a ship that landed in the area.
mandalor_other_radio1.402kelborn004.mp3: Yeah, from what little we could pick up on sensors, it was bigger than your ship, most likely a freighter or dropship.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kelborn045.mp3: As would I. I noticed that you killed more scouts than I. I am curious to see your handiwork first hand.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kelborn037.mp3: If you yearn for more fighting, the battle circle can slate that thirst - I'm here for that. It is not a true test of a warrior, but it echoes the thrill of real battle.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kelborn033.mp3: You find weakness in yourself, and then overcome it. Real wealth can be gained here. Valuable tactics and techniques that can save your life.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kelborn034.mp3: I see now why we couldn't win against you during the war. Even fighting at a great disadvantage, you still fight as brutally as a rancor.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kelborn008.mp3: This morning General Vaklu met with the Council of Lords and declared that the Queen was guilty of treason.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kelborn048.mp3: He said he wanted a meeting with you on Iziz, that it was urgent, and that you'd know what it was about. But things have changed.
mandalor_other_radio1.402sentry023.mp3: We have orders to escort you to our camp - our leader wants to speak to you.
mandalor_other_radio1.403bralor012.mp3: No, it is up to the sergeant. The battle circle was not designed to settle petty vendettas and rivalries. Its primary purpose has always been teaching.
mandalor_other_radio1.403bralor003.mp3: I don't think you'll be able to return to Iziz any time soon. General Vaklu has a great deal of power.
mandalor_other_radio1.403bralor004.mp3: Even a Jedi couldn't defeat an entire army alone.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex040.mp3: You won't get a fight from me. We've been ordered to let you have free passage through the camp... with no trouble.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex039.mp3: No, no problem. I just don't know why Mandalore lets you roam free. I don't trust you.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex026.mp3: It's not free, though. You can pay with credits or trade in some of your gear. It doesn't matter to me.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex037.mp3: It's bad enough I have to stand here and pass out supplies while the others go on patrol. I'm not going to disgrace myself further by being your guide.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex029.mp3: If it were up to me, you would've been shot on sight. Manadlore must think you're something special.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex023.mp3: No, just you. You're no Mandalorian. I don't know why Mandalore has let you roam free, but I don't trust you.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex019.mp3: I... do, Mandalore. I don't trust her.
mandalor_other_radio1.403kex014.mp3: N-no, of course not, Mandalore! You are the one we follow without question!
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor067.mp3: {Placeholder for Barkstring} All scouts report in.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor065.mp3: Are you ready to go to Iziz yet?
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor055.mp3: When you were last here, you probably didn't even go to Onderon. The Republic knew that Onderon's fate would be decided on its jungle moon, not the planet itself.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor056.mp3: To begin with, when you talk about Onderon you're really talking about the ancient walled city of Iziz. It's the only inhabited settlement on the planet.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor071.mp3: [Failure] That's not going to work. I've traveled with Jedi before, so I know all about your tricks. If you want something from me you're going to have to convince me the old fashioned way.
