mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor061.mp3: They want to go back to an earlier age when they could cower behind their walls. Their spinelessness made them easy to conquer.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor057.mp3: It depends on who you ask. Queen Talia rules from the Royal Palace. But her cousin, General Vaklu, has a great deal of power in Iziz{EYE-ziz}, as well.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor058.mp3: They disagree about many things, just like their citizens. We fought General Vaklu during the war and he is a worthy adversary. Queen Talia is young, and hardly a match for him.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor054.mp3: Not yet, Jedi. Find some more to do around here. There's a jungle full of trouble out there.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor050.mp3: You've made quite a reputation around here. You did better than I thought you could.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor052.mp3: You won't be able to get to the Ebon Hawk from the city. If you need to grab anything from your ship, I'd do it now.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor053.mp3: I'm going to talk with Zuka and have him start a shuttle flight check. After that we'll head out.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor043.mp3: So far you haven't done anything. Check back when you've done something worth my time.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor039.mp3: Kelborn told me that they were covert military and probably aligned with Colonel Tobin from Iziz{EYE-ziz}. Kelborn doesn't think they'll send out any more scouts.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor040.mp3: But that doesn't mean there aren't more of them out there.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor041.mp3: Colonel Tobin is General Vaklu's right-hand man. Despite his martial skill he handles himself as a functionary more than a warrior.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor042.mp3: Back when we were fighting Vaklu's resistance during the Mandalorian Wars, Vaklu wouldn't have any use for a poisonous kinrath like Tobin. But Vaklu seems to have adapted well to peacetime.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor036.mp3: I also promised you a reward. Here you go. This should help you fend off some of the local beasts. You're well on your way to earning some real respect around here. Keep it up.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor037.mp3: That's to be expected. They don't really like it when someone makes loud noise in their territory.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor038.mp3: It wouldn't be much of a test if all you had to do was take a hike through the jungle now, would it? You're alive, in one piece, and learned something about the beasts of the jungle.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor048.mp3: How many cannoks did you have to kill to find those parts for Zuka? That was a tremendous help. I won't forget it.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor069.mp3: Xarga told me that you returned one of our sheep to the herd. You have gained some small prestige by helping Kumus.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor047.mp3: The gate guard said you managed to kill a zakkeg. Those are tough beasts, Jedi. You've earned some respect around here.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor046.mp3: Zuka told me you helped out with some repairs around the base. I was hoping you'd prove yourself more with a lightsaber, but it's certainly a great help.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor045.mp3: Kelborn said you dispatched some covert military scouts in the jungle with him. He spoke highly of your work.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor044.mp3: You defeated Bralor in the battle circle? Either you're very lucky, or you're a lot tougher than you look.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor003.mp3: So you're the intruder? Our sensors picked up your handiwork in space.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor004.mp3: I am Mandalore, leader of the Mandalorians.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor031.mp3: Mandalore is the name we give to our leader. Becoming Mandalore is the greatest honor any Mandalorian could aspire to. When our leader falls in battle, the most worthy takes his place.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor032.mp3: So even though your army killed our leader, it was only a matter of time before we chose someone new. Me.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor011.mp3: So, it's transportation you want? It so happens I have a small shuttle that's more than capable of running the Onderon military blockade.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor012.mp3: I make occasional trips to Iziz{EYE-ziz} for information and supplies. If you want to go with me, you're going to have to prove your worth.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor028.mp3: I don't travel with anyone I'm not sure of. You look capable, but Iziz{EYE-ziz} can be a dangerous place. If you want to travel on my shuttle, I want to make sure you aren't going to be a liability.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor029.mp3: I'll let Kex know that you check out. We've found more gear than we can use, so you can trade with him if you need some more supplies.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor030.mp3: Be careful in the jungle. Our patrols have stopped until the space traffic dies down. The challenging beasts have been cleared from the area, but what's left might still be too much for you.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor027.mp3: [Failure] I could - but I don't know you. Once I get to know you I might tell you more, but not now.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor026.mp3: [Failure] That's not going to work. I've traveled with Jedi before, so I know all about your tricks. If you want something from me you're going to have to convince me the old fashioned way.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor013.mp3: Figure it out yourself. Ask around, see if you can make yourself useful. Or something that'll show what you're made of.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor014.mp3: There is one thing. Before your ship landed we were preparing some demolition work. All the activity forced my men to stop before they finished.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor015.mp3: The charges need to be detonated before anybody comes across them. So all you'd have to do is flip a switch.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor018.mp3: We were trying to uncover the entrance to a hidden cache of old Mandalorian equipment. The explosives should be easy to find. Just get to it before the cannoks do.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor022.mp3: They're not much more than a couple of plasteel cylinders. Before you get any bright ideas, if you uncover cache B13 leave it alone.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor023.mp3: Even if you survive the traps, it would require military-grade explosives to open without the proper access codes. What's inside belongs to the Mandalorians.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor019.mp3: The last months before Dxun fell, the old Mandalore knew that Revan and the Republic were gaining the upper hand.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor020.mp3: He ordered our best engineers to hide caches of weapons and munitions throughout the moon, safely away from the enemies' hands.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor016.mp3: We want to keep a low profile, so we've recalled all our patrols in the jungle. Setting off some high explosives isn't a textbook example of subtlety.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor007.mp3: This used to be the heart of the Mandalorian war effort. {Lots of pride here}From this complex we commanded an armada that had the Republic on the run. {Statement of fact with no malice}It didn't last.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor010.mp3: Covert camps are not meant to attract attention. Because we conquered them, the people of Onderon still hold a grudge against the Mandalorians. So we keep our presence here a secret.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor008.mp3: Mandalorians have a rapport with this jungle. Every moment here is a struggle, all creatures gripped in a constant war for survival.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor009.mp3: The sole purpose of the weak is to feed the strong. We train here and learn the lessons of the jungle. The beasts also help us keep our edge.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mandalor005.mp3: Scattered, perhaps, but we're still alive. Alive and rebuilding.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs1011.mp3: {Angry, challenging}I was at Malachor V. And I remember how many Jedi died to stop us there. And no matter how many dead orbit that planet, the Mandalorians still live. Clan Ordo still lives.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs1012.mp3: See Kex there - he was serving on Nar Shaddaa as muscle for the Hutts. Kelborn was a scout for the Duros on frontier worlds. I brought them here, gave them a purpose. This galaxy will be ours again, I promise you. That is the future.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs1003.mp3: Good. I want the shuttle bound for Onderon within the hour.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs1007.mp3: {Scoffs}Don't pretend to understand us - we Mandalorians are a breed apart.
mandalor_other_radio1.403mand_cs1009.mp3: Not for long. Soon the Mandalorians will be strong again, united as one clan under one banner. Mine.
mandalor_other_radio1.403sith_att009.mp3: I think it's best for both of us if we head to Iziz immediately. Grab your gear. My men will take care of cleaning up the mess.
mandalor_other_radio1.403tagren001.mp3: You have prowess in battle, this cannot be denied. But your Jedi teachings prevent you from having a true warrior's spirit.
mandalor_other_radio1.403xarga019.mp3: If he couldn't defend himself, then he got no less than he deserved. Any sign of that permacrete he was carrying?
mandalor_other_radio1.403xarga013.mp3: We'll see if Kumus will prove warrior enough to be worth all this trouble.
mandalor_other_radio1.403xarga025.mp3: Queen Talia has hidden depths as a leader. There is more to warfare than mastery of battle tactics.
mandalor_other_radio1.403xarga026.mp3: Equally important is the ability to motivate the troops that carry your banner. Vaklu was formidable, but through all of the Queen's hardships she kept her army together.
mandalor_other_radio1.403xarga024.mp3: {Placeholder for Barkstring} {Yelling at his troops with a passion} Our numbers swell, our training hones us, the galaxy will fear us once more!
mandalor_other_radio1.410xarga028.mp3: {Seems startled - he's surprised the PC has that good eyes}You have? Yes, well...
mandalor_other_radio1.410xarga020.mp3: {Create temp item demolition pack - it is used by the relay}It looks serviceable. And you didn't blow yourself up.
mandalor_other_radio1.410xarga003.mp3: I can follow you a little bit further, but then I will set up command and control for my unit in the field.
mandalor_other_radio1.410xarga027.mp3: We've already received our signal from Colonel Tobin. You're to attack the Sith camp immediately.
mandalor_other_radio1.411xarga008.mp3: Freedon Nadd was a dark Jedi. The stories say he was far worse than Revan and Malak ever were.

mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore107.mp3: {Player just did something nice for someone else, is commenting on it}If you want to help someone, let them stand on their own feet.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gbl000react069.mp3: {Satisfied, dismissive, just killed someone}Good - that ought to shut them up.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore079.mp3: Always seemed to me that this moon is a training ground - even the air is harsh, difficult to breathe.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore077.mp3: I figure the Republic must have dealt with the Academy after the war. Only a complete fool would've allowed an enemy training base to continue operating.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore035.mp3: While it wouldn't be unheard of for a new helmet to be created, it was determined to find the real thing.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore018.mp3: Revan embodied our philosophy and showed us our own weaknesses. Then he exploited them.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore006.mp3: Our honor, fortunes, and lives revolve around battle. From our earliest history, this has been our way, as it will be, always.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore007.mp3: There are, but those are luxuries. Luxuries that were paid for by the blood of our warriors - alive and dead.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore010.mp3: But we live in times of action, and I've said enough for now. We can speak of this again later.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore161.mp3: {Revan's fate, Light}You helped me gather the clans together, so I feel I owe it to you to tell you the whole truth about my mission and Revan.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore173.mp3: I wanted to go with her. I respected her, knew that she could use my help where she was going.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore195.mp3: I wanted to go with her. I respected her, knew that she could use my help where she was going.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore201.mp3: I'm not sure Revan knew herself. But at that moment, I think she had a reason.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore063.mp3: Fair enough. But let me share some of my opinions.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore154.mp3: The Sith must be stopped. If they destroy the Jedi, the Republic will fall, and my people will be eradicated or enslaved.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore150.mp3: I see. Well, you were lucky to get it then. This is a fast ship, well made. I'll bet she'd have some stories to tell.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.003pcdead2011.mp3: {These are his thoughts as he's thinking to himself, player is reading his mind}...not like this, not like the end of the Mandalorian Wars... I won't...{"fail my people again"}
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.003pcdead2007.mp3: ...this will not end like the Mandalorian Wars... I won't...
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kex011.mp3: So you don't think our guest should be wandering around free, is that it?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.502bostuco014.mp3: {Challenging, Onderon soldiers are weaklings}You mean after the Jedi drove the Mandalorians from Onderon. The Mandalorians never gave ground to any Onderon soldier.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.502cp_replac010.mp3: Not all of the military is after us. Still, Vaklu can throw a whole army at us. I think we've outworn our welcome over here.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.502mp_ponla051.mp3: Maybe I should've left you on Dxun.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.503bahima009.mp3: That bit of information will help with clearing Dhagon, but the Onderon military won't let him off that easy. They're not tough, but they are stubborn.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.503bahima010.mp3: Maybe someone in here will know more about what happened that night.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.503nikko009.mp3: That bit of information will help with clearing Dhagon, but the Onderon military won't let him off that easy. They're very obstinate.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.605mand002.mp3: {After Mandalore wins the fight}Any other takers?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.710sec_tomb010.mp3: I know the dark side when I feel it. I'm not going to be able to pass here. I'll have to be the rear guard for this campaign.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.851851exp008.mp3: {Irritated that lieutenant suggested killing himself for failing}And don't kill yourself before I tell you.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.851851mand014.mp3: Don't get all sentimental, I just don't trust you to get the job done.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.851851tobin008.mp3: Go report to the target site... Colonel. I'll let my men know you're coming... {under his breath at end}and if you try anything stupid, they'll shoot you dead.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.851851visas002.mp3: If you betray me, or my men, I will kill you.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.852852mand005.mp3: {Beat, pauses}You... sound like Revan. At... the end.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.852852mand026.mp3: {Reflective}Do you know what he told me, in those last days on the Outer Rim?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.852852mand025.mp3: {Reflective}Do you know what he told me, as I lay dying on the Outer Rim?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.852852mand024.mp3: {Reflective}Do you know what she told me, in those last days on the Outer Rim?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.852852mand009.mp3: {Ominous}She said there was a war coming. That it was waiting out in the Unknown Regions, in the dark, waiting for us to destroy each other.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.852852mand011.mp3: No, not this one - another one. More terrible. Against an evil we couldn't begin to comprehend... a war of belief, that had been fought for thousands of years.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.852852mand022.mp3: Revan was one of the greatest military leaders in the galaxy, in history. He knew what he was doing.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.852852mand021.mp3: He said the time of the Mandalorians was over. The Mandalorian Wars had killed us. And he laughed.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.852852end011.mp3: We need to get off this ship. Now.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.605mand001.mp3: I'm not paid to talk to you. Move along.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore250.mp3: {Entering search mode}Let me check out the area.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore110.mp3: {Bored, prompting player to keep playing}C'mon, let's keep moving.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.gblmandalore104.mp3: {Appraising, a little impressed, player just did something evil}Now I know why you were exiled.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.303mandlead021.mp3: Very well, Mandalore. My clan will follow you and make for Dxun that another clan might be added to the strength of your army.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.401manguide008.mp3: It's fueled up and ready to go. Let's head out.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.401manguide006.mp3: But I can get you where you want to go a lot faster and safer than you crashing through the undergrowth like a drunk boma.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.401manguide002.mp3: {To superior officer}Reporting as ordered, Mandalore. I can take you wherever you need to go on Dxun.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel024.mp3: Are you ready now? The zakkeg awaits us.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel025.mp3: The zakkeg doesn't appear to be going anywhere for the moment. If you still need time, take it. But my patience has limits.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel015.mp3: The zakkeg is just up ahead. Together, we have a chance of defeating it.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel019.mp3: But a skilled patrol of warriors can kill the beasts.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel016.mp3: If you couldn't find your way here through the jungle, then you'd be worthless in the fight. Besides, um. I didn't know for certain where the beast was.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel002.mp3: This time we fight to the death!
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel007.mp3: There are no wars to fight, no great enemies to destroy. I wish this was a different age, where our armadas were a force to be feared.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel009.mp3: I'll do what I must to prove myself to the other Mandalorians. But fighting a zakkeg would be a short-lived honor.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel012.mp3: {Hopeful, in a bloodthirsty way}Do you accept my challenge, then?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel010.mp3: {He is disoriented by this suggestion then warms to it}What - Yes, I suppose that is... possible. We would both gain recognition from that battle.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel003.mp3: I was too young to fight in the Mandalorian Wars. With our clans scattered there was no opportunity to prove myself.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402davrel004.mp3: Years ago young Mandalorians would fly point in a Basilisk, laying waste to anything before them, at the forefront of battle! But this has been denied me.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403davrel015.mp3: A few. No fights to the death. Other parts of our training weed out the weak among us. But that isn't the function of the battle circle.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403davrel016.mp3: There are individual rules for each fight. The warrior with greater honor determines those. Which in your case means any Mandalorian makes the rules.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403davrel013.mp3: Our history is one of battles and wars, but there are times when even we must deal with peace. The battle circle allows us to hone our skills by fighting other Mandalorians.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403davrel012.mp3: I am Davrel{da-vrel}, a Mandalorian warrior. I have yet to taste real battle so I test my worth in the battle circle, instead.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403davrel010.mp3: If you wish to fight again, I am sure the sergeant could arrange it. You will not fare any better, though.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403davrel007.mp3: I have lost. But this was no true contest. Jedi are skilled warriors, and I am young. I will train very hard to match you in combat next time.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403davrel004.mp3: I see now how we lost the Mandalorian Wars. You have a formidable spirit. I have no illusions that I would've been able to defeat the zakkeg without you.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403davrel003.mp3: You have fought more battles on Iziz? You are truly formidable.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403davrel002.mp3: Onderon will fall to us again.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403davrel018.mp3: Xarga believes we should contact General Vaklu and see if an alliance can be formed between us.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402deton002.mp3: Don't touch that button! It'll blow up all my charges!
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402kumus031.mp3: {Disgusted, then defiant, about to attack. More emotion.}You have no honor... but I will teach it to you.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402kumus029.mp3: {"Screw you"}Then may the jungle take you. And I hope your death shall be slower than mine.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402kumus016.mp3: You must have cleared a path through the beasts coming here. If you take care of the boma beasts, I can make it to safety.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402kumus011.mp3: Blaster rifles don't use much energy, and their energy cells last a long time. How often have you had to change ammo?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kumus015.mp3: I have nothing to say to you. Leave me alone.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kumus007.mp3: That's true. I was indeed fortunate that you came along when you did.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kumus004.mp3: {Cold anger}You told Xarga what happened. You have shamed me in front of my commander and my fellow warriors.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kumus005.mp3: If you enter the jungle, may you never return.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kumus003.mp3: But our war will come one day.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gen_mand006.mp3: Revan may have won the last war. But our spirit isn't broken.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gen_mand005.mp3: The Onderonians avoid this moon. They are too weak to tame this place.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gen_mand016.mp3: {battle circle champ - trying to stifle some awe at the PC}Bralor is one of our mightiest warriors. Just to fight him is an honor. But to win...
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gen_mand015.mp3: {Davrel death}You defeated Davrel, hmmph. I hope he died honorably in battle.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gen_mand009.mp3: Your ship's pilot and gunner are both skilled. You destroyed many Onderon fighter craft in the recent space battle.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402kelborn049.mp3: I haven't seen anybody come around here yet. Keep looking to the west.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402kelborn032.mp3: Find out anything useful from them?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402kelborn040.mp3: They're Onderon military, although they were trying to be secret about it. I've got a feeling you're going to need all the help you can get.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402kelborn001.mp3: What are you doing out here? It's dangerous for your kind.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402kelborn025.mp3: Haven't found any sign of the ship. {Dismissive}Just this corpse here.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402kelborn023.mp3: I'm going to take up a position to the east. You go west. I'll make sure none of them get past me.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kelborn036.mp3: I thought I would see you again. No more scouts in the jungle, right? Together we made short work of them.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kelborn032.mp3: A worthy fight. With your lightsaber I know the outcome would've been different. The battle circle isn't about what's fair, it's about pushing yourself.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kelborn035.mp3: We won't fight again. I am curious if you could even defeat Bralor{BRAY-lor}. Now that would be a fight to see.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kelborn068.mp3: A man named Kavar wanted to get a hold of you urgently. He said that the Queen had arranged safe passage to Onderon for you.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kelborn007.mp3: He wouldn't tell me anything. Just that he wanted to see you. He said it was urgent. But that doesn't matter now.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kelborn049.mp3: This morning General Vaklu met with the Council of Lords and pronounced the Queen guilty of treason.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kelborn050.mp3: He'll be made Regent if Talia and her Royal Guard are defeated. The military's support is evenly divided. Iziz has fallen into civil war.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kelborn052.mp3: We can talk to him via satellite on Iziz. I'll contact him now.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kelborn074.mp3: We will send the strike force with you to clear a path through the jungle. Who will lead that expedition?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402sentry036.mp3: {Grim}You change your mind? Our leader still wants to speak to you.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402sentry001.mp3: If you head out into the jungle, stay alert. Our patrols keep the area clear of the more dangerous beasts, but a lot of the smaller ones still infest the paths.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402sentry005.mp3: Maalraas are aggressive, but hardly a challenge for a real warrior.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402sentry006.mp3: They're pack hunters, though, and dangerous in numbers. We try to thin their herds pretty regularly.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.402sentry033.mp3: You're wrong. By landing here, you've made it our business.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403bralor018.mp3: {Dark chuckle}This is not a battlefield, Jedi. If it were, I trust you wouldn't have the same opinion. I prepare and train, readying my mind and weaponry for a real challenge.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403bralor019.mp3: Peace is not our natural element. Mandalorians handle it differently. I focus on educating myself in the martial techniques I will need to succeed in the next war.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403bralor017.mp3: But I want to fight you with all your skill. Victory isn't important in the battle circle. What is important is discovering more about yourself and your opponent.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403bralor013.mp3: Learning from books or holovids is useless when battle rages and soldiers are dying around you. Real knowledge can only be gained through combat.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403bralor006.mp3: So I have learned much. The last Jedi I fought was in ship to ship battle on Malachor V. I lost, but was spared.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403bralor009.mp3: But our view was the narrow one. I see that clearly now. I sense we've both learned something today.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gategrd035.mp3: {zakkeg death w/ Davrel - gruff but actually appreciative}Davrel has already told me of your battle with the zakkeg. You robbed my men of a worthy test.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gategrd039.mp3: {doesn't believe the player can do it, but humoring him}And bring me back a trophy from your kill, as proof of the deed.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gategrd016.mp3: Their 'resistance' was laughable. We cut through their defenses like vibroblades through cloth. Iziz fell within hours.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gategrd017.mp3: If they knew we were here, they would eventually gather enough courage to attack us. It is not a battle we wish to wage... yet.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gategrd005.mp3: As ordered, the patrols have been pulled back, but they are ready to resume their duties on your order.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gategrd034.mp3: I hear you gave Davrel a warrior's death. You understand more of our ways than I thought.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403gategrd001.mp3: The scouts have reported no new activity since you were last here. The jungle has been quiet.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403kex034.mp3: My predecessor was loading equipment from Cache D5. Mandalorian engineers must've worked the double-shift on that one.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403mandalor068.mp3: {Player is caught snooping outside Mandalore's room}What do you want?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403mandalor072.mp3: [Failure] I could - but I don't know you. Once I get to know you I might tell you more, but not now.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403mandalor051.mp3: I was planning on heading to Iziz tomorrow. But I'll move up the timetable and take you now.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403mandalor034.mp3: I know. It made quite a racket. Good work.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403mandalor002.mp3: That ends now. No more fighting in our camp.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403mand_cs1005.mp3: {Irritated}Hnh. It is, like I promised. Why, you want to back out now?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403sith_att008.mp3: Seems trouble follows you on a regular basis.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403sarge072.mp3: Just fist and foot, like your fight with Davrel. Nothing else!
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga020.mp3: What a waste. Looks like I'll need to send a new recruit out sooner than I'd like.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga010.mp3: That idiot Kumus will be working off his shame for the rest of his days. Equipment eaten by cannoks - it would have been better if he'd let the jungle take him.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga005.mp3: I'm Xarga. I instruct our rawer Mandalorian recruits in the ways of discipline and battle.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga006.mp3: I sent one of my warriors, Kumus, into the jungle. It's been three days, and I want you to bring back his corpse and his survival pack.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga008.mp3: Good point. I don't want his body, just his equipment. Field strip the corpse and bring the gear back.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga031.mp3: Do as you will, but you won't impress anyone here by scavenging through the jungle for the gear of our fallen brothers.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga007.mp3: If Kumus wasn't dead he'd be back already. If you find his body, just bring it back.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga001.mp3: The forces we fought before are the same Sith allies that Vaklu is using now on Iziz.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga002.mp3: This moon is more than a staging base for them. It's important to them. But why... ?
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga028.mp3: General Vaklu is powerful and strong. But he has started his command with considerable turmoil.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga029.mp3: Will his skills be sufficient to enforce order? Only time will tell that.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga027.mp3: Tactics can be learned, but some elements of leadership are innate. This bodes well for her future.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.403xarga023.mp3: {Placeholder for Barkstring} {Yelling at his troops with passion} Mandalore will gather the scattered clans. We will triumph!
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.410xarga024.mp3: Without a stealth field the sensor will detect you. If any of the mines near it are triggered, it will detect you, as well.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.410xarga005.mp3: Hold a moment. Past the mines...
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.410xarga022.mp3: It is a sensor relay used by our enemy.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.410xarga015.mp3: Yes... Yes, that's what it is.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.410xarga016.mp3: That relay will detect anything that gets too close to it. Only a skilled stealth field operator can get by it safely.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.410xarga017.mp3: But unless all of you can use stealth generators, it will detect your group. Too bad, too, if you got by it undetected it could make your task much easier.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.410xarga021.mp3: Avoid the mines. If any of the ones close to the sensor are detonated, then we shouldn't even bother.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.410xarga019.mp3: Making detonation packs is complicated and dangerous.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.410xarga018.mp3: It's a wonder you've survived this long. Then by all means, proceed. I'm going to stay here. To observe.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.410xarga002.mp3: My troops will keep the path to the Mandalorian camp clear. Ahead lies the enemy.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.411xarga003.mp3: Kex believes that this is the Tomb of Freedon Nadd. We knew it was somewhere on this moon, we had no idea how close it was to our camp.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.411xarga006.mp3: Our priority here wasn't exploration. The mission was a covert salvage in force. We have successfully pursued that objective.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.411xarga007.mp3: Zuka didn't have our long-range sensors operational, either. If this camp hadn't been sending messages we may never have found it.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.411xarga004.mp3: Some sort of fallen Jedi. He conquered Onderon long ago, and became their king. The royal line is directly descended from him.
mandalor_other_radio1_unwell.601zherron045.mp3: What? Hear me, Jedi! I will see you dead and spit on your rotting corpse!

mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore108.mp3: {Player just did something nice for someone else, is commenting on it}We shouldn't waste our time with the weak.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore228.mp3: What did you want to talk about?
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore084.mp3: I never went to the surface, only the sky above it.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore070.mp3: Nar Shaddaa, home of the Hutts and the Exchange.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore045.mp3: Mandalorians have been around too long to be so dependent on such a tradition.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore025.mp3: There are two types of people to Mandalorians. Allies and enemies.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore004.mp3: The Republic thinks my people are dead, scattered. They are wrong.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore005.mp3: You should have destroyed us when you had the chance. As long as one Mandalorian lives, we will survive.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore180.mp3: Not always, and certainly not as obscure as she was before her departure. But I knew she had good reason, so I accepted her mission.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore164.mp3: But Revan refused, saying that he must travel alone.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore186.mp3: But Revan refused, saying that he must travel alone.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore187.mp3: When I offered to go with him... he laughed. Then, he attacked me.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore089.mp3: I'll fight beside you, but I'm warning you - don't get in my way.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.301attontmp003.mp3: {A little disgusted}Too many Mandalorians were scattered after the war. Without purpose and without direction, most became little more than raiders.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.003pcdead2012.mp3: More dead Jedi because of me... but this won't end like the Mandalorian Wars... I won't...
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.303lootra056.mp3: The strong take what they want. The weak fall.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kex016.mp3: But until then, Kex, you do what I say. And my orders are to let our guest have access to our supplies. Got it?
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403mand_cs2002.mp3: I'm not ready to part company yet. It sounds like you have a lot of traveling to do. So do I.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403mand_cs2011.mp3: But that's enough for now. We'll have time to talk later.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403mand_cs2004.mp3: {Deadpan - no comedy}I don't have it in me. It's a matter of self-interest.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.503tobin034.mp3: {Approval}I'll vouch for him. I know him from across a battlefield, that's the best way to learn about someone.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.511ro_sold004.mp3: I hope to build on that legacy.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.511tobin003.mp3: You should've seen it when the sky was filled with them. Their fighters crackling like small novas.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.605mandlead011.mp3: It is unfortunate that you feel that way. Perhaps I'll be able to change your mind.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.605mandlead013.mp3: Stay out of this - this is *my* fight.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.851851exp003.mp3: Was it in the target zone?
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.gblmandalore099.mp3: {Player misuses the Force, performs a Jedi mind trick, grumbling}More Jedi tricks.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403sarge074.mp3: Swords only. No items or the Jedi's Force. And no sword of the Jedi's choosing. Just a simple long blade.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403sarge056.mp3: {Sort of a ritual here}The Jedi has proven to be worthy of the battle circle, sergeant. Through deeds in battle and blood on field.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403sarge057.mp3: He may challenge the champion of today, and days past.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.303mandlead008.mp3: I thought we already went over this.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.303mandlead011.mp3: We might be able to work something out, if not for the fact that I don't want to talk to you.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.303mandlead009.mp3: You're not going to survive long on Nar Shaddaa if you don't change that.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.303mandlead007.mp3: There are a few of us in the galaxy. Now, what do you want?
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.605mandlead002.mp3: Just trying to make a living. At least there's still people in the galaxy who know our value.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.605mandlead003.mp3: It's not glamorous work, but a man has to eat, right?
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.605mandlead004.mp3: I've heard the rumors, too. There's no way I'm going to fight for some upstart warrior who styles himself as Mandalore.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.605mandlead005.mp3: We didn't pick a new Mandalore when the last one was killed, and maybe we're better off without one.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.605mandlead006.mp3: Look who's walked into our camp, boys. Mandalore himself has come to visit us.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.605mandlead009.mp3: And if I take that helmet from you, guess that makes me the new Mandalore? I've always wanted to be called that.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.605mandlead010.mp3: {Serious}I know all about your exploits, "Mandalore." We have fallen far in the past years, but even still, I will not stand idly while a usurper claims to be my leader.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.401manguide005.mp3: You want to hike through this jungle for hours, go ahead.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402davrel023.mp3: I am going back to camp and will tell them of our deed here.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus034.mp3: I can still hear a few bomas out there. Return here when you have dispatched them all.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus033.mp3: {A little quieter}I have only one request... please don't mention this incident to anyone.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus030.mp3: {Climbing sounds, and thud}It is strange that you still helped me, after what you said. I am... grateful for your actions. I'm returning to the Mandalorian camp now.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus001.mp3: You there. I... I am in need of assistance.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus026.mp3: {Frustrated anger}Do you expect me to beg? I am not going to barter for my life.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus027.mp3: {Takes a breath - trying to convince the PC to help him again}I only ask that you help a warrior face a more noble death... than this.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus007.mp3: This was the first site. After easily dispatching some malraas, I removed my pack and began to plant my charges along this ridge.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus008.mp3: When I finished setting the charges, I looked down to see cannoks swarming all over my pack. The pests were eating everything!
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus009.mp3: I killed the cannoks, but then a herd of bomas arrived. I had no more ammo - the extra energy cells I had brought had been in my pack.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus010.mp3: So I have been up here, weaponless, for two days.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus019.mp3: {A little disgusted in first sentence}Not everything is about barter and rewards. I only ask what any warrior deserves, a chance to die for a cause, not... starving and weaponless, at the mercy of beasts.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus024.mp3: [Failure] This is a matter of honor. I won't disgrace myself further by bartering for my life.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus022.mp3: [Success] There is truth in what you say. {Nods}If I make it back to the Mandalorian camp, I will see to it you are rewarded.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus021.mp3: {Being mind controlled}I... will reward you for your efforts. {Nods}If I make it back to the Mandalorian camp, I will see to it you are rewarded.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus015.mp3: I thought I could survive until another patrol came by, and then return to camp with my brothers.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus002.mp3: I am Kumus. And Xarga was not wrong in thinking me dead. We assume that any Mandalorian who does not report back within a day has been taken by the jungle.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kumus003.mp3: {Still stomaching the need to ask for help}I still live... I am just in a difficult situation.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kumus016.mp3: Commander Xarga was not pleased to hear I failed to accomplish my mission in the forest. It is fortunate that he does not know the whole story.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kumus017.mp3: You have my gratitude. I must work hard to erase my shame.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kumus014.mp3: I have little to offer except my gratitude. If that is not enough, then perhaps it would have been best if you'd left me to die in the jungle.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kumus013.mp3: [Failure] I will not disgrace myself further by paying for your silence.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kumus011.mp3: [Success] Very well. Here - take this. It is worth less than my gratitude, but perhaps it will satisfy you.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kumus002.mp3: If we only had more forces. We are so close to civil war that I can smell the blood of battle.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kumus018.mp3: Another war has ended without me. But the galaxy is in turmoil. My day will come.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn029.mp3: I found more of their scouts, but they started shooting as soon as they saw me.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn030.mp3: I heard blaster rifle fire coming from deeper in the jungle. You find anything?
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn048.mp3: {Approval}That's the way I would've handled it, as well. But I had my orders.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn031.mp3: I'm surprised they wouldn't talk to you. I thought their grudge was only with Mandalorians.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn047.mp3: {Slight disapproval, since player won't share info}Hnh. All right. I'm heading back to the camp to report to Mandalore. You've been helpful - whether you meant to be or not.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn052.mp3: One last thing about the battle circle... your actions have proven you worthy of facing our best in the circle.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn042.mp3: I searched their corpses. I'm pretty certain that they're Onderonian military, but without the tags. Could be a covert operation.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn045.mp3: The Onderonians would love to find us here, but I don't think three ships landing in this area in less than a day is a coincidence.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn043.mp3: The only thing the scouts had on them were weapons. No identity cards, no personal effects, and no evidence to figure out who they were if they died or were captured out here.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn044.mp3: It doesn't work that way. I've told you what I found, now you tell me what you've found.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn034.mp3: Tobin is General Vaklu's personal kath hound. If he's on your trail, you might want to steer clear of Onderon.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn039.mp3: Mandalore needs to know about the scouts. I'll let him know your role in dealing with them.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn037.mp3: General Vaklu is the cousin of Queen Talia. He's also in charge of the Onderon military.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn038.mp3: He led the Onderon resistance when we occupied their world during the Mandalorian Wars. He was a worthy foe, maybe more than a match for you.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn036.mp3: {He doesn't like being confronted on this point - he knows something he isn't telling the PC}They certainly weren't looking for us. They'd need a much larger detachment than this to prove a threat to us.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn035.mp3: Hnh. I'm not surprised. He was probably acting on orders from Vaklu. If so, you've made some dangerous enemies.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn028.mp3: {Admiring grunt}Hnh. You've shown promise by making it this far. Maybe you can prove your worth by giving me a hand.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn027.mp3: {Responding to "what do you mean, "my kind?""}For a Non-Mandalorian. Although you've shown promise by making it this far. Maybe you can prove your worth by giving me a hand.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn002.mp3: I am a Mandalorian scout. I don't go on patrols.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn026.mp3: {Shakes head}No, it wasn't them. That ship was damaged and screaming its ID signature all the way down.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn005.mp3: This one was trying to slip in quietly, and it was keeping its ion emissions to a minimum. Our sensors almost didn't pick it up.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn007.mp3: Looks like a scout, and pretty green, too. The fool walked right into a group of cannoks and got torn apart.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn010.mp3: {Scanning}He can't have been the only one crawling around here. If there's more, we need to take them out. {Turns back to the player}You up for some action?
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn019.mp3: There's more of these scouts in the jungle. There's many paths, and I don't want them to slip by.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn022.mp3: If we split up, we should be able to find their scouts. {Challenging tone}If you're up for it.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn012.mp3: Squeamish? Heh. Don't worry, I'm not planning on killing them unless I have to.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn016.mp3: But people do have a habit of shooting at Mandalorians on sight. If so, I wouldn't mind a good fight.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn015.mp3: People have a habit of shooting Mandalorians on sight. If so, I wouldn't mind a good fight.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn011.mp3: We can't let them find the camp, if that's what they're looking for. We need to track them down and make sure their trip here is real short.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402kelborn051.mp3: I hear of your match with Tagren. Hnh. I might. That's not what's important now. But that can't be the only reason why you're out here.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn039.mp3: So what are you here for?
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn044.mp3: You are that eager for a rematch? So am I, Jedi. You're more of a challenge than most of my brothers. Talk to the sergeant, I'm sure it can be arranged.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn041.mp3: We're taught not to. Mandalorians want to be tested to the limits of our abilities and beyond. We admire anyone who beats us on the battlefield.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn042.mp3: Instead of hate we study, practice and train until the next time, so we won't be beaten. But some young Mandalorians find this a hard lesson.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn043.mp3: Any veteran of the Mandalorian Wars respects Jedi like you. Your actions on Dxun validate this. But we aren't a simple people.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn040.mp3: No, I can't. We all have our orders, Jedi.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn038.mp3: The sergeant chooses who fights who, but I would eagerly fight you in the battle circle.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn093.mp3: Your fight with Bralor was brilliant. You are truly a warrior of Mandalorian proportions.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn006.mp3: But I don't know how good their offer is anymore.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn009.mp3: He'll be made Regent if Talia and her Royal Guard are defeated. The military is divided on who to support. Civil war has fallen on Iziz.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn011.mp3: I doubt that Queen Talia and her advisor will survive until nightfall.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn012.mp3: The balance of forces seemed to favor Queen Talia. The Royal Palace is heavily fortified and defensible, and most of the soldiers are loyal to her.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn013.mp3: But Vaklu has new allies: Sith soldiers and their masters. The war has also driven the caged beasts in the streets mad.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn014.mp3: Bralor{BRAY-lor} and I both concur. She doesn't stand a chance.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn017.mp3: Y - Yes, yes we have. How... ? We picked up some transmissions from nearby in the jungle.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn020.mp3: We only have our shuttle sensors, so we know nothing more than that.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn028.mp3: Mandalorian warriors will go with you to find the enemy camp. Just let me know when you want to head out.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn029.mp3: If you need supplies, talk with Kex. After you get into the jungle you might not have another opportunity to stock up.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn030.mp3: Let me know if you want to go now.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn031.mp3: As you wish. Mandalore has arranged for special transportation to get to Iziz.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn018.mp3: Zuka's satellite relay has also picked up several shuttle launches with old Sith transmitter IDs. Some sort of staging base, perhaps.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn010.mp3: I'm afraid so. I doubt that Queen Talia and her advisor will survive until nightfall.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn046.mp3: You received my message, then? Colonel Tobin contacted us.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn047.mp3: He arranged safe passage to Onderon for you. But I don't know if his offer still stands.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn067.mp3: The Colonel has transmitted the tomb's coordinates, and I've got a strike force of Mandalorians ready to go.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn051.mp3: The war is part of their plans? Then perhaps his invitation is still valid. There is a great deal of chaos on the streets of Iziz, but I can try to contact Colonel Tobin.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn004.mp3: Are you ready to head to the enemy base? It will be a long journey through the jungle.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn003.mp3: Does your journey go well? Last communication I heard indicates that the war still rages on Iziz.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn001.mp3: I hear you handled Iziz adequately. Mandalore has left me in charge until he has finished his journey to reuinite the clans.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kelborn002.mp3: If there is any change planetside I'll send you a message.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402sentry014.mp3: Stop, right there. You are not permitted into our camp without an escort.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402sentry002.mp3: Mostly cannoks and maalraas. Deeper in the jungle, there's boma beasts, and they're a little more sport.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402sentry008.mp3: Bomas are tough and fiercely territorial. Whenever we drive them off, they just come back to reclaim their grazing lands.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.402sentry015.mp3: Hold it right there. We've got you surrounded.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor010.mp3: So the Jedi Order isn't completely dead. You always had hidden strengths - very hard for even the wisest Mandalore to judge and predict.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor011.mp3: {He speaks with respect - he holds the Jedi no animosity for beating him, just admiration}I have studied much of the Jedi since our defeat. I would be honored to cross blades with you in the battle circle.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor015.mp3: You talk with the sergeant. Today is his day to preside over the circle. Each fight is different because the Mandalorian with greater honor dictates the terms of the engagement.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor016.mp3: But there will be no terms if we fight. Everyone else will deny you your lightsaber and the use of your "Force."
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor014.mp3: Perhaps we can learn from one another, in time.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor022.mp3: I could only do that if I observed you fight an enemy in real combat. I have seen your matches so far, and I do not doubt your worthiness to face me.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor023.mp3: But the rules cannot be changed. The other champion, Kelborn, is in the jungle on a mission. Perhaps your paths will cross, and you will have your opportunity there.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor007.mp3: Before the Mandalorian Wars we looked at Jedi as weak. Their code restricted their full potential. The Jedi were limited by a narrow sense of morality that couldn't survive a real war.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor008.mp3: But our view was the narrow one. I see that clearly now. I sense we've both learned something today. We can fight again if you like.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor005.mp3: And so I lose again. I still have much to learn. The last Jedi I fought was in a ship-to-ship battle on Malachor V. I lost, but was spared.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor002.mp3: But the Sith change everything. Because of their aid, Vaklu stands poised to win this war.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor024.mp3: Even if Vaklu is successful in usurping Queen Talia, in the long run alliances with the Sith never end well.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor021.mp3: General Vaklu will make a formidable ally for you.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403bralor020.mp3: I hear that your help was instrumental to Queen Talia's victory in the civil war.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403gategrd009.mp3: But without our patrols some of the larger beasts may be around. None of us will be around to bail you out of trouble. You've been warned.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403gategrd026.mp3: {Implying the player can't handle a zakkeg at end}We heard reports of a zakkeg wandering the paths around there. They're a good challenge - for Mandalorians.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403gategrd022.mp3: I don't know. Dxun's all jungle except for this camp.

mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kex024.mp3: I'm Kex, the new quartermaster. If a Mandalorian needs something, they come to me.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kex025.mp3: {Irritated that Mandalore gave the player permission}Mandalore's ordered me to let you have access to our supplies, including some military-grade surplus.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kex038.mp3: The only advice I'll give you is when you're in the jungle, shoot anything that moves. Then shoot the things that don't move, just to be sure.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kex031.mp3: The greatest honor for a Mandalorian is to distinguish themselves in battle. But as age comes upon us, some are forced to find honor in other pursuits.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kex032.mp3: They assist as freighter pilots, technicians, or quartermasters. There is honor there, but it's nothing compared to the heat of battle.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kex033.mp3: {Bitter}For someone young like me, this task is distasteful. There are many battles left in me. Yet I am relegated to... this.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kex035.mp3: The old quartermaster was carrying out a load of blast converters and walked straight into a beam splitter. Pieces of him wound up all over.
mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kex036.mp3: So I got the job. And here I am.

mandalor_other_m3_radio1.403kex030.mp3: I won't - as long as the Mandalore's orders stand. If he wants you dead, though, then I'm going to be the first one gunning for you.

mandalor_other_m2.402kumus020.mp3: If you wish to aid me, then kill the boma beasts that surround this place, let me return to my brothers, and let the honor of the deed be your reward.
mandalor_other_m2.402kumus023.mp3: I was a fool to ask for your aid. Leave me - I'll take my chances with the beasts.
mandalor_other_m2.402kumus018.mp3: Your actions are worthy of a Mandalorian. Return here when you have slain the beasts, and I will be able to return to camp.
mandalor_other_m2.402kumus017.mp3: My blaster rifle has been useless ever since I used it to bash in a cannok's skull.
mandalor_other_m2.402kumus014.mp3: Even if I got by the bomas, there are too many beasts between here and the checkpoint. Bravery is commendable, but there is no honor in suicide.
mandalor_other_m2.402kumus004.mp3: I am Kumus, a Mandalorian warrior. My brothers believe me dead. Without aid, they shall soon be right.
mandalor_other_m2.403kumus006.mp3: I was able to make it back to camp without encountering any other beasts. You have my gratitude.
mandalor_other_m2.403kumus010.mp3: {A little disapproving}I forgot you are not a Mandalorian... we do not typically take payment in exchange for life.
mandalor_other_m2.403kumus012.mp3: We have nothing more to say to each other. Now leave me alone.
mandalor_other_m2.403kumus009.mp3: I promised a reward, and I will honor it. Take this - you have deserved it.
mandalor_other_m2.403kumus008.mp3: {A little quieter}Please don't tell anyone what happened. If the others were to know, I would be disgraced.
mandalor_other_m2.403kumus001.mp3: I did well in the battle before you left. Xarga said he may make a warrior of me yet.
mandalor_other_m2.403gen_mand007.mp3: The Republic lost many of their forces taking Dxun. For every Mandalorian soldier who fell, the Republic paid with ten of theirs.
mandalor_other_m2.403gen_mand004.mp3: Dxun is a dangerous place. Never drop your guard.
mandalor_other_m2.403gen_mand002.mp3: None of the Sith escaped. They dared try to ambush us.
mandalor_other_m2.403gen_mand017.mp3: {He's at a loss for words and grudgingly compliments the PC}You're accomplishments are... noteworthy.
mandalor_other_m2.403gen_mand011.mp3: {zakkeg}I heard you defeated a zakkeg. That is an achievement.
mandalor_other_m2.403gen_mand010.mp3: You wouldn't face Davrel in combat? That is a sign of weakness in you, and you dishonor him with your cowardice.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry012.mp3: Even the bravest Mandalorians have fallen prey to this jungle and its beasts. Don't say I didn't warn you.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry010.mp3: {Mildly curious how the PC knew about them. The clear implication in his tone is only a Mandalorian could face a Zakkeg}How do you know of the zakkeg? We've seen signs along the paths. They are naturally armored and have foul dispositions. Mandalorian expeditions cleared them out of the area.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry011.mp3: {His tone should make it clear he is looking forward to hunting zakkeg again once the annoying intruders like the PC are dealt with}But Dxun beasts never take kindly to losing territory. As soon as ship activity dies out around here we may hunt them again.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry007.mp3: What's the point? They breed fast, and other than sport, they're a waste of ammo.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry003.mp3: Little pests. They'll eat anything they can fit in their mouths, so don't leave any gear and supplies lying around unless you want them to end up in a cannok's belly.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry004.mp3: They aren't very aggressive, though. Just don't get too close to them, and they'll leave you alone.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry018.mp3: {Military tone, slightly impressed by the player}I'm surprised you got this far - the jungle doesn't usually let its prey go that easily. {No threat in this question, but military-like}What are you doing here?
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry020.mp3: Why does everyone except Mandalorians hold grudges after battle? We were both tested, and your side proved more formidable. We honor you for it.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry021.mp3: {"Test each other again" is his way of suggesting the player fights them - the sentry would like to fight but has been ordered not to}We're both veterans, and we can test each other again if you choose. But I have orders. So answer my question, why are you here?
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry034.mp3: {A little condescending}If we were planning to attack you, then we would have opened fire as soon as you entered the clearing.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry035.mp3: You left yourself exposed on both sides, and you would have been little more than target practice for us.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry032.mp3: That was a joke, right?{slight non-plussed grunt} It'll be interesting to see how long you keep your sense of humor here.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry031.mp3: We expected as much. Few visit Dxun by choice.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry022.mp3: {Proud, then threatening}I am a Mandalorian warrior, and this area you're "exploring" is our territory.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry025.mp3: We have orders to escort you to our camp - our leader wants to speak to you.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry028.mp3: No one enters the camp without an escort. Try it, and you'll have to get through us.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry029.mp3: We've got no orders to fight you. {Pleased at the prospect of battle}But we will defend ourselves.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry030.mp3: {Pleased}Looks like there'll be bloodshed before the day is over, after all. For the glory of Mandalore!
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry026.mp3: {Some satisfaction that the PC is resisting}You are coming with us. I am supposed to escort you peacefully. But the alternative is quite acceptable.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry027.mp3: {A quiet and threatening tone, kind of cocky, too}So your choice is - follow us as our guest or see how Mandalorians have earned their reputation.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry019.mp3: We claimed this moon decades ago when we reforged ourselves after Exar Kun's defeat. Some of us call it home. Why are you trespassing here?
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry2002.mp3: I have nothing to say to you.
mandalor_other_m2.402sentry2001.mp3: That is enough! You're completely surrounded, Jedi. You will follow me. Now.
mandalor_other_m2.403bralor001.mp3: Though General Vaklu commands the loyalty of many officers and troops, the majority of troops support the Queen.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd036.mp3: But you have gained some honor for yourself in the process. You'd make a formidable Mandalorian.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd032.mp3: If you head outside the camp, remember that there won't be any patrols around to bail you out of trouble if you run across any of the larger beasts. You've been warned.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd008.mp3: We've called off our patrols outside the camp. We usually find some entertainment in clearing out the worst of the beasts.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd027.mp3: If you see one, stay out of its way. Without us to back you up, you'll be dead in seconds.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd028.mp3: It's a huge, red lizard that's built like a Baragwin battle tank. It has a hide so thick it might as well be durasteel plating.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd029.mp3: We keep clearing them out of the area, but they keep coming back. They're tough opponents... for non-Mandalorians.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd030.mp3: {Incredulous}You, fight a zakkeg? If you survived such a battle, you'd gain much honor.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd031.mp3: Strong words. It would be amusing to see you try to kill such a beast. Try the outlying jungle paths, if you're determined to seek one out.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd025.mp3: We're looking into it. With your help, the relay dish is working again, so we aren't blind to the rest of the planet.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd018.mp3: Who knows? Our relay dish is down, and until Zuka repairs it, we're blind.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd019.mp3: The Onderon military has cordoned off the planet, so there shouldn't be anybody else down here. Still, our sensors occasionally pick up signals on the surface.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd021.mp3: It's like someone is searching the planet, and doing so under the noses of the military. Whoever they are, they've stayed clear of us.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd023.mp3: If you want to pitch in, go ahead. Zuka hasn't been able to get the damn thing up and running.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd024.mp3: {A little sarcastic at Zuka's expense in the second sentence}You can find him in the eastern side of camp, just south of the hangars. Look for the sparking wires, and he won't be far.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd011.mp3: Our sensors picked up three ships landing in this area after the space battle.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd012.mp3: If any of the Onderon "military" come searching for those ships, we don't want them finding our base.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd015.mp3: The people of Onderon still live in fear of us. They were the first world we conquered in the Mandalorian Wars.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd013.mp3: I don't know. It was some sort of freighter. It didn't land in any of the clearings along the path.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd014.mp3: Knowing some of the larger Dxun beasts, the crew's probably already dead.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd038.mp3: You obviously have a small understanding of our ways. Hearsay is not acceptable proof of your accomplishments. Bring me a trophy from your kill.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd004.mp3: {To Mandalore}The perimeter is secure, Mandalore. There have been sightings of some of the larger beasts, but none near the camp.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd003.mp3: {Looking forward to revenge in the second sentence}We have doubled our sentries and set up more perimeter sensors. I hope the Sith attack us again.
mandalor_other_m2.403gategrd033.mp3: Word has spread that you have defeated Bralor. The story of that battle will be told in our clan for years to come. Safe journey to you.
mandalor_other_m2.403mandalor059.mp3: Onderon is a recent addition to the Republic, joining during one of the darker eras in Republic history. Since joining, the Republic has endured many wars and great battles.
mandalor_other_m2.403mandalor021.mp3: Don't you think they tried? It's real easy to hide things in a jungle. Even when they found some of our caches, our engineers left them some 'presents.'
mandalor_other_m2.403mandalor006.mp3: Many Mandalorians have fallen from the path of honor and are now no more than common mercenaries. But that is changing.
mandalor_other_m2.403mand_cs1016.mp3: You've got some guts, talking to me like that. You think your age or your Jedi whelp are going to keep you safe from me?
mandalor_other_m2.403tagren002.mp3: Jedi couldn't have beaten us in the Mandalorian Wars. It took a fallen Jedi to gain that honor.

mandalor_other_m4_radio1.gblmandalore245.mp3: {Succeeds with critical hit}Ha! More where that came from!
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.403manguide001.mp3: Ready to head back to your ship? Give the word, and I'll take you there.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402davrel018.mp3: They are heavily armored. They aren't particularly agile, but if they connect it can be deadly.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402davrel017.mp3: We go into the clearing and attack it. Either it dies, or we do. Beasts of the jungle are fierce and powerful. Straightforward plans work the best.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402davrel001.mp3: You finally arrive, Jedi. I seek to reclaim the honor that you stole from me. I challenge you here, outside of the battle circle.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402davrel014.mp3: Now you face a true Mandalorian on the field of battle!
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402davrel006.mp3: You would deny my request? I want to fight here, in front of other Mandalorians to prove my worth. Do not shame me further.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402davrel008.mp3: A zakkeg? Those are the deadliest beasts in this part of the jungle. Patrols are right to be cautious about them.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.403davrel008.mp3: But there are others already here who are more than your equal. Bralor{BRAY-lor} is one of the mightiest among us. He could teach you humility.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402kumus035.mp3: {More defiant, angry}May the jungle take you, and I hope your death shall be slower than mine.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402kumus028.mp3: {Resolved}If you will not aid me, then we have nothing more to say to each other. Leave me.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402kumus012.mp3: {Growing more angry}I do not need you to echo my failures to me. I need your aid.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402kumus013.mp3: {Very angry}Enough of this! If you are here only to mock me, then leave!
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.402sentry009.mp3: We can handle them, but they may be too much for you.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.403kex042.mp3: So the mighty Jedi is defeated by the lowly quartermaster. If you ever want to enter the battle circle again, I'll be there!
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.403sarge016.mp3: No weapons, no Jedi tricks, and no items. Just fist and foot. A true test of strength.
mandalor_other_m4_radio1.403xarga009.mp3: You're wrong, it is my business. While you're a guest in this camp, you can start earning your way.

mandalor_radio.003t3kelbrn005.mp3: {Holographic Kelborn appears}I received an urgent communication for you from Colonel Tobin. Return to the camp as soon as possible and I will tell you more.
mandalor_radio.003t3kelbrn004.mp3: {Holographic Kelborn appears}I received an urgent communication for you from Kavar. Return to the camp as soon as possible and I will tell you more.
mandalor_radio.403kex004.mp3: {At attention}Mandalore, Quartermaster Kex on duty. What do you need?

mira_disappointed.gblmira209.mp3: {Generic dark side reaction, a little wary}Do you feel that? It's like something just... stepped on my heart.

mira_disappointed.gblmira112.mp3: {Slight reprimand}Well, before you get too teary-eyed, Hanharr figured Czerka had the right idea.

mira_disappointed.gblmira108.mp3: {Quiet, still hasn't figured this out}Like he was begging someone else to kill him. And I felt sorry for him.
mira_disappointed.gblmira104.mp3: And he kept hunting me ever since. He said he'd pursue me to the edge of the galaxy, no matter where I ran, he would find me - and break me.
mira_disappointed.gblmira105.mp3: That I would always be prey.
mira_disappointed.gblmira106.mp3: {Doubtlful}Maybe... I've thought about that moment. A lot. And wondered if I would do things differently if I had another chance.
mira_disappointed.gblmira109.mp3: [Influence: Failure] You know, it's a long story, and I'm kind of tired of talking about it right now - maybe some other time. It's not much to hear anyway.
mira_disappointed.gblmira084.mp3: Hanharr's tough. Really tough. And when he loses it, it's like nothing can stop him.
mira_disappointed.gblmira082.mp3: Tell me about it. Like I said, I get the impression a life debt's supposed to be a gift, but to Hanharr it's more like a curse, to both people involved.
mira_disappointed.gblmira061.mp3: No idea - he's just 'Hanharr.' I hope there aren't any more like him.
mira_disappointed.gblmira058.mp3: {Shrugs}No idea - he was always just 'Hanharr.' I hope there aren't any more like him.
mira_disappointed.gblmira199.mp3: [Influence: Failure] It's a long story, and I don't want to get into it. Maybe some other time.
mira_disappointed.gblmira041.mp3: It's what happens after the wars are over that you don't hear much about.
mira_disappointed.gblmira051.mp3: Not unless I have to. And bounty hunters... the good ones... don't ever need to kill a target.
mira_disappointed.gblmira048.mp3: I'm good at finding people. Because when they're lost or out-of-place... it's like something's wrong, inside them. And that's why I hunt.
mira_disappointed.gblmira190.mp3: Yeah, I know. I saw the worlds they left behind them during the war.
mira_disappointed.gblmira191.mp3: That kind of stays with you - I haven't forgotten it. What happened at Malachor - they, they probably deserved it.
mira_disappointed.gblmira026.mp3: It's got a life to it, activity. Aliens, people, refugees... it's like noise, but relaxing. Like the hum of a hyperdrive.
mira_disappointed.gblmira027.mp3: No arguments here. Still, as long as you accept it, the place isn't so bad. Better than sitting here... in silence.

mira_disappointed.gblmira147.mp3: {Can't really describe it.}Your face... you, well, you have this glow. I mean, not a real glow, but...
mira_disappointed.gblmira140.mp3: For the first time, I feel in control. I feel... powerful.
mira_disappointed.gblmira222.mp3: Whatever, don't worry about it - it's just a sore subject with me.

mira_disappointed.301miratch025.mp3: {Start laughing, but weakly}Are you going to train me?
