tobin.506tobin009.mp3: In order to get to the throne room we'll have to open the outer and inner security doors. There are security terminals to the north and south.
tobin.506tobin010.mp3: Both terminals need to be deactivated to open the way to the throne room. Which means you'll have to deal with the Sith to the north, and Talia's Royal Guard to the south.
tobin.506tobin011.mp3: My officer will catch up to you once you've secured one of the terminals. He can escort you back here quickly, if you desire.
tobin.506tobin016.mp3: {Sounds vaguely murderous}Yes, he's caused a lot of problems. He'll be at one of the security terminals.
tobin.506tobin012.mp3: Then we deal with Talia and her hand-picked soldiers. And you'll have to face Master Kavar.
tobin.511tobin001.mp3: Did you have to land in a Basilisk? We have vivid memories of the last time they fell to Iziz. The men still aren't convinced that there isn't a Mandalorian invasion.
tobin.511tobin008.mp3: The General is coming right now to... brief... you. Thank you for coming here.
tobin.511tobin006.mp3: {Responding to a serious understatement by the PC - the first line should invite a chuckle}You have convenient access to a Basilisk? What else do you have access to? Regardless...
tobin.511tobin005.mp3: He's in the Royal Palace with Queen Talia and her guard.
tobin.851851tobin024.mp3: The Master suffers... if he cannot feed, then the hunger begins to consume him. The planet... Telos... He may feed on something upon its surface to sustain him awhile longer.
tobin.851851tobin026.mp3: {Quietly, slight fear and slight despair}I told him, you know... what the old woman told me. I told him of the Academy here... of the Jedi here. I... could not have kept it from him, even if I had wanted to.
tobin.851851tobin028.mp3: Yes... the old woman on Onderon. She spoke of the Jedi Academy, here, on Telos... and my Master was forced to come here.
tobin.851851tobin029.mp3: Then her lies will mean the planet's destruction... he will destroy all of Telos. He will turn it to fire again and crush the planet beneath him.
tobin.851851tobin043.mp3: You are dust motes in a storm... a grain upon the beach... and as insignificant as a body that orbits the graveyard of Malachor.
tobin.851851tobin052.mp3: It is because he sees planets, stars... not people. To him, the planet below, the station with its teeming life, only that is massive enough to demand his attention.
tobin.851851tobin037.mp3: You could not stop him even if you wanted to - and you cannot escape, either. If the Force runs through you, he will feed on it when Citadel Station dies.
tobin.851851tobin036.mp3: You cannot stop him - nothing can. And you cannot escape, either. If the Force runs through you, he will feed on it when Citadel Station dies.
tobin.851851tobin010.mp3: [Failure] Onderon is already doomed... better a quick death at the hands of the Sith than a slow death at the hands of the Republic.

tobin_radio.403kelborn053.mp3: It is good to see you. We tried to delay the war as long as possible to give you enough time to receive our message and get here.
tobin_radio.403kelborn054.mp3: But the Sith could only be delayed for so long. Still, your arrival is timely.
tobin_radio.403kelborn055.mp3: The war goes well, but victory is not yet certain. Much of the city is under our control, but we still need to wrest the Merchant Quarter from Queen Talia's forces.
tobin_radio.403kelborn056.mp3: We need you to spearhead the assault on the Merchant Quarter and the attack on the Royal Palace. But we also need you to tend to the Sith Lord's forces.
tobin_radio.403kelborn058.mp3: The Sith Lord has been using an ancient tomb on Dxun as their base in the system. That tomb isn't too far from your encampment.
tobin_radio.403kelborn059.mp3: You need to assemble a group that can eliminate the Sith at the tomb. We'll coordinate with Kelborn when you're ready to strike.
tobin_radio.403kelborn060.mp3: After they're attacked there, the Sith will turn on us, so we'll need you here with us. You'll have to divide your forces.
tobin_radio.403kelborn061.mp3: We need your skills on the planet. You should select someone you trust to lead the group to attack the Sith camp.
tobin_radio.403kelborn064.mp3: I'm no historian, but I think it's the tomb of an ancient leader. In any event, it doesn't matter.
tobin_radio.403kelborn065.mp3: Eliminating the Sith there and stopping whatever they are doing is all that's important.
tobin_radio.403kelborn066.mp3: The battle rages nearby. Find some sort of transport to the Merchant Quarter. General Vaklu will meet you personally when you arrive.
tobin_radio.403kelborn063.mp3: Your leadership and skill towers over your companions'. Plus, there is no one else who could defeat Master Kavar.
tobin_radio.403kelborn062.mp3: I look forward to working with you in person.
tobin_radio.403kelborn057.mp3: General Vaklu is prepared to make a generous offer when you meet. But before that we need you take care of the Sith Lord's base of operations.
tobin_radio.506tobin002.mp3: {[Several Vaklu soldiers are lined up in this room, waiting to storm the Throne Room. Show the beast in the background battering away at the Force field blocking the throne room.  Sound of beast roaring]}{Recovers from panic but sounds unsteady for the first line}I'm impressed you made it this far. But you are too late. Soon the Queen will be dead, and General Vaklu will be the new King.
tobin_radio.506tobin003.mp3: This is no ordinary door between us. The same material is used for the hull of capital class vessels. I'm afraid you will find it quite impregnable.
tobin_radio.506tobin005.mp3: That would sound so much more convincing if you were on the other side of the door. Now if you will excuse me, we have one last barrier to take care of.
tobin_radio.506tobin004.mp3: I'm afraid it is. Now if you will excuse me, we have one last barrier to take care of.

tobin_other_1.503tobin021.mp3: I... meant no offense. I am sorry.
tobin_other_1.851851tobin018.mp3: I have served the wrong Master... he cares nothing for Onderon, its soldiers, its people.
tobin_other_1.851851tobin019.mp3: Everything exists... to feed his will. I came here, to this dead ship... and now he will not permit me to leave.

tobin_unwell_2.506tobin022.mp3: Oh blast it all!{Tobin turns to face the beast.}
tobin_unwell_2.853nihtobin002.mp3: {Choking}Lord, I... bring news... of the Jedi...
tobin_unwell_2.851851tobin055.mp3: {Sickened, tired - when Tobin is encountered here, he is trapped on a Sith ship, being slowly eaten away by Dark Side energy}Have you come... to kill me? You Jedi are masters of cruelty... letting me take back my home... only to die here, far from Onderon.
tobin_unwell_2.851851tobin020.mp3: This ship... it is a graveyard of a terrible battle. Everything on it slowly dies as long as he hungers.
tobin_unwell_2.851851tobin048.mp3: He holds it together. And he keeps us all alive, just enough, like rotworms within a dying beast.
tobin_unwell_2.851851tobin050.mp3: {Whispers, shakes head}No, not Jedi. Not Jedi at all.
tobin_unwell_2.851851tobin007.mp3: What would you have me do?

tobin_unwell_1.853nihtobin003.mp3: A place... where you may feed...
tobin_unwell_1.853nihtobin005.mp3: {He is dropped, gasping} ...enough for you to free Onderon...
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin013.mp3: Then do so... there is nothing for me here. My hopes for Onderon have turned gray... kill me now, before they are stripped from me forever.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin016.mp3: General Vaklu and I... when it seemed that we would need more to take Onderon... make it strong again... he came.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin017.mp3: {Quietly}With his power, his soldiers, it seemed as if there was nothing we could not do - nothing the Queen could do to stop us.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin025.mp3: You think to lie to me still? I will not be deceived again.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin030.mp3: He will devour them all, murder them all...
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin039.mp3: On the bridge. He waits on the bridge.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin040.mp3: {Mocking}Waiting for you? No, he does not wait for you.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin044.mp3: Fight him if you will... but if he turns his power upon you, you will be destroyed.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin045.mp3: This ship... is it his weakness? It should not exist, yet it cruises the darkness between the stars.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin046.mp3: He tore it from the mass shadows of Malachor, along with his fleet... that is a measure of his power.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin038.mp3: Your time... your life... will end here.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin035.mp3: He will create nothing... he will end this place. Your old woman has killed this planet, and with it, countless other worlds that depend on its survival.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin014.mp3: He happened - the hunger that fills this vessel... it is power... but it consumes without end.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin015.mp3: It is that power we felt on Onderon, that Vaklu felt... it was an echo, too strong to ignore.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin003.mp3: There is nothing to be done except wait. If you go to him, he will destroy you... and your last moments shall be of shadow... and pain.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin005.mp3: [Success] Onderon... but - there's no longer any need...
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin006.mp3: You are right... as long as he exists, Onderon is in danger. The galaxy is in danger.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin009.mp3: I will do as you ask... for Onderon's sake.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin004.mp3: There is nothing to be done. By coming here, you are already dead.
tobin_unwell_1.851851tobin002.mp3: {Hisses at second sentence}You are right... the choice was mine. {Hisses, accusing}And you knew what would happen to me.

tobin_unwell.853nihtobin006.mp3: {Echoes quietly to himself, knows that Nihilus never cared for Onderon, that it was all for nothing}Enough for you to free Onderon.
tobin_unwell.851851tobin001.mp3: {Sickened, tired - when Tobin is encountered here, he is trapped on a Sith ship, being slowly eaten away by Dark Side energy}Have you come... to kill me? The final insult... stripping Onderon, my soldiers, my home from me... only to have me die here.

om_scout2.402om_sc1002.mp3: He got swarmed by those little beasts... I think they're called cannoks.

taepalae.402om_sc2002.mp3: {Lt is said in a crisp military tone to break the Lieutenant's introspection}Lieutenant, two of our scout patrols have not reported back.
taepalae.605taepalae021.mp3: Jorran{JOE-ron} knew the risks. He wouldn't do anything different if he were in our situation.
taepalae.605taepalae020.mp3: You must have saved Jorran. He didn't want to talk about what happened down there. He looked scared.
taepalae.605taepalae019.mp3: You saved Jorran, huh? Hope the reward was worth it for saving that sad excuse for a salvager.
taepalae.605taepalae018.mp3: Jorran says you saved him down there. Next time you should ask for a reward.
taepalae.605taepalae001.mp3: Who are we missing? We're one off...
taepalae.605taepalae003.mp3: That runt of a kath hound, *he's* the one with the backpack! Did anybody grab anything from the room? {She pauses her waiting for one of her flunkies to answer - then an exasperated}Anybody?
taepalae.605taepalae004.mp3: {She's looking for an outlet for her anger - the player will do just fine}What do *you* want?
taepalae.605taepalae017.mp3: So the pup thinks she can start bossing us around. Watch yourself. We've been here a lot longer. Lots of possible accidents if you cross us.
taepalae.605taepalae013.mp3: So the pup thinks he can start bossing us around. Watch yourself. We've been here a lot longer. Plenty of "accidents" happen to people that don't respect the rules.
taepalae.605taepalae014.mp3: All I see is fresh meat for the laigreks{LAY-grex}. Don't even think of threatening us. That's a battle you can't win.
taepalae.605taepalae015.mp3: I don't have time for this. Jorran{JOE-ron} is on his own. If he can survive all those laigreks let him keep the flaming artifact.
taepalae.605taepalae012.mp3: You won't find *anything* there except on the lowest sublevel. And there you'll only find death. Laigreks{LAY-grex} are everywhere.
taepalae.605taepalae005.mp3: I manage to get this sad lot of salvagers to work together. Then we get two rooms into the sublevel and we get swarmed by laigreks. And even then we fight our way out.
taepalae.605taepalae006.mp3: But of course the only one that managed to grab the salvage is still in there. I don't even know why I bothered.
taepalae.605taepalae010.mp3: I'm not going to tell you that. If you do rescue him you'll just have to claim on the salvage. Jedi artifacts are rare enough these days without some newcomer coming in.
taepalae.605taepalae011.mp3: So stay out of it and we won't have a problem.
taepalae.605taepalae008.mp3: Are you kidding? Course we aren't! He's on his own. I only wish he didn't have the salvage on him.
taepalae.605taepalae009.mp3: Now if you don't mind, we're going someplace you can't eavesdrop on us and get down to our business.
taepalae.605taepalae007.mp3: Nothing. Find out for yourself. I'm not interested in training the competition.

zukabark_other_1.403mand_cs1002.mp3: They check out, Mandalore. All systems are green.
zukabark_other_1.403sith_att003.mp3: {Very loud - he is crying out to the camp}Mandalorians, we've got company! Stealthed targets have breached our perimeter!
zukabark_other_1.403zuka004.mp3: {Fixing a console, then it breaks}All right, stand back. Let's see if that...
zukabark_other_1.403zuka005.mp3: Sith's blood! Fixing anything in this rot-infested place is an uphill battle!

zukabark.403sith_att001.mp3: {Close up of Zuka - he sounds puzzled}Hmmmm...
zukabark.403sith_att002.mp3: {Walks over to some of his equipment - he mutters this line quietly}One... Two... Three...
zukabark.403zuka058.mp3: {Placeholder Text for Barkstring}{Aggravated}Damn it! The jungle is taking over everything. This place is a mess.
zukabark.403zuka056.mp3: The Onderon military has stepped up their presence around Onderon. If you try to go back there in your ship, they'll blast you into space dust.
zukabark.403zuka057.mp3: They're blockading any Republic ships from landing on the planet. Looks like your little space battle has made the military dig in its heels.
zukabark.403zuka033.mp3: The systems are working now. You have my gratitude.
zukabark.403zuka035.mp3: Any progress with the repairs or the phase-pulse converter?
zukabark.403zuka050.mp3: I don't know how, but these pieces look in good enough shape to repair. I'll have the telemetry computer repaired in no time.
zukabark.403zuka054.mp3: {Amused reply - he's not offended the PC asked}That's pretty mercenary of you. A lot of us have been down that road recently.
zukabark.403zuka055.mp3: Here's some credits. I appreciate the help. Now I have some work to do.
zukabark.403zuka051.mp3: I'll be sure to tell Mandalore how much help you've been. I know you didn't ask, but here's a reward anyway.
zukabark.403zuka052.mp3: Mandalorians are expected to do anything they can to help. But you're a stranger, and you didn't have to help us.
zukabark.403zuka053.mp3: {A little skeptical}All right, if you say so. Again, you have my gratitude.
zukabark.403zuka048.mp3: Those pieces are in fine shape. There's still one piece missing, though. Bring that to me, and I'll try and fix the telemetry computer.
zukabark.403zuka045.mp3: Well, it looks like the phase-pulse converter's been broken into three pieces. The cannoks must have been fighting over it.
zukabark.403zuka046.mp3: This piece is in good enough shape to repair. If you find more of them, bring them to me.
zukabark.403zuka041.mp3: Good. That means we're no longer blind down here. I'll make sure Mandalore hears about this.
zukabark.403zuka042.mp3: Whenever you come into the system, I'll share our data with you. It should make approaching Dxun much safer.
zukabark.403zuka043.mp3: Check with me later. I still have to run some diagnostics.
zukabark.403zuka039.mp3: That's the best thing I've heard in weeks. I'll be sure to tell Mandalore about your help.
zukabark.403zuka040.mp3: Look, I have some extra parts and computer spikes. Take them - you can probably make better use of them than I can.
zukabark.403zuka037.mp3: {Surprised}You managed that? I thought that was a lost cause.
zukabark.403zuka038.mp3: Now if I can only get the phase-pulse converter and the power working, the sensors will be operational again.
zukabark.403zuka036.mp3: Good to hear it. I've been low on parts, otherwise I would've been able to get to that.
zukabark.403zuka034.mp3: You change your mind? I could use some help.
zukabark.403zuka030.mp3: Every Mandalorian dedicates himself to honor and loyalty. The duty of Mandalore is to focus our efforts to increase our strength and power.
zukabark.403zuka031.mp3: I am fortunate since not only can I fight, but I can also maintain and repair the machines of war.
zukabark.403zuka032.mp3: Every time my machines are used in battle, part of the honor is mine.
zukabark.403zuka006.mp3: This jungle attacks anything made by man. Restoring the generators and the computer systems is no easy task.
zukabark.403zuka029.mp3: You're trying to help Mandalore? If you can fix the power problem I'm having, I'll put in a good word for you.
zukabark.403zuka007.mp3: I'll take whatever help I can get. Whatever wires and tech haven't been corroded by the jungle are at least ten years old.
zukabark.403zuka009.mp3: I'm trying to get the relay dish operational, but several components are broken and need repair. Without the relay, we're vulnerable to attack, especially right now.
zukabark.403zuka010.mp3: Your space battle may have attracted unwanted attention, and our shuttle's sensors can't cover the whole moon.
zukabark.403zuka026.mp3: There is a part I need. It's a phase-pulse converter.
zukabark.403zuka011.mp3: Oh, It seems just about everything involved with the relay dish is broken. I've been trying to fix it for weeks and still no success.
zukabark.403zuka015.mp3: If you think you can help, there's the broken cables right over there, and the relay maintenance structure's behind me. You can find the telemetry computer in there.
zukabark.403zuka016.mp3: The only thing I know for sure is we need a new phase-pulse converter for the tracking computer.
zukabark.403zuka018.mp3: We actually already found one in an old weapons cache, but flaming cannoks ate it.
zukabark.403zuka025.mp3: We checked the cache manifests, and that's the only one that was in storage. It's probably the only working converter on this moon.
zukabark.403zuka022.mp3: Just gut every cannok you come across. You wouldn't believe the things you can find in those little beasts.
zukabark.403zuka024.mp3: Hmmm... no Mandalorian would lower himself to this task. Forget it, then - if you happen to come across a converter, then let me know.
zukabark.403zuka023.mp3: All right, then. Come back when you have the converter and we can see about getting these systems working again.
zukabark.403zuka019.mp3: That's the problem with cannoks. They'll leave you alone if you keep your distance.
zukabark.403zuka020.mp3: But if you turn your back on the pests, they'll eat anything they can get in their mouth.
zukabark.403zuka021.mp3: They're vermin, and no challenge for a Mandalorian. Since they provide no sport, we ignore them.
zukabark.403zuka002.mp3: After the ambush Kelborn's been pushing to get the entire base 100% operational.
zukabark.403zuka003.mp3: So I have work I've got to do.
zukabark.403zuka060.mp3: {Zuka is walking towards the Basilisk War Droid with the PC}{He doesn't sound as frustrated as he usually does during this conversation - he got something working for once}Xarga said that he and your friends are making good progress through the jungle. Trust me, this is worth the wait.
zukabark.403zuka061.mp3: And here it is, a salvaged Basilisk War Droid. Mandalore said that he would make it available to you for insertion into the city of Iziz.
zukabark.403zuka062.mp3: I assure you, they won't know what hit them.
zukabark.403zuka070.mp3: {He appreciates the fact the PC is excited}Yes, just like a new Mandalorian recruit proving themselves. Into the heart of a war, as well. Mandalore has given you a great honor.
zukabark.403zuka063.mp3: The Basilisk War Droid is the epitome of weapon technology. State of the art weaponry, armor, and maneuverability.
zukabark.403zuka064.mp3: Unfortunately its weapon systems aren't fully functional yet, as are some other unimportant support systems.
zukabark.403zuka065.mp3: But she will get you to Iziz in one piece. Their fighters won't be able to stop that.
zukabark.403zuka067.mp3: We've modified the interior to hold three people. It may be a little tight. You need to leave immediately.
zukabark.403zuka068.mp3: Iziz is in the grip of a civil war, so there'll be considerable resistance. They remember the last time Basilisk War Droids visited their planet.
zukabark.403zuka069.mp3: {This is a slang phrase for Mandalorians}Fight ferociously. And if you die, take as many as you can with you.
zukabark.403zuka066.mp3: Minor systems. Nothing you need concern yourself with.
zukabark.403zuka059.mp3: {He doesn't sound happy at missing out}The next war I will not be trapped on this moon with just my hydrospanner.
zukabark.403zuka074.mp3: [Zuka is too busy to talk to you right now.]
zukabark.851851dem008.mp3: This looks like one of the sites to place the proton core. We'll get about priming it, then wait for your signal.
zukabark.851851dem001.mp3: You've reached one of the target sites. Place the proton core, prime it, then give the signal, Mandalore.
zukabark.851851dem002.mp3: Arming signal received, Mandalore. The proton core is active.
zukabark.851851dem003.mp3: We still need to set three more charges.
zukabark.851851dem004.mp3: Mandalore, we are holding our position, but the Sith appear to be offering little resistance.... it's like they don't even realize we're here.
zukabark.851851dem005.mp3: {Static}Two more sites are left. We've lost contact with two of our squads, and we've had to fall back to the docking area.
zukabark.851851dem006.mp3: Only one proton core remains to be set. We're encountering heavy resistance. I don't know how long we can hold out.
zukabark.851851dem007.mp3: That's the last of them, Mandalore. We can destroy the ship on your command.
zukabark.851851exp009.mp3: Mandalore, we have a problem. Three charges will not be enough to destroy the vessel.
zukabark.851851exp010.mp3: We need one more proton core.
zukabark.851851exp002.mp3: {Wounded, static}Mandalore... we have made contact with the enemy... and one of the cores has detonated prematurely.
zukabark.851851exp004.mp3: No, Mandalore. We... have failed you. I offer you my...
zukabark.851851exp006.mp3: No, Mandalore. Even with the other two cores set in the ship, it will not be sufficient to destroy the vessel.
zukabark.851851mand001.mp3: Mandalore, we have breached the hull of the Sith vessel and are securing the area.
zukabark.851851mand002.mp3: The vessel has suffered extensive structural damage, but its particle fields still maintain a minimal atmosphere within the ship.
zukabark.851851mand004.mp3: It's being brought aboard, and soon teams will be dispatched to the target sites.
zukabark.851851mand006.mp3: No, Mandalore, the proton cores do not emit a signature the Republic ships can detect.
zukabark.851851mand007.mp3: If they do pick up the signal, they will assume it to be emanating from the ship's missile bays.
zukabark.851851mand009.mp3: {Nodding, a little quieter}You were right about the vessel, Mandalore. It is of Malachor... it still bears the wounds of Mandalorian guns.

troop_beast_1.403sarge036.mp3: Here to watch a fight or to participate?
troop_beast_1.403sarge079.mp3: Kelborn says you are worthy enough to face champions. You may fight in the battle circle again.
troop_beast_1.403sarge009.mp3: {Gruff and slightly hostile}So the Jedi comes to grace us. The battle circle is reserved only for real warriors. Your Jedi ways won't help you here.
troop_beast_1.403sarge013.mp3: Jedi rely too much on their vaunted powers. They lose touch of the power of their arms and feet. Without your Force would you be a match for even the lowliest of Mandalorian warriors?
troop_beast_1.403sarge014.mp3: If you want to try and fight us on our terms, that can be arranged.
troop_beast_1.403sarge035.mp3: Not up to the challenge? I'm not surprised. Come back later if you change your mind.
troop_beast_1.403sarge032.mp3: We are not merchants. We are Mandalorians. The only thing gained and lost here is honor. And perhaps some skill, if you have the capacity to learn.
troop_beast_1.403sarge033.mp3: Be careful when you ridicule a Mandalorian. If Mandalore hadn't ordered us to...
troop_beast_1.403sarge034.mp3: {He forces himself to talk civily}Is there anything else you want to talk about?
troop_beast_1.403sarge029.mp3: Two rules never change - once you enter the circle, you leave the circle only if your opponent is defeated. The second is never kill anyone in the circle.
troop_beast_1.403sarge030.mp3: The other rules are decided for each individual fight. The challenger must abide by the terms set by the warrior they challenge. Since you are new, the terms aren't yours to make.
troop_beast_1.403sarge031.mp3: Break any rule and the battle is over, and you are dishonored.
troop_beast_1.403sarge028.mp3: We eagerly look forward to this fight. Bralor, you are our champion. How would you fight the Jedi?
troop_beast_1.403sarge078.mp3: {He's in awe of Bralor's bravado}Bralor... will fight you as you are. Still no killing and no leaving the battle circle. But you may use whatever else you want.
troop_beast_1.403sarge027.mp3: You have enough honor to face a champion of a previous day. Kelborn, what are your terms?
troop_beast_1.403sarge075.mp3: Kelborn chooses to fight with the blade. You may fight with fist, foot, and the blade provided. No using the Force or any other item.
troop_beast_1.403sarge026.mp3: You choose to fight again. Now face a real Mandalorian warrior. Tagren - what are your terms?
troop_beast_1.403sarge073.mp3: Tagren chooses to fight hand to hand. Remember no weapons allowed, and absolutely no use of your "Force."
troop_beast_1.403sarge019.mp3: After defeating Davrel, you have gained some small honor. There is a challenger for you. He is Kex the quartermaster.
troop_beast_1.403sarge020.mp3: Since he is the challenger, you get to choose the terms.
troop_beast_1.403sarge024.mp3: The battle circle is for training. It is best to choose something that will test both of your limits. In this case swords would be a good choice.
troop_beast_1.403sarge025.mp3: It is something neither one of you are completely familiar with. But the choice is ultimately yours to make.
troop_beast_1.403sarge023.mp3: {The most approving tone he's had so far}An honorable choice. I will send a runner to Kex. Your fight will begin shortly.
troop_beast_1.403sarge022.mp3: I will send a runner to Kex. Prepare yourself for your fight, Jedi.
troop_beast_1.403sarge021.mp3: As quartermaster he has little opportunity for any glory and training. He isn't as skilled as Davrel{da-vrel}.
troop_beast_1.403sarge015.mp3: You are new here, so you will fight Davrel{da-vrel}. He is young and has not been able to prove himself in battle. Davrel - what are your terms?
troop_beast_1.403sarge017.mp3: Put your weapon away, Jedi. Don't step out of the circle, and pull any death blow. No one dies in the battle circle.
troop_beast_1.403sarge018.mp3: So put away your weapon and step into the battle circle. Now you will experience a true fight.
troop_beast_1.403sarge011.mp3: The battle circle is only a small part of our training regiment. A full Mandalorian warrior is a master of many fighting techniques, and here all of them are tested.
troop_beast_1.403sarge012.mp3: {Heavy emphasis on "if"}If you were to compete, you would have to do so on our terms. For that is the way of the battle circle. Those with great honor decide the terms of engagement.
troop_beast_1.403sarge010.mp3: For today I have the honor of commanding the battle circle. I decide who fights who and make sure all the rules are followed.
troop_beast_1.403sarge066.mp3: The match between the Jedi and Davrel is over.
troop_beast_1.403sarge069.mp3: Davrel is the clear and honorable victor. You see, Jedi? Our training is rigorous, and is quite different from yours.
troop_beast_1.403sarge070.mp3: With us, anything could be a weapon. Even hand and foot could be lethal.
troop_beast_1.403sarge071.mp3: I'm sure Davrel would gladly challenge you again. He is eager to gain honor, even from you.
troop_beast_1.403sarge067.mp3: The Jedi is the clear and honorable victor. Davrel is just a recruit. I am not surprised you won this fight.
troop_beast_1.403sarge068.mp3: A challenger has expressed interest in fighting you. As little honor as you have gained, it is sufficient to accept his request. Let me know if you would fight again.
troop_beast_1.403sarge006.mp3: The match between Kex and Jedi is over.
troop_beast_1.403sarge008.mp3: Kex? Kex is the clear and honorable victor. I knew in my heart that Mandalorians were tougher than Jedi without their 'tricks.'
troop_beast_1.403sarge007.mp3: The Jedi is the clear and honorable victor. If you want to fight again let me know.
troop_beast_1.403sarge054.mp3: The match between the Jedi and Tagren is over.
troop_beast_1.403sarge063.mp3: Tagren is the clear and honorable victor. Against any full Mandalorian it appears you cannot win.
troop_beast_1.403sarge064.mp3: Come back if you want a rematch. I am sure that Tagren could use the exercise.
troop_beast_1.403sarge055.mp3: The Jedi is the clear and honorable victor. You have fought well today.
troop_beast_1.403sarge060.mp3: The only Mandalorians left for you to fight are our champions. No one can fight a champion until they have proven themself worthy.
troop_beast_1.403sarge061.mp3: And it must be real proof. The kind you gain fighting foes to the death. And a champion must observe and deem your actions worthy.
troop_beast_1.403sarge062.mp3: There are two champions in the camp, Bralor and Kelborn. Until you prove yourself in their eyes, the battle circle is closed to you.
troop_beast_1.403sarge058.mp3: This is a great honor, Jedi. Kelborn is one of our former champions. He has declared you worthy enough to fight the best among us.
troop_beast_1.403sarge059.mp3: If you choose to fight again, you will face him. If you somehow beat Kelborn, then you will take on Bralor.
troop_beast_1.403sarge049.mp3: The match between the Jedi and Kelborn is over.
troop_beast_1.403sarge052.mp3: {Not taunting - perhaps even relieved. The sergeant didn't expect the PC to get this far}Kelborn is the clear and honorable victor. You are a strong warrior, Jedi, but no match for the best of us.
troop_beast_1.403sarge053.mp3: If you take away your lightsaber and Force, then our training techniques can be more than a match for you.
troop_beast_1.403sarge050.mp3: The Jedi is the clear and honorable victor. I... underestimated you. A difficult admission for a Mandalorian.
troop_beast_1.403sarge051.mp3: If you fight in the circle again this day, you will face the bravest and strongest of us. Bralor.
troop_beast_1.403sarge045.mp3: The match between the Jedi and Bralor is over.
troop_beast_1.403sarge048.mp3: Bralor is the clear and honorable victor. You did not win, Jedi, but I do not know how well Bralor would fare in a rematch.
troop_beast_1.403sarge046.mp3: {He sounds a little in awe}The Jedi is the clear and honorable victor. You have defeated the most worthy of us. You walk away the champion of the battle circle this day.
troop_beast_1.403sarge047.mp3: We will not forget your deeds or the honor you have earned this day.
troop_beast_1.403sarge005.mp3: I have nothing more to say to you. You aren't welcome in the battle circle anymore.
troop_beast_1.403sarge044.mp3: Unless a battle circle champion vouches for you, you cannot fight anyone else in the circle.
troop_beast_1.403sarge042.mp3: You are the champion of the battle circle this day. Watch the others spar. Criticize or praise as you see fit.
troop_beast_1.403sarge043.mp3: That is your right as a champion.
troop_beast_1.403sarge001.mp3: You have violated the rules of the battle circle! Have you no honor, Jedi?
troop_beast_1.403sarge003.mp3: You must follow all the terms of combat. You must not leave the battle circle. You must not kill anyone. Even a cannok could learn these rules.
troop_beast_1.403sarge004.mp3: If you fight again, follow these rules. One more breach and you will never enter the battle circle again.
troop_beast_1.403sarge041.mp3: You equipped a weapon other than a sword when you were explicitly told not to!
troop_beast_1.403sarge040.mp3: You used a weapon when you were explicitly told not to!
troop_beast_1.403sarge039.mp3: You used an item when you were explicitly told not to!
troop_beast_1.403sarge038.mp3: You used a Force Power when you were explicitly told not to!
troop_beast_1.403sarge002.mp3: That's your second violation. You will not be allowed to participate again.
troop_beast_1.403sarge080.mp3: [The sergeant is too busy to talk to you right now.]
troop_beast_1.411beast_ta001.mp3: {The other sith is facing a boma beast and waving his hand and the beast does various animations, it's clear he is commanding them}Anyone that has been marked by our Masters can do it. Yes, you're getting the hang of it now.
troop_beast_1.411beast_ta003.mp3: You doubt our Masters' power? They have erased the minds of these beasts and made them our obedient servants.
troop_beast_1.411beast_ta005.mp3: {Dark chuckle}No one, of course. Now the next st-
troop_beast_1.411beast_ta002.mp3: It's so easy. But how did they do it?
troop_beast_1.411beast_ta004.mp3: {A shot of four boma beasts - all in the same animation, maybe at attention}With an army of these, who could defeat us?

kadron.504kay_comm001.mp3: The Palace has been breached... I repeat the Palace has be-
kadron.506ro_sold1002.mp3: Another wave of them has already arrived, corporal. Everyone - hold your lines!
kadron.506ro_sold1003.mp3: A Sith is with them! Throw everything you've got at them!
kadron.506ro_sold2002.mp3: {The you is to flag someone - it's obivious Kadron doesn't remember Kiph's name}You - slicer, you said you could stop her!
kadron.506ro_sold2005.mp3: {Very grave - knows he's probably about to die}Everyone - we have to stop the Sith here. The fate of Iziz depends on it.
kadron.506ro_sold2001.mp3: {The you is to flag someone - it's obivious Kadron doesn't remember Kiph's name}You - slicer, you said you could stop him!
kadron.506vaklu071.mp3: He's right, your majesty. It might be best to silence him... forever.
kadron.511cs_tal_3008.mp3: Every man here would give their life to keep that from happening.
kadron.504va_offic016.mp3: The platform up ahead... Let me call for a bomber strike. They are grouped perfectly.
kadron.504va_offic003.mp3: You spearhead our assault. I'll guard your flank. They will be no match for you, Jedi!
kadron.504va_offic014.mp3: Their slicer overloaded that power conductor! We can't do anything about it here. The Palace has already locked down all secondary computer systems on the Sky Ramp.
kadron.504va_offic015.mp3: But we'll find their slicer in the Palace and make him pay. Until then, beware of any more surprises.
kadron.504va_offic001.mp3: I just sent a message to the men to secure the Sky Ramp. Command has already broken into the Palace Grounds.
kadron.504va_offic002.mp3: By the time we get to the Palace, they'll be inside. Colonel Tobin will meet us there.
kadron.504va_offic012.mp3: The royalists have been preparing the defense of the Sky Ramp for some time. There are mines, turrets, and worse up ahead.
kadron.504va_offic013.mp3: If you clear the way, we will follow.
kadron.504va_offic010.mp3: I'll have some men keep the royalists in the barracks pinned down.
kadron.504va_offic011.mp3: The Palace is the main objective - the men inside aren't important.
kadron.504va_offic004.mp3: The Sky Ramp is one of the primary access routes to the Royal Palace. Our fighters have been strafing and bombing this area routinely.
kadron.504va_offic005.mp3: There are still royalists defending this area, but their numbers should be thinned. There are two force shield checkpoints.
kadron.504va_offic006.mp3: We need to gain access to the Turret Tower's access terminal, which can shut those shields down.
kadron.504va_offic009.mp3: Just give the order, and we will attack.
kadron.504va_offic007.mp3: You and I should clear the path. Then my men will follow.
kadron.506va_offic004.mp3: We should hurry! Colonel Tobin and the General may open the doors to the throne room at any moment.
kadron.506va_offic008.mp3: The force shields are down. We should head to Colonel Tobin immediately.
kadron.506va_offic007.mp3: I will try to help however I can.
kadron.506va_offic006.mp3: Queen Talia will fall this day!
kadron.506va_offic002.mp3: Shall I take you back to Colonel Tobin now?
kadron.506va_offic001.mp3: General Vaklu is fighting the Sith. Men, attack the Sith! Protect the General.
kadron.506ro_weed017.mp3: {Evil PC}You're no Jedi. Your heart is as black as Malak's ever was.
kadron.506ro_weed018.mp3: But you will not touch this terminal as long as I'm alive. Everyone attack!
kadron.506ro_weed014.mp3: {Evil PC}Power up the droids. We must stop the Jedi they have with them.
kadron.506ro_weed016.mp3: So I did... Barricade the doors, make that Jedi pay for every inch. If we fall, Talia is dead.
kadron.506ro_weed011.mp3: The force field is down, please go help the Queen!
kadron.506ro_weed010.mp3: Get to the security room in the south hall. Every minute counts!
kadron.506ro_weed001.mp3: So you're the Jedi, eh? Well, the comm chatter we've intercepted is filled with reports about you. You fought right through their flank on the Sky Ramp? We desperately need someone like you.
kadron.506ro_weed009.mp3: I'm Queen Talia's captain of the guard. You can call me Captain Kadron. But we've got little time for more than introductions.
kadron.506ro_weed002.mp3: We've managed to hold this part of the Palace, but Vaklu's forces control the rest. We need to get to the Queen before that flaming drexl breaks through the inner door.
kadron.506ro_weed003.mp3: There are two security consoles in the Palace. The primary security console is on the other side of the palace. There's an expert slicer over there who has been hampering our every move.
kadron.506ro_weed012.mp3: We need to transfer all primary functions to our terminal here, then disable the primary security console. That will also take their slicer out of the picture.
kadron.506ro_weed013.mp3: After that we'll control security again and can get to General Vaklu before he gets to the Queen.
kadron.506ro_weed008.mp3: Talk to the corporal. He can take you quickly to the palace entrance when you're ready to go to the south hall. May the Force be with you!
kadron.506ro_weed007.mp3: Feel free to take anything from the armory lockers in the next room, if you haven't already. This is no time for niceties.
kadron.506ro_weed006.mp3: The other security room is the furthest room down the south hall. You're probably going to have to fight a legion of Vaklu's troops and the flaming Sith. But from what I've seen, you're up to it.
kadron.506ro_weed004.mp3: You have?! Oh, son of a murglak...! Corporal, use this code to open the outer door to the throne room.
kadron.506ro_weed005.mp3: The door's open. Hurry! They might break through the inner door at any moment.
kadron.506ro_weed015.mp3: We have no more droids left, we threw everything we had at General Vaklu outside the Palace. You ordered it, sir.
kadron.511cs_tal_3012.mp3: My men and I will meet you at the Sky Ramp.
kadron.511cs_tal_3001.mp3: Colonel Tobin has ordered us to follow you.
kadron.511cs_tal_3002.mp3: {Darkly confident}With you in command, the Royal Palace will fall this day!
kadron.506va_sold1001.mp3: {Grumbling pissed off sergeant}Tell the Colonel we'll need more of our men to smoke the royalists out of their hole.
kadron.506va_sold1002.mp3: I don't trust those Sith. Or their beasts...
kadron.506va_sold1003.mp3: {Guards go off behind him down the hall}{Very clearly saying he'll kill any looters}And another thing - if I catch any more of my men looting then the Queen's Guard will be the least of your worries...
kadron.601sec_door003.mp3: {If the player is not in stealth}What did I tell you? Leave the door alone!
kadron.601sec_door002.mp3: Hey, get away from that door! The last time somebody messed with it, it was locked down for months before we could fix it.

holo_cap.410holo_cap010.mp3: Coded messages from orbit and from Onderon. Some sort of conflict is brewing. I think we have a ship in orbit.
holo_cap.410holo_cap011.mp3: We're on full battle alert. Against what they won't say. A Sith Master said something about a "disturbance in the Force."
holo_cap.410holo_cap012.mp3: Well, what does that even mean? How do I prepare for that? From his tone, the threat is serious. We've put a double-shift on monitoring the aerial sensor grid.
holo_cap.410holo_cap013.mp3: The only thing that could disrupt our Masters' plans would have to be a drop-ship invasion from the Onderon military. We will be prepared.
holo_cap.410holo_cap014.mp3: The Sith said soon we'll have reinforcements. When I asked for details, he said it was a 'surprise.' I hate the ones with a sense of humor. Sith jokes are rarely pleasant.
holo_cap.410holo_cap006.mp3: This jungle feels similar to Korriban before it fell after the War. Everyone is on edge. Executions for infractions are commonplace here, 50% more than my previous command.
holo_cap.410holo_cap007.mp3: There's a blood-thirstiness to the jungle. The beasts here continually assault our mined perimeter. We've had to replace the mine fields four times so far.
holo_cap.410holo_cap008.mp3: We received more equipment and more men today. The equipment went straight inside the tomb. As usual, I have no idea what it contained.
holo_cap.410holo_cap009.mp3: We're expecting more Sith to arrive any day. They want us to capture one of the beasts for them. No explanation, there never is.
holo_cap.410holo_cap001.mp3: This is my first day on Dxun. My predecessor displeased our Masters and was dealt with.
holo_cap.410holo_cap002.mp3: The fool let cannoks through the perimeter. The Sith don't tolerate any failures. I'm the fifth captain to command this base camp.
holo_cap.410holo_cap003.mp3: The camp sits in the shadow of a tomb. My subordinates say that the body of an ancient warlord named Freedon Nadd lies inside.
holo_cap.410holo_cap004.mp3: We don't know why we're here. We sit and make sure that no beasts come into our camp and especially that they don't reach the tomb itself. A bleak assignment.
holo_cap.601olddroid016.mp3: {static, 1 sec}...{annoyed}today I caught her in a heated argument with my Padawan! Her Master refuses to properly discipline{static, 1 sec}. I want to know what action you intend!
holo_cap.601olddroid009.mp3: {static, 1 sec}...{annoyed}today I caught him in a heated argument with my Padawan! His Master refuses to properly discipline{static, 1 sec}. I want to know what action you intend!
holo_cap.601olddroid015.mp3: {Vrook Hologram VO, upset} But... {static, 1 sec} uncontrolled! {static 1 sec}...whatever the other Padawans see her do, they are quick to do the same... {static}other students dislike her intensely!
holo_cap.601olddroid011.mp3: {upset} But... {static, 1 sec} uncontrolled! {static 1 sec}...whatever the other Padawans see him do, they are quick to do the same... {static}other students dislike him intensely!
holo_cap.601olddroid013.mp3: {upset}I strongly disagree...{static, 2 sec} mediocre Jedi...{static 1 sec} lust for power! {static, 1 sec}...will lead to the dark side! Furthermore it... {static, 2 sec}

ritlead.411ritlead005.mp3: You are too late. We have done what needed to be done. Soon Onderon shall fall, and with it, the Republic shall die.
ritlead.411ritlead006.mp3: {Looking inside player's spirit}But what is this? Ah... of course, the Force has guided you here. It echoes within you, yet I sense it is... untrained.
ritlead.411ritlead007.mp3: It is good you have sought us out. This tomb is strong with the dark side. Here is where you will take your first steps on the path to your destiny.
ritlead.411ritlead025.mp3: It is good you are willing to hear the truth. The truth about the Force. Truth the Jedi would keep from everyone if they could.
ritlead.411ritlead010.mp3: What lies has your Master spread? What have they denied you in their ignorance? The Jedi preach calm and serenity while wallowing in weakness and hypocrisy.
ritlead.411ritlead011.mp3: They would have you become a puppet of the Force. They would have you deny the strength of your emotions - the strength of your own will.
ritlead.411ritlead012.mp3: {Gestures around him}Can't you feel the power of this place? It echoes through you like a second voice. Accept it... embrace it.
ritlead.411ritlead021.mp3: The Jedi teachings say that one should never use the Force in anger. To deprive themselves of such a weapon is absurd. The Force is there to be used.
ritlead.411ritlead022.mp3: That is the truth of the dark side. Use your emotions, use your rage, and channel the Force. Use its power to break your chains and forge your own destiny.
ritlead.411ritlead024.mp3: Just give in... let the walls around your emotions fall. Let vengeance guide your hand, let passion fuel your power. You feel it, yes?
ritlead.411ritlead020.mp3: So you seek to save me? From what? With the dark side there is no knowledge forbidden, no restraints. What can you possibly offer me?
ritlead.411ritlead013.mp3: {Contemptuous, spits out first sentence}The Jedi. A Jedi has no family, no childhood, no emotion. They are dead to the Force - and themselves.
ritlead.411ritlead014.mp3: They want drones, slaves to the Jedi Council. At least we live, we feel the universe around us. We are the Masters, not mere tools of the Force.
ritlead.411ritlead015.mp3: Can't you feel the power, here, within the walls of this tomb? Just embrace it. Don't limit your potential.
ritlead.411ritlead017.mp3: Yes... you can see it, you can feel it around you. There are no limits to what you could achieve! Join us!
ritlead.411ritlead016.mp3: A shame... instead of freedom and power, you have chosen death. So be it.
ritlead.411ritlead008.mp3: An adept has managed to come so far? Incredible.
ritlead.411ritlead009.mp3: You have within you the potential to wield the Force. I am not speaking of the ways of the Jedi or their flawed teachings - their Order was rooted in weakness.
ritlead.411ritlead001.mp3: Captain... we need just one more... moment. We're almost through.
ritlead.411ritlead002.mp3: Failure, captain, will not be tolerated.

sith_captain.411sithcapt002.mp3: The time for practice is over. There are intruders in the Tomb and they cannot be allowed to reach our master.
sith_captain.411sithcapt003.mp3: The ritual must not be interrupted. {The price of failure is a gruesome death - as much for him as everyone else, so he delivers this threat well with a touch of fear for himself, too}I don't need to mention the price of failure.

beastrdr.501beastrdr041.mp3: We meet again, offworlder. Why have you returned?
beastrdr.501beastrdr038.mp3: I again apologize for the boma attack earlier, offworlder. How may I help you?
beastrdr.501beastrdr039.mp3: The beasts are growing very restless. It grows day by day, just as the flames of passion grow in this city. Something very wrong is at work here.
beastrdr.501beastrdr040.mp3: {He is horrified to give voice to his fear}I plan on talking with my brothers and sisters to see if there are solutions. If the beasts continue to grow out of control... The city is filled with them. The consequences...
beastrdr.501beastrdr032.mp3: I - I don't know what to say. I had heard stories - but I assumed that they were fledgling riders. Or simply tales that grow in the telling.
beastrdr.501beastrdr033.mp3: {Very sincere apology here}Not since my first drexl have I lost control of a beast, I apologize profusely. Here, I give you these credits for the danger I put you in.
beastrdr.501beastrdr042.mp3: Please keep them, it salves the shame my beast's behavior has brought me.
beastrdr.501beastrdr037.mp3: I am so sorry for insulting you with my offering. Here, here is more. Again, I apologize.
beastrdr.501beastrdr035.mp3: The beasts grow more agitated by the day. The stories say that the smoldering fires of city politics cast a smoke they can smell and breathe. They revert to their primal instincts.
beastrdr.501beastrdr036.mp3: As... as you've just seen, when they get that way not even a skilled beast rider can control them. As soon as I leave here I will talk with my family. There is much to be discussed.
beastrdr.501beastrdr034.mp3: Absolutely not... But recently things are not as they were.
beastrdr.501beastrdr043.mp3: [The beast rider appears too traumatized to speak with you.]
beastrdr.501beastrdr030.mp3: {His voice is trying to be soothing and coaxing to a riled beast}Calm, calm... Wha- !
beastrdr.501beastrdr031.mp3: {The beast rider is amazing with animals and almost doesn't believe this is happening. Run is warning innocents to flee.}Run! The boma is... out of control!
beastrdr.501beastrdr001.mp3: Fair winds to you, off-worlder. Is it too much to hope that you are a Telosian merchant?
beastrdr.501beastrdr027.mp3: These beasts you see here are for delivery to Telos{TEE-loes}.
beastrdr.501beastrdr028.mp3: But the Republic vessels that transport them have to wait for thorough and needlessly long searches. So the city is stacked with caged beasts waiting for their ships.
beastrdr.501beastrdr029.mp3: We have stopped gathering beasts now, but they still fill the city. For Drexl and rider, the Ithorians brought wealth and prosperity. Our settlements prospered. But now...
beastrdr.501beastrdr002.mp3: The winds still taste of misfortune, then. Our beasts will continue to wait in their cages.
beastrdr.501beastrdr024.mp3: {A little worried at end, can't figure out why the beasts are upset}They have been kept in their cages for a long time. But... yet, at times, I feel as if something else is affecting them, frightening them.
beastrdr.501beastrdr026.mp3: Perhaps it is the city itself. Iziz has fallen upon dark times, and tensions run high in the streets.
beastrdr.501beastrdr003.mp3: I am a beast-rider. I have flown great distances gathering the animals you see here.
beastrdr.501beastrdr004.mp3: We keep hoping that Ithorians or Telosians get through the space forces' searches so that we can sell them.
beastrdr.501beastrdr016.mp3: Telos was attacked by Darth Malak in the Jedi Civil War. The surface was completely destroyed.
beastrdr.501beastrdr022.mp3: The Ithorians have been searching for appropriate wildlife to create a new Telos. But their merchants are stalled by the blockade.
beastrdr.501beastrdr017.mp3: The Ithorians have been searching for appropriate wildlife to create a new Telos. But their merchants are stalled by the blockade.
beastrdr.501beastrdr021.mp3: {Not sure what to make of alien interjection}Your... friend is correct. Much harm is being done on both sides as long as the blockade is in effect.
beastrdr.501beastrdr015.mp3: Although some of your terms are unknown to me, what you say is true.
beastrdr.501beastrdr005.mp3: Our people have been here for centuries, though we were not always one with the wilds of Onderon.
beastrdr.501beastrdr006.mp3: In ancient times our people were criminals, prisoners who were cast out of Iziz and sentenced to die by the beasts in the wilds.
beastrdr.501beastrdr007.mp3: But our ancestors learned how to survive and even tame the mighty beasts. They became our strength and companions. We fought endlessly with Iziz for resources and survival.
beastrdr.501beastrdr008.mp3: But two generations ago an Iziz princess named Galia and a great beast-rider hero, Oron Kira, married. They united our peoples.
beastrdr.501beastrdr009.mp3: But now things are unraveling. Even the beasts can smell it in the air.
beastrdr.501beastrdr010.mp3: Many beast-riders have fallen to the city ways, and some are now no more than common thugs. Queen Talia and her cousin General Vaklu argue in open councils.
beastrdr.501beastrdr011.mp3: The beasts stir from the changes in the wind, and cannot be calmed. And we beast-riders find it harder to enter the city each day.
beastrdr.501beastrdr012.mp3: No one is to leave the city without the starport visas. It chokes passage in and out of Iziz.
beastrdr.512gen_bst005.mp3: As long as I get paid, I don't care what they want us for.
beastrdr.512gen_bst004.mp3: Hard to keep the beasts in line nowadays.
beastrdr.512gen_bst003.mp3: You a rider? Last thing we need is more competition.
beastrdr.512gen_bst001.mp3: A lot of credits to be made around here lately, if you have the right skills.

cp_guard.501cp_guard029.mp3: You're already cleared to enter the Merchant Quarter. Now move along.
cp_guard.501cp_guard027.mp3: {A little confused}Strangely enough, I have no urge to ask you any questions whatsoever.
cp_guard.501cp_guard003.mp3: {This character should sound bored with his job - it's a pure formality and he's used to getting a lot of flack}Halt, off-worlder. You'll have to answer some questions before you go into the city.
cp_guard.501cp_guard004.mp3: What is your business on Iziz?
cp_guard.501cp_guard026.mp3: {Dry, irritated}Amusing - your humor is noted. Is your ship affiliated with any Republic-based corporation?
cp_guard.501cp_guard019.mp3: I see. Is your ship affiliated with any Republic-based corporation?
cp_guard.501cp_guard025.mp3: You could just answer "no". Answers like that just mean more paperwork for me.
cp_guard.501cp_guard020.mp3: Do you have any crates of weapons or other military equipment you plan to sell in Iziz?
cp_guard.501cp_guard023.mp3: Not really. Getting into Iziz's Merchant Quarter is easy if you're not bringing in cargo. Getting out... well, just keep a hold of your starport visa.
cp_guard.501cp_guard022.mp3: I ask the questions here. I'll take your answer as a "no."
cp_guard.501cp_guard021.mp3: You're free to go. Don't lose your starport visa. Otherwise you won't be leaving for a long while.
cp_guard.501cp_guard018.mp3: [Success] Uh, why not? I can see you have no crates or cargo, and your ship is obviously not affiliated with the Republic.
cp_guard.501cp_guard005.mp3: {Has just been mind controlled with a Jedi mind trick}[Success] I don't think your business is any concern of mine.
cp_guard.501cp_guard014.mp3: [Success] Not only is your business not my concern, I can't seem to remember why I'm holding you up.
cp_guard.501cp_guard016.mp3: {Confused.}[Success] You should probably go about your business - whoever you are.
cp_guard.501cp_guard017.mp3: {Still a little confused from mind control}Oh... uh, don't lose your starport visa, otherwise you won't be leaving for a long while.
cp_guard.501cp_guard015.mp3: [Success] You're right. My questions are needless, and only waste your time. Forgive me.
cp_guard.501cp_guard001.mp3: The checkpoint up ahead has been closed. Some sort of malfunction with the turrets or something.

talia.501cs_tal_1011.mp3: {Kavar and Talia are walking in the throne room.  Fade in}
talia.501cs_tal_1001.mp3: Vaklu's saying that the Republic ship attacked first? That's madness!
talia.501cs_tal_1003.mp3: The timing of this is atrocious. A space battle above our skies, so many of our fighters lost...
talia.501cs_tal_1007.mp3: But won't that bring even more followers to Vaklu's side, increasing his power?
talia.501cs_tal_1010.mp3: I fear by then it will be too late...
talia.506talia002.mp3: I'm sorry to keep you here. I needed to thank you personally for all of your help.
talia.506talia003.mp3: Onderon owes both you and Master Kavar a debt that can never truly be repaid. Battles still wage in our streets, but by morning the conflict should be over.
talia.506talia004.mp3: I recognize you must leave soon, but please take this.
talia.506talia006.mp3: These relics are from the royal museum. Generations ago some members of the royal family had a connection to the Force. They weren't... all too different from what we faced today.
talia.506talia007.mp3: I know little of the Force, but I hope you can put my family's relics to good use.
talia.506talia008.mp3: Captain Bostuco has made arrangements for a shuttle to take you to your ship. I fear it will be quite some time before you can come back.
talia.506talia009.mp3: The war was brief, but destructive. I will focus all of my energy on rebuilding Iziz.
talia.506talia010.mp3: Thank you, again... I must go.
talia.506talia005.mp3: {The PC has already looted the Royal Museum}I had also planned on giving you some relics from Onderon's past. But Vaklu's troops looted our museum. I hope the credits, and my sincere thanks are enough.
talia.506vaklu038.mp3: Are you so sure of my decision, Vaklu?
talia.506vaklu023.mp3: What is done, is done. I don't think the service you have given us can ever be repaid. I must go with Captain Kadron, the fighting must be stopped. I will be back shortly to try and repay you.
talia.506vaklu036.mp3: The crisis is over thanks to you... and Master Kavar. I believe he'd like to speak to you. If you'll excuse me.
talia.506vaklu014.mp3: Aren't you forgetting who is queen, Vaklu?
talia.506vaklu029.mp3: I appreciate the Jedi's counsel. But as monarch I decree you are guilty of treason. The punishment is death. To be carried out immediately. Captain Kadron.
talia.506vaklu020.mp3: But he will rise again. He has too many supporters. I do appreciate your counsel, but he must be killed.
talia.506vaklu034.mp3: I have thought about it. Either alternative is filled with evil, but I must think of my people first. Vaklu, you said you wanted a trial.
talia.506vaklu033.mp3: I... I just hope you're right, Jedi. Your kind are so infuriatingly wise.
talia.506vaklu031.mp3: Too many nobles and influential people have alliances, both secret and open, with General Vaklu.
talia.506vaklu032.mp3: If he stays alive, I can't be sure who to trust. He will most likely break free.
talia.506vaklu021.mp3: But the price if you are wrong...
talia.506vaklu030.mp3: [Success] I thought I could order this. But, I can't. It would be breaking our laws. You will stand trial, Vaklu. Take him away.
talia.506vaklu016.mp3: Your whole life has been a trial, Vaklu. But it's over now. You are right, we can't detain you. Too many people are still loyal to you. You've left me no real option.
talia.506vaklu002.mp3: You would destroy everything just for your ambition, Vaklu. The Republic, Iziz... everything.
talia.506vaklu004.mp3: You're getting careless, Vaklu. One more mistake, and you're the one who will pay the price.
talia.506vaklu027.mp3: {Fear but pride}I will not fall easily...
talia.511cs_tal_3005.mp3: {Irony and some stubborn bitterness in her tone}Your plan seems to have succeeded, your enemy has indeed revealed himself.
talia.511cs_tal_3007.mp3: Even now Vaklu is using them to breach the Palace. I will not surrender to that usurper. I would die first.
talia.511cs_tal_3014.mp3: Which message? What are you talking about?
talia.511cs_tal_3010.mp3: Worse? How is that even possible?
talia.512dhagon029.mp3: Is this meeting a trap? I can't afford to lose you. Especially given recent events.
talia.512dhagon031.mp3: Is this necessary? I can guarantee your safety in the Palace, but outside these walls the General has many men that would do anything for him.
talia.512dhagon033.mp3: Very well. But please... be cautious.
talia.512dhagon035.mp3: {Concerned}That's what I was afraid you'd say.

gen_citi.501gen_citi008.mp3: I heard the Peragus mining facility was completely destroyed. What are we going to do for fuel?
gen_citi.501gen_citi007.mp3: Republic dissidents blew up an armory depot in the Lower City. Vaklu should do something about it.
gen_citi.501gen_citi006.mp3: I think Vaklu is using Republic spies as an excuse to intimidate anybody that would oppose him.
gen_citi.501gen_citi005.mp3: I think Queen Talia's policy is a wise one. We need the Republic. Without them, we'd be under Mandalorian rule.
gen_citi.501gen_citi004.mp3: General Vaklu is royalty, too. I know a lot of people that wish he was King.
gen_citi.501gen_citi003.mp3: The Republic wouldn't attack our ships. That makes no sense! Someone else must have started it.
gen_citi.501gen_citi002.mp3: I can't believe that the Republic assaulted our space forces. Forget about secession, we should declare war.
gen_citi.501gen_citi001.mp3: They just barred entry to the Merchant Quarter. I wonder if there's been another bombing?
gen_citi.501gen_citi011.mp3: You're the one that started that riot. I... don't want any trouble.
gen_citi.501gen_citi010.mp3: {Swoop Champ}My son will never believe the Iziz Swoop Champ talked to me!
gen_citi.501gen_citi009.mp3: {sky ramp explosions}Did you hear that there was some trouble over at the Sky Ramp? I hope no one was hurt.
gen_citi.502gen_citi008.mp3: I heard the Peragus mining facility was completely destroyed. What are we going to do for fuel?
gen_citi.502gen_citi007.mp3: Republic dissidents blew up an armory depot in the Lower City. Vaklu should do something about it.
gen_citi.502gen_citi006.mp3: I think Vaklu is using Republic spies as an excuse to intimidate anybody that would oppose him.
gen_citi.502gen_citi005.mp3: I think Queen Talia's policy is a wise one. We need the Republic. Without them, we'd be under Mandalorian rule.
gen_citi.502gen_citi004.mp3: General Vaklu is royalty, too. I know a lot of people that wish he was King.
gen_citi.502gen_citi003.mp3: The Republic wouldn't attack our ships. That makes no sense! Someone else must have started it.
gen_citi.502gen_citi002.mp3: I can't believe that the Republic assaulted our space forces. Forget about secession, we should declare war.
gen_citi.502gen_citi001.mp3: What's going on? There isn't more fighting, is there?
gen_citi.502gen_citi016.mp3: {sky ramp explosion}I hear the Republic attacked the Sky Ramp!
gen_citi.502gen_citi015.mp3: {swoop champ}A real-live swoop racer. Can I have your autoprint?
gen_citi.502gen_citi014.mp3: {bounty hunter attack}I heard a whole bunch of bounty hunters got killed in the Western Square. Maybe the beast rider gangs finally did something useful.
gen_citi.502gen_citi013.mp3: {missing captain}Captain Riiken isn't back from his patrol yet. I hope he's all right.
gen_citi.502gen_citi012.mp3: I heard a lot of bodies were found over in the Western Square. The gangs must be at war now.
gen_citi.502gen_citi011.mp3: {sky ramp explosions}Have you heard any news about the Sky Ramp? Is it true that it was another Republic attack?
gen_citi.502gen_citi010.mp3: We're going to have to find another source of cheap fuel now that Peragus is gone.
gen_citi.502gen_citi009.mp3: {swoop champ}You're that swoop biker, right? My friend says you should go pro.
gen_citi.512gen_citi006.mp3: Careful where you walk. There's a lot of trouble walking around this part of the city.
gen_citi.512gen_citi005.mp3: And now we have war to worry about.
gen_citi.512gen_citi004.mp3: Getting to where you can't even walk the streets anymore.
gen_citi.512gen_citi003.mp3: Sorry I can't talk. I should get home before dark.
gen_citi.512gen_citi002.mp3: There something I can help you with?
gen_citi.512gen_citi001.mp3: Have any work that needs to be done?

gen_work.501gen_work005.mp3: There is a lot of chaza{CHA-za} refuse in the Merchant Quarter. They've even chased off the military from some parts of this Quarter.
gen_work.501gen_work004.mp3: Many stores have fallen on hard times. Republic trade's very important for Iziz, no matter what General Vaklu says.
gen_work.501gen_work003.mp3: Be careful out there. Starship captains have been mugged for their starport visas... or worse.
gen_work.501gen_work002.mp3: With all the Republic vessels getting searched, the beasts bound for Telos keep stacking up. The city smells like the back end of a gundark nest.
gen_work.501gen_work001.mp3: And now the quarter checkpoint's closed? That's going to throw the schedule off even more!
gen_work.501gen_work008.mp3: {Sky ramp explosion}Another worker said that the Sky Ramp got bombed or something. I think he was making lame excuses for another late delivery.
gen_work.501gen_work007.mp3: {Bounty hunter attack}I hear that there was some sort of Sith Lord in the Western Square killing people with his mind.
gen_work.501gen_work006.mp3: That space battle has caused hell with our schedules. Our quotas for shipments are gonna be late again.

reporter.501reporter015.mp3: After last month's spectacular explosion of the South Quarter Mining Refinery, Queen Talia hasn't made a single public appearance.
reporter.501reporter016.mp3: Security in the Royal Palace has been increased to unprecedented levels. Senior royal officials have claimed that the explosion was one of three recent assassination attempts.
reporter.501reporter017.mp3: Many citizens have criticized Queen Talia's absence during these increasingly unstable times.
reporter.501reporter011.mp3: One of the greatest mysteries in recent memory is the dissolution of the Jedi Order. Today, Republic intellence analysts have released a declassified report that sheds new light into this mystery.
reporter.501reporter012.mp3: It is public knowledge that the Jedi Order suffered extreme casualties during the Jedi Civil War. But the new intelligence report indicates evidence of even greater casualties after the war.
reporter.501reporter013.mp3: Murders, accidents, and the Miraluka tragedy had a profound impact on the number of Jedi. The report claims that there are even bounties on the remaining Jedi.
reporter.501reporter014.mp3: The report concluded that the Jedi Order may be completely extinct now. Whether this was coincidence or conspiracy is still unknown.
reporter.501reporter007.mp3: The Republic Senate is deadlocked on how to proceed in the wake of the Peragus disaster.
reporter.501reporter008.mp3: Scientific experts indicate that if the fuel problem isn't solved, then the Telosian Restoration Project is in grave jeopardy.
reporter.501reporter009.mp3: 'Peragus Station requires constant fuel,' reported one senior scientist. 'Over time its orbit will degrade and it will crash into the atmosphere.'
reporter.501reporter010.mp3: Many political careers are tied to the success or failure of the TRP. If it falls, there could be a major shift in power in the Republic Senate.
reporter.501reporter001.mp3: In the latest news today, the Onderon Space Force has confirmed that a Republic military craft initiated the space battle over our planet.
reporter.501reporter002.mp3: Sources inside the military say the first shots of the massive battle were fired by the Republic vessel, the Ebon Hawk.
reporter.501reporter003.mp3: The Ebon Hawk is a capital-class vessel and it destroyed 15 Onderon military fighters before being destroyed by Colonel Tobin's forces.
reporter.501reporter004.mp3: Queen Talia is expected to make an announcement later today. Whether her support of the Republic will falter due to this attack is unknown.
reporter.501reporter005.mp3: Two new alerts of escaped Republic spies have been circulated to all media centers. If you see either of them, please report it to the authorities immediately.
reporter.501reporter006.mp3: One of them is a journalist for Iziz Comm. Authorities say that he may be one of the instigators of last month's South Quarter refinery explosion.
reporter.502reporter018.mp3: In the Council of Lords today, Lord Dashel{DASH-elle} recommended a special commendation for Colonel Tobin due to his brilliant command of our armada in the skies above Onderon.
reporter.502reporter019.mp3: 'Without him,' Lord Dashel said, 'The Republic attack would surely have done more damage. Tobin is one of Iziz's greatest heroes and deserves recognition.'
reporter.502reporter015.mp3: The Council of Lords' session is running late today as General Vaklu rallies his supporters to pass his amendment giving the Council the power to manage diplomatic relations with the Republic instead of the Queen.
reporter.502reporter016.mp3: Critics say that this amendment is a thinly veiled attempt by General Vaklu to secede from the Republic. A super-majority of lords are needed to pass it.
reporter.502reporter017.mp3: Political experts say that Queen Talia still has enough Lords that support her to easily quash Vaklu's latest efforts.
reporter.502reporter012.mp3: The Ithorian fleet has yet again pushed back estimates for when the beasts will be cleared from our streets. They claim that the blockade continues to hinder their progress.
reporter.502reporter013.mp3: Not only has this posed a significant health risk, but there has been a rise of beast attacks in Iziz. Three attacks happened last week.
reporter.502reporter014.mp3: Disturbingly, there have been two additional beast attacks today. The frequency of the attacks has been growing.
reporter.502reporter010.mp3: In the Council of Lords today, Lord Dashel{DASH-elle} recommended a special commendation for Colonel Tobin due to his brilliant command of our armada in the skies above Onderon.
reporter.502reporter011.mp3: 'Without him,' Lord Dashel said, 'The Republic attack would surely have done more damage. Tobin is one of Iziz's greatest heroes and deserves recognition.'
reporter.502reporter008.mp3: In local news, a citizen in the Merchant Quarter was mistakenly arrested by Queen Talia's soldiers. The soldier's report claimed that the speaker was "attempting to incite a riot."
reporter.502reporter009.mp3: A preliminary investigation revealed that, although the speaker was intoxicated, he was innocent of all charges. The soldier is expected to be reprimanded for the false arrest.
reporter.502reporter005.mp3: In the Merchant Square today a full scale riot broke out. During a public speaker's address, vocal supporters of Queen Talia were provoked to violence.
reporter.502reporter006.mp3: Soldiers arrived quickly at the scene. However, seven people are still listed to be in a critical condition from injuries sustained in the riot.
reporter.502reporter007.mp3: This is the second incident this week of public speakers being violently assaulted by Queen Talia's supporters.
reporter.502reporter001.mp3: Crime rates have been soaring in recent months. Even in the Merchant Quarter, the Western Square has seen a dramatic increase in violent crimes.
reporter.502reporter002.mp3: There have been multiple reports of gang warfare on a large scale. Captain Riiken of the Onderon military has confirmed over a dozen casualties today alone.
reporter.502reporter003.mp3: One local resident of the Western square claims to have heard blaster shots, sword fighting, and even a lightsaber.
reporter.502reporter004.mp3: 'It's getting so bad that I don't want to leave my house,' she said.

tarn.502cp_tolas016.mp3: I enjoyed our business together. I don't have another premium buyer lined up for a visa. If I get one, I'll try to get in touch with you.
tarn.502cp_tolas015.mp3: So you're back. My offer still stands 2000 credits for an open starport visa.
tarn.502cp_tolas001.mp3: You have the look of someone used to adversity. A cut above the rabble around here. I have a business proposition for you.
tarn.502cp_tolas002.mp3: Everyone around here begs and pleads night and day for open starport visas. Very touching how well they act out their lies. Or truths. It doesn't really matter. What does matter is credits. Hard currency.
tarn.502cp_tolas003.mp3: I offer you 2000 credits if you find an open starport visa. You won't find a better deal.
tarn.502cp_tolas014.mp3: Ask someone who cares about that. Iziz has suffered for many years. The strongest of us are accustomed to it now.
tarn.502cp_tolas013.mp3: Does it matter? Truly matter? No. I have no sad story, I just know people who will pay a great deal for an open starport visa. The credits are your share of my profits. The visas are very rare, but I have a feeling you may come across one.
tarn.502cp_tolas008.mp3: This is excellent news. I'll gladly pay you 2000 credits for it.
tarn.502cp_tolas012.mp3: No, the pleasure is all mine.
tarn.502cp_tolas011.mp3: [Failure] 2000 credits is more than enough. I have my own profits to consider.
tarn.502cp_tolas010.mp3: [Success] You're right, of course. The absolute highest I can pay is 3000 credits.
tarn.502cp_tolas009.mp3: It is worth more, indeed. The highest I can pay is 3000 credits.
tarn.502cp_tolas004.mp3: I only know of one person who might offer something comparable. And what's going on there is illegal. I'm a legitimate trader, so there's no risk.
tarn.502cp_tolas005.mp3: There is only one thing ultimately more important than money - and that's your life. She's trouble, I wouldn't deal with her.
tarn.502cp_tolas007.mp3: No, I don't think so. It's really very simple. We don't have anything more to talk about unless you get an extra visa.
tarn.502cp_tolas006.mp3: I want nothing to do with her. If you want to get involved with that sort of person, you'll have to figure it out on your own.
tarn.601mechanic028.mp3: You again... What do you want? I'm busy!
tarn.601mechanic033.mp3: Nope, I'm way too busy to die.
tarn.601mechanic001.mp3: {gruff}What do you want? I don't have time for cursed salvagers.
tarn.601mechanic013.mp3: Can't you tell? I'm a mechanic. In fact, I'm the only mechanic here in Khoonda.  I'm responsible for maintaining everything mechanical and electrical at the Khoonda outpost.
tarn.601mechanic032.mp3: That damned alien has set up a shop outside Khoonda. If you ask me, I think he's stripping the machinery around Khoonda and selling it back to us!
tarn.601mechanic027.mp3: Hmmph! I'd like to see you do a better job at fixing the droids, security doors, and gun turrets! Now quit bugging me!
tarn.601mechanic014.mp3: {exasperated}Yeah, sometimes it seems nothing works around here. But I don't have time to complain. Too much work to do!
tarn.601mechanic026.mp3: [Failure] {indignant}You shouldn't be telling me what to do! I need to get back to work now.
tarn.601mechanic025.mp3: [Success]{exasperated, but happy to have someone to complain to} You're right... Well, between the droids, the security doors and the gun turrets, I have my hands full!
tarn.601mechanic015.mp3: [Success] {compliant}I'll tell you... {exasperated, but happy to have someone to complain to}Between the droids, the security doors and the gun turrets, I have my hands full!
tarn.601mechanic021.mp3: The gun turrets outside the Khoonda outpost are supposed to defend against potential assaults, wild critters and the like.
tarn.601mechanic022.mp3: But they only work half the time, and sometimes they get confused as to what's friend and foe.
tarn.601mechanic023.mp3: Why, just the other day, right after I repaired one of the guns, it turned on a sorry group of militia men returning from a patrol.
tarn.601mechanic024.mp3: No casualties, but it put several of them in the med lab. And I can't seem to fix the blasted medical droid, either!
tarn.601mechanic019.mp3: Well, it's just one door, actually, but I could scratch my head bald before I figured out how to fix it proper.  Problem is, the side security door to Khoonda was damaged in the war.
tarn.601mechanic020.mp3: Every time I try to fix it, the door either sticks open, or it locks down completely, and then I have to spend a week taking it apart to get it to open or close again.
tarn.601mechanic016.mp3: All of the droids in Khoonda are relics from the last war. Most of them are damaged and rusted.
tarn.601mechanic017.mp3: The best I could do was get that ratchety, old protocol droid over there operational so it could greet visitors.
tarn.601mechanic018.mp3: Most of the other droids are laying broken around Khoonda outpost.
tarn.601mechanic002.mp3: Well, you don't look like a damned mercenary and you don't smell like a stinking farmer. Why else would you be here?
tarn.601mechanic011.mp3: The salvagers are a crazed lot of treasure hunters, looking to loot something of value from the ruins of the Jedi Enclave.
tarn.601mechanic012.mp3: Most of them end up broke... or dead. If you ask me, anything of value that was at the Enclave has already been plundered.
tarn.601mechanic006.mp3: Not sure what they're doing here, other than causing trouble. There's not really much work here for mercenaries. Maybe they're here to collect the bounty on that Jedi.
tarn.601mechanic010.mp3: Well, I don't know much, but they say the mercenaries are responsible for some farmers disappearing.
tarn.601mechanic007.mp3: I don't know for sure. But that's what they say.
tarn.601mechanic008.mp3: Oh, you know, the folks around Khoonda. Go there yourself and get the details firsthand. You'll find the Khoonda outpost just outside the landing port.
tarn.601mechanic009.mp3: Is this gonna take long? I'm busy, you know.
tarn.601mechanic004.mp3: If you're not a salvager, then I don't even want to know why you'd go to the Enclave.
tarn.601mechanic005.mp3: Nothing but rumor. They say the spirits of the angry dead haunt the ruins. On a quiet night you can hear the ghosts howling and scraping around!
tarn.601mechanic003.mp3: Fine, fine! Then leave me to my business!
tarn.601olddroid028.mp3: {Shock, fear and a little hatred}A Jedi! I've got to tell the others!
tarn.601olddroid037.mp3: I'm sorry, Master Jedi! I won't tell nobody if you spare me. I promise!
tarn.601mechanic029.mp3: You! You're one of those cursed soldiers that tore up Khoonda! Now I have to fix everything you busted! I'll bet you weren't thinking of that!
tarn.601olddroid027.mp3: Hey! Did that droid just call you a Jedi?
tarn.601olddroid039.mp3: No mistake about it. That droid is calling you a Jedi!
tarn.601olddroid061.mp3: Please don't kill me. I won't tell, honest!
tarn.601olddroid035.mp3: Yeah, sure you do. I've got to tell the others!
tarn.601olddroid030.mp3: [Success] Well, I suppose not. Your eyes aren't glowing and you don't have horns sticking out of your forehead. Heh, crazy droid...
tarn.601olddroid031.mp3: Sorry for being jumpy. It's just that we hate the Jedi here.
tarn.601olddroid034.mp3: {Very offended}You're either ignorant or a lousy Jedi sympathizer! I have nothing more to say to you!
tarn.601olddroid032.mp3: Why? The Jedi are the cause of everything bad that's happened here in the last five years!
tarn.601olddroid033.mp3: {Expasperated}Oh don't get me started! I got too much work to do to stand around and rant about the damned Jedi. If you want to hear more, just talk to anyone in Khoonda outpost.
tarn.601olddroid029.mp3: [Success] You are not a Jedi. The droid is malfunctioning.

cp_trkd1.502cp_trkd1002.mp3: Mother, why can't we go home?

cp_trkd2.502cp_trkd2002.mp3: I'm not supposed to talk to off-worlders.
cp_trkd2.502cp_trkd2001.mp3: What's happening, mommy? Are people fighting?

mp_anda.502mp_anda046.mp3: I am quite busy right now. Perhaps later we could talk?
mp_anda.502mp_anda044.mp3: No new news yet. There are still those unfriendly to our cause in command.
mp_anda.502mp_anda045.mp3: {This isn't a threat - perhaps a trace of seductiveness in her tone. She wants to give the PC incentives to finish the job}I hope you intend to finish the job.
mp_anda.502mp_anda042.mp3: {The last bit is in a hushed conspiratorial tone}I know you didn't promise me anything, but I have a lot of credits in store for you if you do... what we spoke of.
mp_anda.502mp_anda043.mp3: Your efforts are appreciated, and success will be richly rewarded.
mp_anda.502mp_anda040.mp3: I have heard the news. One captain has been removed. Two to go.
